['\xa0', 'Work Environment', 'Summary/ Objective:', 'Thorough knowledge of Salesforce.com', 'A CRM services company is looking for a Data Specialist with extensive working knowledge of SQL and other data management utilities.\xa0The Role is responsible for managing data processes to ensure data is properly transformed and loaded into CRM; projects present a variety of data science related problems, from data cleansing to complex manipulations of unstructured data to comply with business logic, with the purpose of pushing more client actionable data into Salesforce.com.', 'Essential Functions:', 'Communication Proficiency', '- Perform data entry and data management functions', 'Summary/ Objective', 'Competencies', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Our consulting practice provides teams that create strategic roadmaps, optimize business processes, engineer custom Salesforce-based solutions and provide ongoing managed services to support the full lifecycle of a firm’s interaction with its clients.\xa0', '+ Knowledge of salesforce data loader and CLI is a plus', '~1-3 years experience in a similar role', '\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Cloud Theory is a NYC-based technology firm specializing in cloud-based client-facing solutions. Although we work across all industries, our expertise is financial services. We provide firms with the knowledge and tools needed to compete in the 21st century economy.', '- Working knowledge of data migration processes', '- Proactively identify and implement operational improvements and enhancements to meet data quality goals', 'Competencies:', '\t\xa0', 'Time Management', 'Essential Functions', 'Experience:', 'About Cloud Theory:', '- Familiar with Data Mapping; migration and integration', 'Work Environment: This can be partially onsite, partially remote', '- Know-how in data cleansing and comparison efforts', 'Must be very proficient with SQL', '+ Python data manipulation is a plus']

Delivering domain experts, management consultants, and best-fit technologies through agile execution, along with a commitment to customer service is the REI Way.\xa0', '• Experience with incorporating data science capability into Stakeholder strategy', '• 5 to 8 years of experience with programming languages (such as Python, R, Java, Ruby, Spark, or SQL), and statistical analytics (such as SAS, Matlab, R).', '• Perform statistical analysis, data mining, temporal and pattern analysis, correlation of events, predictive modeling, and pattern recognition.', 'REI Systems is looking for a Data Scientist to join our team. ['', 'What You’ll Do', 'Develop statistical and machine learning models in R and Python.', 'Work within small teams to develop, test, and harden advanced analytical models.', 'Conduct relevant research and data analysis; create reports\xa0for internal clients.', 'DAT Solutions is a next-generation SaaS technology company that has been at the leading edge of innovation in trucking, freight, and transportation supply chain logistics for 42 years. We wrote the book on freight automation, and continue to transform the industry year over year by deploying a suite of software solutions to millions of customers every day - customers who depend on DAT for the deepest, broadest, most relevant data, and accurate insights, to help them make intelligent business decisions and successfully run their companies. We operate the largest truckload freight marketplace in North America, with 183 million freight matches in 2019, and a database of $118 billion of global shipment annual market transaction data. DAT Solutions is based in Beaverton, OR, with offices in Colorado, Missouri, Texas, and Bangalore, India.', 'About DAT', 'Bachelor’s degree required; advanced degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Statistics, or other technical disciplines', 'Skilled in developing algorithms using R, Python, and Java on ML platforms such as Spark and H20.', 'This is your opportunity to bring everything you’ve learned about developing statistical and machine learning models to a team that is defining the future of supply chain analytics.', 'Skilled in applying the latest and most relevant data modeling tools.Experience developing compelling, relevant solutions that deliver greater value to customers.Ability to partner with team members in Product, Data Science, and Engineering.Strong desire to understand the transportation markets and its influencers.Strong programming skills, and ability to analyze large datasets and perform statistical analysis.Highly developed qualitative analysis skills to develop complex models.', 'For additional information, see www.DAT.com/company', 'Deliver quantitative analysis of structured, semi-structured, and unstructured data.', 'Advanced statistics, machine learning, and NLP knowledge.', 'Process management experience; proven ability to effect process change.', 'Experience developing compelling, relevant solutions that deliver greater value to customers.', 'Strong programming skills, and ability to analyze large datasets and perform statistical analysis.', 'Strong desire to understand the transportation markets and its influencers.', 'DAT Solutions will not consider unsolicited résumés from vendors including search firms, fee-based referral services, and/or recruitment agencies.', 'You’ll be part of a company that is transforming an industry, and you’ll use your expertise to solve business problems in the SaaS space, and to create new ways forward.', 'Skilled in applying the latest and most relevant data modeling tools.', 'Master’s Degree or higher strongly preferred.', 'DAT Solutions is looking for a Data Scientist to join our fantastic Product Management team.', 'DAT Solutions embraces the value of a diverse workforce, and believes it is a core strength of our company that we encourage those values in every DAT employee, at every level of our organization, regardless of tenure or rank. We provide equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, disability, genetic information, marital status, amnesty, or status as a covered veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state, and local laws.', 'Data visualization experience using Tableau and Power BI.', 'DAT Solutions offers competitive compensation and an excellent benefit package that includes medical, dental, and vision coverage, flexible savings accounts, 401K, Life and AD&D insurance, a comprehensive Paid Leave program, and a Tuition Reimbursement program.', 'Advanced statistics, machine learning, and NLP knowledge.Product analytics experience.Data visualization experience using Tableau and Power BI.Operations research and optimization knowledge.Process management experience; proven ability to effect process change.Skilled in developing algorithms using R, Python, and Java on ML platforms such as Spark and H20.Bachelor’s degree required; advanced degree in Engineering, Computer Science, Statistics, or other technical disciplinesMaster’s Degree or higher strongly preferred.', 'Ability to partner with team members in Product, Data Science, and Engineering.', 'Develop statistical and machine learning models in R and Python.Conduct relevant research and data analysis; create reports\xa0for internal clients.Deliver quantitative analysis of structured, semi-structured, and unstructured data.Work within small teams to develop, test, and harden advanced analytical models.', 'DAT Solutions', 'The Skills and Experience You’ll Need', 'All referrals and résumés are managed exclusively through the Human Resources Department.', 'Highly developed qualitative analysis skills to develop complex models.', 'Candidate Profile', 'Operations research and optimization knowledge.', 'Product analytics experience.']

['', 'Dependable and able to meet deadlines and withstand the challenges and pressure of a fast-paced research environment', 'AnaBios is hiring a Research Scientist with expertise in tissue slice- and single cell- patch clamp electrophysiology to join our team in San Diego. We are in search of a highly motivated, creative scientist who will contribute to characterizing and elucidating the effects of novel therapeutics for pain, itch and central nervous system (CNS) disorders. This position’s primary function is to develop and run human spinal cord and brain slice electrophysiological assays, as well as manual patch clamp electrophysiology with dissociated human cells. In addition, the Research Scientist will contribute to the design and execution of contract research for our pharmaceutical partners. We are seeking an outstanding scientist with the potential to actively contribute to the continued development of our human tissue-based technology and tackle the new frontier in neurological disorders drug discovery. Expertise in slice electrophysiology is essential. The successful candidate will join a passionate, diverse and dedicated team focused on developing treatments for pain and CNS-related diseases. The ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a team environment are essential prerequisites. This position reports to the Director of Operations and will be located in San Diego, California.', 'Ph.D. or similar experience in neuroscience, neuropharmacology or related field. When adequate and qualifying prior experience could be demonstrated, we will also consider M.S. candidates. In-depth knowledge of electrophysiological techniques is essential.', 'Excellent analytical skills allowing for qualitative and quantitative evaluation of complex data sets', 'Contribute to the writing of research proposals, scientific articles, and grant applications', 'AnaBios is an innovative biotechnology company located in San Diego, California.\xa0Our scientists have developed a transformative novel technology that enables the pre-clinical assessment of drug safety and efficacy directly in human donor tissue. Unmatched access to viable human tissue and research capabilities, combined with insights from our experienced team, means AnaBios offers the unprecedented opportunity to predict human clinical responses for novel drug candidates and unlock new possibilities for drug discovery.', 'Perform experimental work in strict adherence to the specific protocols and SOPs in the context of contract research projects or internal R&D.', 'Excellent oral and written communication skills', 'QUALIFICATIONS:', 'Data analysis and compilation of presentations and reports', 'JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'Passion for hands-on laboratory work, good problem-solving abilities', 'The Research Scientist position is a hands-on opportunity which will include, but not be limited to, the following tasks and responsibilities', 'Ph.D. or similar experience in neuroscience, neuropharmacology or related field. When adequate and qualifying prior experience could be demonstrated, we will also consider M.S. candidates. In-depth knowledge of electrophysiological techniques is essential.Excellent analytical skills allowing for qualitative and quantitative evaluation of complex data setsPassion for hands-on laboratory work, good problem-solving abilitiesExcellent oral and written communication skillsAttention to detailAble to adapt to rapidly changing projects and priorities as well as work in a team environment \xa0Dependable and able to meet deadlines and withstand the challenges and pressure of a fast-paced research environment', 'Perform experimental work in strict adherence to the specific protocols and SOPs in the context of contract research projects or internal R&D.Develop, implement, and validate new electrophysiology-based assays to capture critical endpoints predictive of clinical outcomesData analysis and compilation of presentations and reportsContribute to the writing of research proposals, scientific articles, and grant applicationsRigorous and accurate data and methods logging, laboratory notebook keeping and compliance with all established SOPs.', 'Research Scientist', 'Able to adapt to rapidly changing projects and priorities as well as work in a team environment \xa0', 'Rigorous and accurate data and methods logging, laboratory notebook keeping and compliance with all established SOPs.', 'Develop, implement, and validate new electrophysiology-based assays to capture critical endpoints predictive of clinical outcomes', 'Attention to detail']

job_title: Senior Data Scientist - Advanced Marketing Analytics
job_text: ['', 'Deliver data science products to help optimize marketing spend, maximizing our returns', 'Work with other senior data scientists on the team leveraging a range of approaches from statistical / econometric models, to causal inference, to machine learning to understand the effect of our marketing spend on KPIs like user intake, consumption, and brand metrics Help definite experimentation roadmap based on model results creating a flywheel of efficiency gains for our spend Work with business stakeholders to define priorities, approaches and business requirements for data science solutionsDeliver data science products to help optimize marketing spend, maximizing our returnsTranslate complex problems and solutions to all levels of the organizationDrive innovation of the statistical and machine learning methodologies and tools used by the team', 'Expert-level knowledge of statistical methods and machine learning', '7+ (or 3+ with PhD) years of combined experience in advanced analytics in industry or research', 'Work with other senior data scientists on the team leveraging a range of approaches from statistical / econometric models, to causal inference, to machine learning to understand the effect of our marketing spend on KPIs like user intake, consumption, and brand metrics ', 'Master or PhD degree with a specialization in Statistics, Computer Science, Data Science, Economics, Operations Research, or another quant field', 'You have experience with datasets related to tracking marketing campaigns, and are familiar with industry standard modeling approaches like MMM and MTA ', 'Master or PhD degree with a specialization in Statistics, Computer Science, Data Science, Economics, Operations Research, or another quant field7+ (or 3+ with PhD) years of combined experience in advanced analytics in industry or researchExpert-level knowledge of statistical methods and machine learningYou have experience with datasets related to tracking marketing campaigns, and are familiar with industry standard modeling approaches like MMM and MTA You have the technical competence to perform advanced analytics via efficiently working with large datasets, and the software engineering skillset to build data science applications', 'Translate complex problems and solutions to all levels of the organization', 'Work with business stakeholders to define priorities, approaches and business requirements for data science solutions', 'Who You Are', 'Help definite experimentation roadmap based on model results creating a flywheel of efficiency gains for our spend ', 'Drive innovation of the statistical and machine learning methodologies and tools used by the team', 'You have the technical competence to perform advanced analytics via efficiently working with large datasets, and the software engineering skillset to build data science applications', "What You'll Do"]

['', 'Illustrate key trends and drivers through effective data interpretation and visualization.Design and develop quantitative demand forecast models that generate accurate predictions to drive TaylorMade’s financial and operational planning.Build executive-facing reporting tools to provide insights and metrics which track forecast accuracy and explain variance.Identification of gaps and opportunities for model improvements along with identification and validation of new data sources.Formalize assumptions about how demand forecasts are expected to behave, creating definitions of outliers, developing methods to systematically identify these outliers, and explaining why they are reasonable or identifying fixes for them.Provide insights and analytics around operations and supply-chain optimization and prioritization questions.Implement statistical methods to solve specific business problems utilizing code (R, Matlab, Python, etc.).Performs other related duties and assignments as required.', 'Normal office conditions.', 'As part of the advanced analytics team, the Data Scientist will be a key player on an innovative team that develops and provides actionable insights across the organization. S/he will help to evolve existing forecasting methodologies across different parts of the organization and develop sophisticated models, using machine learning algorithms and advanced analytics. This role will be responsible for developing long and short-term product demand forecasts in multiple markets and across multiple channels to help drive down supply chain costs (freight, inventory levels). The successful individual will conduct multiple tasks and projects simultaneously, maintain strong relationships with stakeholders, and own deliverables end to end. ', 'Strong communications skills: both verbal and written, with the ability to explain complex concepts to non-technical audiences.', 'Education, Work Experience, and Professional Certifications:', 'Proven ability to perform in-depth analysis, synthesize results, develop stories, build strategies and make recommendations to business and technical leaders.', 'Able to work efficiently and accurately in an atmosphere of frequent interruption.', 'Are you passionate about using data, finding insights, and trying to explain why things are what they are? If so, read on. ', 'Illustrate key trends and drivers through effective data interpretation and visualization.', 'Ability to learn/understand end-to-end business processes and interdependencies.', 'Experience or understanding in Supply Chain materials and network modeling. ', 'Essential Functions and Key Responsibilities:', 'Expertise (4+ years) experience in at least one statistical software package (e.g. R, Matlab or Python).', 'Occasional travel required.', 'Build executive-facing reporting tools to provide insights and metrics which track forecast accuracy and explain variance.', 'B.S. in a quantitative or technical field, such as computer science, mathematics, statistics, or business.6+ years of experience of data science/analytics', 'Performs other related duties and assignments as required.', '6+ years of experience of data science/analytics', 'Experience in the design and development of automated forecasting systems.', 'Experience or understanding of retail or market distribution, merch planning would be good. ', 'Normal office conditions.Ability to work extended hours as necessary.Occasional travel required.Able to work efficiently and accurately in an atmosphere of frequent interruption.Light physical effort equal to frequent lifting or moving of lightweight materials', 'B.S. in a quantitative or technical field, such as computer science, mathematics, statistics, or business.', 'Identification of gaps and opportunities for model improvements along with identification and validation of new data sources.', 'Design and develop quantitative demand forecast models that generate accurate predictions to drive TaylorMade’s financial and operational planning.', 'Work Environment / Physical Requirements:', 'Ability to work across teams and manage priorities to accomplish multiple tasks is required.', 'Light physical effort equal to frequent lifting or moving of lightweight materials', 'Provide insights and analytics around operations and supply-chain optimization and prioritization questions.', 'Interpersonal skills suited to dealing courteously and professionally with cross-functional teams ', 'Strong communications skills: both verbal and written, with the ability to explain complex concepts to non-technical audiences.Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Word and PowerPoint) with advanced skills in Excel data management.Expertise (4+ years) experience in at least one statistical software package (e.g. R, Matlab or Python).Experience in the design and development of automated forecasting systems.Expertise with databases for acquiring and transforming data.Outstanding quantitative modeling and statistical analysis skills (time series, causal inference, machine learning).Proven ability to perform in-depth analysis, synthesize results, develop stories, build strategies and make recommendations to business and technical leaders.Adept at implementing contextual reasoning/rationale into forecast models and predictions.Ability to learn/understand end-to-end business processes and interdependencies.Meticulous attention to detail and proactive nature.Experience or understanding of retail or market distribution, merch planning would be good. ['', 'What You’ll Do', 'Equifax is a global data, analytics, and technology company. We believe knowledge drives progress. We blend unique data, analytics and technology with a passion for serving customers globally, to create insights to power the decisions that move people forward. \u200bWe serve as a consumer advocate, steward of financial literacy, and champion of economic advancement.\xa0', 'Work with cross-functional teams to develop ideas and execute business plans.', 'Work in a cross-functional, matrix organization, at times under ambiguous circumstances.', 'Expertise with a programming languages such as Python, Scala', 'Schedule:', 'Remain current on new developments in AI/Machine Learning, data analytics, Big Data, predictive analytics, and technology.', 'Equifax empowers businesses and consumers with information they can trust. With a strong heritage of innovation and leadership, we leverage our unique data, advanced analytics and proprietary technology to enrich the performance of businesses and the lives of consumers.', 'Primary Location:', 'As an innovative global company that enables access to credit, we’re part of breakthrough collaborations and innovations that address complex social challenges such as social welfare, community relations and financial education for underprivileged youth. We establish relationships that create economically healthy communities. We help individuals gain financial independence by increasing access to capital for small businesses. And we provide young adults entering college or university with financial education tools.\xa0', 'Excellent problem solving skills with the ability to design algorithms, which may include data cleaning, data mining, data clustering and pattern recognition methodologies', 'Manage data analysis to develop fact-based recommendations for innovation projects.', 'Curiosity', 'We offer excellent compensation packages with high-reaching market salaries, 401k matching, along with the works: comprehensive healthcare packages, schedule flexibility, collaborative work spaces, work from home opportunities, paid time off, and organizational growth potential', 'Decide-Execute-Ship', 'If this sounds like somewhere you want to work, don’t delay, apply today - ['', 'Application Process:', "I will contact anyone who looks like a potential match--requesting to schedule a call with you immediately. Once contacted, I'll explain our VC Recruiting model, spend some time getting to know you better, and will discuss various startup opportunities within our portfolio with you as well.", "I am a full-time, salaried employee of Greylock, and there are no fees associated with any of the work I do. My team provides free candidate referrals/introductions to all of our active investments (one of the many services we provide), and I'm always looking to add new people to our network of talent.", "To help support their growth of several investments in SF, I'm looking to network with talented ML Engineers with commercial backgrounds in deep learning. If you have 2+ years of industry experience in applied machine learning with a focus on deep reinforcement learning, curriculum-based learning, and/or computational neuroscience, and I'd welcome the chance to discuss some of these opportunities with qualified applicants.", 'I work for Greylock Partners (one of the top tech investors in the world), and I specialize in ML/DS recruiting for our portfolio of startup investments. Offered as a free/complimentary service, I focus on connecting with top Machine Learning and Data Science talent and making personal referrals / recommendations / introductions into our portfolio. And, on occasion, I sometimes help highly-entrepreneurial candidates (i.e., future founders) connect with members of our investment team as well.', 'Due to the volume of applicants we typically receive from our job postings, a follow-up email will not be sent until a match is identified with one of our investments.', 'Greylock Talent:']
['', 'Requirements', 'DCS Corp is an Equal Opportunity Employer/Protected Veterans/Individuals with Disabilities.']

job_title: Data Scientist- Ultrasound Advanced Development and AI
job_text: ['', 'Technical fluency; comfortable understanding and discussing architectural concepts and algorithms, assessing tradeoffs and new opportunities with technical team members.', 'Company:', 'Develop and implement state-of-the-art computer vision algorithms for object detection, classification, segmentation, etc. – for both live video and static medical images.', 'Experience with medical imaging', 'Proficient with AWS or Azure cloud computing environments.', 'Ph.D. or M.S. in computer science, machine learning, medical imaging, physics, engineering, or related fields.', 'Pay Transparency Non-Discrimination Provision', 'Strong foundation in computer science, algorithms, data structures, machine learning, and statistics.', ' Ph.D. or M.S. in computer science, machine learning, medical imaging, physics, engineering, or related fields. Strong foundation in computer science, algorithms, data structures, machine learning, and statistics. Depth and breadth in state-of-the-art computer vision, deep learning, and machine learning technologies. Proficiency in Matlab, Python and associated packages, and image pre-processing methods. Experience working with small & large datasets for deep learning applications. Excellent written and verbal communication skills and ability to communicate effectively to both technical and nontechnical audiences. Technical fluency; comfortable understanding and discussing architectural concepts and algorithms, assessing tradeoffs and new opportunities with technical team members. ', 'Proficiency in Matlab, Python and associated packages, and image pre-processing methods.', 'Research, design, implement, and deploy full-stack scalable computer vision, deep learning, and machine learning solutions to novel diagnostic ultrasound imaging clinical problems.', 'Keep up with the state-of-the-art in computer vision and deep learning.', 'Experience in Agile Application Development & Scrum methodologies.', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Experience Level:', 'Proficiency with Tensorflow, Keras, or other deep learning frameworks.', ' Research, design, implement, and deploy full-stack scalable computer vision, deep learning, and machine learning solutions to novel diagnostic ultrasound imaging clinical problems. Keep up with the state-of-the-art in computer vision and deep learning. ['Luxoft has contract with a major Telecommunications provider looking to build a team of strong technical consultants to drive cost savings through data exploration. This agile team will work closely with clients to identify data sources, bring them together and normalize the data structure to be ingested for analytics. The work will be centered around telco network equipment to create a repeatable framework of data exploration. This high visibility project will drive business value realization using big data techniques and agile methodologies.This project will implement a 3 step process including the following:o First to identify the contacts, source of information and availability of data.o Second, using the requirements, develop a pipeline for the data into a normalized structure called the BRD (Business Ready Dataset).o Third will be to automate the process of data acquisition and BRD creation into a production environment with checks and balances (monitoring, etc.).These steps will be implemented by various roles/team members and repeated for multiple equipment types using an Agile team method. ', 'Luxoft has contract with a major Telecommunications provider looking to build a team of strong technical consultants to drive cost savings through data exploration. Responsibilities: o Development of a self-service platform to be used by our customers driving cost savings initiatives.o Contribute to an Agile team of developers focused on data ingestion across multiple sources.o Operate in a CI/CD environment.o Implement data extraction from various/distributed sources utilizing scripting and storage in a SQL/HSQL environment.o Strong analytical, planning, and organizational skills with an ability to manage competing demandso Strong experience in data exploration with large data sets Mandatory Skills: Scala, Java, HiveQL, SPARK, SQL, Python, Hadoop, Cloud, MySQL   ', 'Responsibilities:', ' ', "This position is open to US Citizens, Green Card Holders, EAD's , H1B Holders working through a subcontractor. Must have a minimum of 4 years in a Big Data Environment and be exprienced working in large data environments with a minimum of 100TB of Data. Scala experience is a must.\xa0 ", 'o Development of a self-service platform to be used by our customers driving cost savings initiatives.o Contribute to an Agile team of developers focused on data ingestion across multiple sources.o Operate in a CI/CD environment.o Implement data extraction from various/distributed sources utilizing scripting and storage in a SQL/HSQL environment.o Strong analytical, planning, and organizational skills with an ability to manage competing demandso Strong experience in data exploration with large data sets ', 'Mandatory Skills:', 'Scala, Java, HiveQL, SPARK, SQL, Python, Hadoop, Cloud, MySQL ', 'Responsibilities: ', 'NO H1b sponsorship will be provided.', 'Mandatory Skills: ']

company: Center for Biostatistics in AIDS Research (CBAR)
job_text: ['', 'work as part of collaborative teams in designing, conducting and reporting results from clinical trials and observational studies; provide the statistical expertise for and lead the statistical work on studies including mentoring and supervising other staff; and develop a self-initiated research agenda – including statistical methodology – related to their\xa0HIV\xa0and infectious diseases research projects. ', '• Research Scientist appointment requires at least two years clinical trials or related applied experience beyond doctorate.', 'Applicants should demonstrate evidence of the ability to conduct collaborative and methodological research and work independently in the design, conduct, monitoring and analysis of trial and observational studies. Applicants should also demonstrate strong quantitative and communication skills and have interest in assuming a leadership role.', 'The Department of Biostatistics at the Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health has an immediate opening in\xa0CBAR\xa0for a Ph.D.-level Research Scientist or Senior Research Scientist statistician to work in the\xa0AIDS\xa0Clinical Trials Group (ACTG) with a particular focus of tuberculosis research. ', '• Senior Research Scientist appointment requires at least seven years clinical trials or related applied experience beyond doctorate.', 'work as part of collaborative teams in designing, conducting and reporting results from clinical trials and observational studies; ', 'Basic Qualifications', 'provide the statistical expertise for and lead the statistical work on studies including mentoring and supervising other staff; and ', 'Doctoral degree in biostatistics or related field.', 'The position may include statistical methods research for someone with an appropriate background. This position provides an opportunity to be a leader in a new generation of statistician-trialists.', 'develop a self-initiated research agenda – including statistical methodology – related to their\xa0HIV\xa0and infectious diseases research projects. ', 'The\xa0ACTG\xa0is a very large\xa0NIH-funded collaborative clinical trials network with an international research agenda focused on the treatment and cure of\xa0HIV\xa0infection and associated co-morbidities, particularly tuberculosis. Successful applicant will join over 100 statisticians, epidemiologists and research staff collaborating on the design, monitoring, analysis and reporting of Phase I through Phase IV clinical trials, diagnostic studies and observational studies.', 'Applicants should have the potential to take a leadership role in the\xa0ACTG\xa0and other infectious diseases projects, and the ability to: ']

['', ' 5-7 years of sales or market research experience with emphasis on quantitative data analysis.', ' Leader of advanced analytics and reporting request development. Projects may include new data sources, new processes, improved metrics in order to answer business questions. Responsible for gathering project requirements, assessing new data requests and coordinating data acquisition and implementation with other internal IT groups. Responsible for internal infrastructure development, processes and methodologies that are foundational for the success of the data analytics projects. Assists with machine learning and AI based projects. Mentors junior team members in technical skills in order to support current processes and develop new ones. Identifies and proposes business analytics projects and programs that map to Promega’s long term data strategy. Conducts quantitative and statistical analyses using internal and external information, with a focus on providing decision support for global growth and retention strategies. Develops reporting systems for key metrics to assess the effectiveness of marketing, channel, and sales tactics. Implements new research sources and methodologies to refine processes and to improve quality and timeliness of decision support information. Reviews and evaluates new data analytics tools to advance Promega’s successful use of technology. Proven ability to interpret data and communicate the implications of analysis at all levels of the organization. Demonstrated expert level of proficiency in one or more enterprise data warehousing tools such as SAP BW, reporting tools such as SAP BOBJ and Microsoft Power BI, and analytics packages such as R Studio and Python. Demonstrated expert level of proficiency in Word, Excel, PowerPoint. Proven track record of training others on the interpretation of analytical analysis as well as the use of BI tools. ['\xa0', 'About You', 'You will be working alongside experienced leaders in the industry who will give you broad exposure to a wide array of technologies. Growth is important to us, so you will have opportunities to learn new tech and have a big influence on solving problems directly affecting day to day operations and uptime.', 'We’re all in with AWS and make extensive use of many of their services. On any given day we are running between 1600-2100 instances with a stack and application set that includes Ubuntu, C, Python, Go,\xa0Kafkfa, RDS, Redshift and Stackdriver.\xa0', 'What you’ll be doing', 'About Us', 'You’ve designed, built and operated SQL infrastructure at scale. You’ve designed, built and run noSQL at scale. You understand data stores. You have experience with data pipelines and using modern streaming and batch data processing frameworks and tools such as Kafka, Spark, and EMR. You understand all too well that not every problem is a nail and not every solution involves a hammer and have the experience and expertise to determine, select and use the right tool for the right job.', 'We’re live and breath big data. On a daily basis, we ingest and extract useful information from hundreds of live TV channel\xa0as well as collect, analyze and report on information from millions of TVs.\xa0', 'Inscape (an Affiliate of VIZIO Inc.) is an industry leader in advertising solutions through automatic content recognition. We capture live viewing data from content sources across millions of Smart TVs and devices. Our comprehensive metrics deliver highly accurate, cross-platform viewing behavior. We enable advertisers and content producers with important insights that help them develop a deeper understanding of audiences, make more intelligent ad-buying decisions and be better prepared for changes in the market place.\xa0Inscape is located in San Francisco and is a fast paced, entrepreneurial environment focusing on our data collection and ad tech functions.', 'Inscape (a subsidiary of VIZIO Inc.) is profitable, stable, and enjoys the benefits and support of its strong corporate parent.', 'Initially you would assume operational ownership of our current databases and clusters (we have a long-standing relationship with an organization that provides us with support.) As part of this you will be doing a deep dive into all things data-related including but not limited to: how data is structured, how if flows through the system, how it is accessed,\xa0how we currently manage our databases and data stores as well as their overall status and health.\xa0Once you have a good handle on these issues you would provide a read-out on our current state and make recommendations. You would then lead the architecture, creation and operation of the next generation data infrastructure.\xa0', 'You are someone that may have strong opinions about things, but plays well with others.\xa0', 'What we offer', 'You’ve designed, built and operated SQL infrastructure at scale. You’ve designed, built and run noSQL at scale. You understand data stores. You have experience with data pipelines and using modern streaming and batch data processing frameworks and tools such as Kafka, Spark, and EMR. You understand all too well that not every problem is a nail and not every solution involves a hammer and have the experience and expertise to determine, select and use the right tool for the right job.You are a performance and optimization nerd.\xa0You are a self-starter and enjoy digging into the details.\xa0You are someone that may have strong opinions about things, but plays well with others.\xa0', 'We are currently using data structures, processing and reporting approaches that got us this far but we’re almost positive are in need of a rethink and redesign. Our current approach involves large AWS Redshift clusters, numerous ETL processes with business logic in those ETLs as well as very complicated and lengthy SQL queries to produce reports that are run hourly and which often contain largely redundant data.\xa0', 'We do not accept unsolicited agency resumes. We will not pay fees to any third party agency, outside recruiter or firm without a mutually agreed-upon contract and will not be responsible for any agency fees associated with unsolicited resumes.\xa0Unsolicited resumes will be considered our property and will be processed accordingly.', 'Inscape Data, Inc, a subsidiary of VIZIO, Inc.\xa0is an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to diversity in the workplace.\xa0All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regards to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, national origin, protected veteran status, or any other basis protected by applicable law, and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.', 'We offer a competitive compensation and benefits package that includes real accrued vacation, health/dental/vision, 401k match, and more. We also operate under a flexible working schedule so you can get the job done at the office or elsewhere.', 'You are a performance and optimization nerd.\xa0', 'You are a self-starter and enjoy digging into the details.\xa0']

In this new role, you’ll architect cloud data infrastructure used by different teams at HNI and see data projects from beginning to end. This role provides opportunities to shape the future of data infrastructure and work on the latest cloud data technologies to develop analytic systems that scale with company growth. As a key hire in a new department you will design build and manage scalable data pipelines, data warehouses and work with our Decision Science team to on machine learning models which provide insights to multiple business partners to make data-driven business decisions. If you like the sound of\xa0solving business problems, building a new functional area from scratch, implementing new\xa0approaches to data and making a\xa0major impact at a leading global company HNI might be the place for you.', 'Dive deep into all aspects of the business, understand the problems, and tie them back to data engineering solutions', 'Develop optimal data processing architecture and systems for new data and ETL pipelines based on HNI’s newly created Azure Data Platform environment.', 'Develop optimal data processing architecture and systems for new data and ETL pipelines based on HNI’s newly created Azure Data Platform environment.Develop enterprise elastic/cloud data lake, data warehousing platform supporting the needs of business intelligence, data science and advance analytics projectsDive deep into all aspects of the business, understand the problems, and tie them back to data engineering solutionsAct as a technical leader and mentor for the data analysts and BI business analysts, helping institute best engineering practices and approachesDesign and develop new framework and automation tools to enable teams to consume and understand data fasterBrainstorm and contribute ideas to our technology, algorithms and productsCollaborate with multiple teams in high visibility roles and own the solution development end-to-end', 'Industry Week', 'HNI Corporation (NYSE: HNI) is a manufacturer of workplace furnishings and building products, operating under two segments.\xa0 The workplace furnishings segment is a leading global designer and provider of commercial furnishings, going to market under multiple unique brands.\xa0 The residential building products segment is the nation’s leading manufacturer and marketer of hearth products, which include a full array of gas, electric, wood, and pellet-burning fireplaces, inserts, stoves, facings, and accessories.\xa0']

company: X4 Tech Staffing I Tech and Digital Recruitment
job_text: ['', 'Please feel free to reach out to J.Perez@x4technology.us if you think this role may be for you.', 'In this role you will be responsible for contributing and improving the data pipeline. In this role you will work alongside the ML teams and make sure the clients are satisfied. This company is transitioning into a period of growth and looking to bring on a Data Scientist with a strong Deep learning background and a PhD. They have a remote friendly environment.', 'The role is full time remote and the company is offering a competitive salary comensurate with experience level and qualifications. Candidates for this role are expected to have experience working with deep learning models.', "I am working with an exciting New York AI startup who works on creating Artificial Intelligence algorithms that focuses on a variety of industries such as Movies, Fashion, Traveling, and Hospitality. They use deep learning to gain more knowledge on their customers and their interests. For more than 50 years Qloo's AI has mapped endless amount of cultural correlations and entities while offering personalized insight into different cultures."]

job_title: Lead Data Engineer (New-age Data Platform, Quant Trading)
job_text: ['\xa0', 'Understand of the new data ecosystem and a willingness to bring in new ideas.', 'The culture is best ideas win and it’s a low ego environment, where problem solving and innovation is championed.', 'Pre-Application:', 'Good SQL skills.', 'Experience working in a technology driven firm. Finance experience is not needed!', 'Allow 1-5 working days for a response to any job enquiry.', "This is a technology and data driven firm, where focus is on collaboration and ideas sharing - they have no internal Chinese walls and it's easy to effect change.The culture is best ideas win and it’s a low ego environment, where problem solving and innovation is championed.They are opensource advocates. You'll have the ability to contribute back and be encouraged to attend conferences/meet ups.", 'Evaluate databases for different data formats.', 'Your application is subject to our privacy policy, found here: https://www.thurnpartners.com/privacy-policy', 'Build ETL pipelines using airflow.', "The firm is a quantitative investment manager, operating globally and run primarily from New York. They run fully automated trading strategies and are diversifying the data used in conducting research for systematic trading. The team you'd lead works on systems crucial for fast and reliable quantitative research, from sourcing and integrating new data source to increasing the throughput of existing systems. There are over 150 data scientists that will use what you build. You will build and scale reliable data services with high requirements on data quality and reliability. The focus is on building a reliable, sustainable and scalable global data processing platform.", 'Experience developing web-scrapes, ETL processes and data pipelines.', 'Experience Required:', 'Further Context:', "This is a technology and data driven firm, where focus is on collaboration and ideas sharing - they have no internal Chinese walls and it's easy to effect change.", 'You must be eligible to live and work in the US, without requiring sponsorship.', 'Experience working in a technology driven firm. Finance experience is not needed!Strong coding in Python.Good SQL skills.Experience developing web-scrapes, ETL processes and data pipelines.Understand of the new data ecosystem and a willingness to bring in new ideas.Experience of the following is beneficial, but not a requirement: Google Cloud, AWS, Airflow, Go, CICD, Kubernetes.', "Please do not apply if you're looking for a contract or remote work.", 'Strong coding in Python.', 'Lead a team of 2-3 engineers tasked with sourcing, integrating and cleaning a reliable source of data and make it easy for the researchers to load into their models.', 'Experience of the following is beneficial, but not a requirement: Google Cloud, AWS, Airflow, Go, CICD, Kubernetes.', 'Your Role:', 'Please ensure you meet the required experience section prior to applying.', 'Company Insight:', 'Design reliable web-scrapes with ongoing filtering techniques to ensure data quality. Potentially up to terabytes of information.', "They are opensource advocates. You'll have the ability to contribute back and be encouraged to attend conferences/meet ups.", 'Lead a team of 2-3 engineers tasked with sourcing, integrating and cleaning a reliable source of data and make it easy for the researchers to load into their models.Build ETL pipelines using airflow.Build a system to index and search articles on specific topics and keywords.Design reliable web-scrapes with ongoing filtering techniques to ensure data quality. Potentially up to terabytes of information.Evaluate databases for different data formats.', "Please do not apply if you're looking for a contract or remote work.You must be eligible to live and work in the US, without requiring sponsorship.Please ensure you meet the required experience section prior to applying.Allow 1-5 working days for a response to any job enquiry.Your application is subject to our privacy policy, found here: https://www.thurnpartners.com/privacy-policy", 'Build a system to index and search articles on specific topics and keywords.']

job_title: Machine Learning Engineer (Python, Mandarin, Deep Learning)
job_text: ['', 'We are in a period of rapid growth. This is an opportunity for an ML Engineer to join us at a relatively early stage and apply your skills in a brand-new area of technology that has never been attempted before. If you have experience You will be working on lower-level implementation of deep learning kernels, graph compilers, or training systems this may be the opportunity for you!', 'Machine Learning Engineer (Python, Mandarin, Deep Learning)\xa0', 'An opportunity to work with our collaborative research team on novel work that will revolutionize modern-day computing as we know it.', 'Excellent benefits.', 'What we can offer a Principal Computer Architect:', 'Key skills include: Machine Learning, Machine Learning Engineer, Software Engineer, Programmer, Programming, Engineering, Python, C++, Mandarin, Deep Learning, Deep Learning Kernels, Training Systems, Machine Learning Models, Algorithm Development, Artificial Intelligence', ' ', 'A culture of openness and collaboration – we are all working together under a shared vision.', 'We are a Boston-based MIT spinout who are pioneering within AI Acceleration, photonics, Machine Learning, and optics space. We are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer (Python, Mandarin, Deep Learning)\xa0to come and help solidify the hardware vision of what we are building.', 'As a Machine Learning Engineer, you must fluent in Mandarin, you should ideally have a background or knowledge of digital microarchitecture design, logic, simulation, AI acceleration, or general experience in the semiconductor industry. The ideal candidate will also have strong engineering skills with C++ or Python experience. The mandarin component is a necessity as you will be interfacing with their team that is in China. ', 'A great location in downtown Boston', 'An opportunity to work with our collaborative research team on novel work that will revolutionize modern-day computing as we know it.A culture of openness and collaboration – we are all working together under a shared vision.A great location in downtown BostonExcellent benefits.']

abuse protection product strategy. The focus of the team is to define the product requirements, research the best way to defend against the threat vectors and architect the product to meet the following key requirements: Detection: Detect automated and human fraud / abuse through various methods with high accuracy. The detection must be tightly integrated with the challenge framework so as to adopt the most effective response strategy depending on the risk associated with the request session. The challenge framework is managed by Matt Ford’s Product Challenge organization. Visibility: provide a set of dashboard and reports to customers, partner and our support team to allow them to visualize and analyze the fraud activity detected by the product Serviceability: provide customers the ability tune the detection and response strategy based on the risk score. Also provide customers the ability to craft custom logic to meet their own requirements. The product platform consists of technical product managers and the product research team. The product research team is responsible for coming up with different ways to process data collected on a session in order to differentiate bot from human traffic but also detect human fraud within the human traffic. job_title: Senior Research Data Scientist, Run Research Lab
job_text: ['', 'Provide direction, input and leadership in the research, development and management, implementation and deployment of scalable data analytics vision and machine learning solutions across the organization and to direct reports with the ability to teach and guide.', 'Write code or use specialized development tools to create product features, enhance and/ or customize software components.', '\xa0', 'Translate prototype models to production quality, scaling to runners around the globe.', 'Please see full job description here: https://jobs.lever.co/brooksrunning/20882df6-30ca-4220-b094-6237b62f2c03', 'Identify data quality gaps and work with the data owners to develop solutions and close gaps.\xa0Participate in on-going service delivery, including documentation and ownership of relevant change control requests including evaluation, test, implementation and verification.', 'Experience in optimization problems and operations research modeling tools and techniques (e.g. Linear Programming, Search Algorithms)', 'Partner with leadership on the Data Analytics Services Team with IT, representing the Run Research Lab, providing point of view on key architectural and technical decisions as they apply to Run Research Data, including but not limited to kinetics, kinematics, physiology and runner perception.', 'Able to work across matrix organizations to champion the use and application of human data to product and service innovations', 'Expert knowledge and experience in use of biomechanics systems, working with human subject data collection for analyzing running/ walking gait. 3D Mocap systems: 3D motion capture, kinematic and kinetic models, EMG, plantar pressure systems (Novel), VO2 max required', 'Responsibilities:', 'Engage systems owners to filter, size and prioritize business requests and drive towards appropriate decision points.', 'We are seeking a passionate Senior Research Data Scientist on the Run Research Team to help us build and create the future of the run.\xa0Our mission is to create the most personalized running experiences by developing a holistic view of our runners, deepening our understanding through data and analytics and applying those insights to optimize our products, services and Run Happy experiences for our runners.\xa0From optimizing performance and assessing injury risk to improving the experience on the run, you’ll help establish data pipelines to support and scale our analytics programs that will enable our teams to create amazing products and elevate experience for our runners.', 'Experience in teaching, training and presenting scientific principles to technical and non-technical groups to communicate the Brooks point of view to internal and external stakeholders.', 'Network with industry leaders and participate in key industry functions to communicate Brook’s point of view to help shape the current thinking of data science using human performance and runner perception data to advance research and product performance.\xa0Maintain expert knowledge of development tools, technologies and related delivery methods', 'Manage the Research Data Scientists on your team to execute against their projects and the strategic roadmap at a high level.\xa0Instilling the ability to challenge the status quo, think outside the box, and translate data science findings and concepts into tangible and actionable product advancements.Lead the strategic planning for data science programs and development within the Run Research Lab, working closely with the Senior Managers of the Run Research lab and cross functional leadership to ensure alignment across product initiatives and Data and Analytics servicesManage and evolve Run Research data science initiatives related to human performance and runner perception data that innovate for the runner, collaborating closely with Researchers, Analysts, Developers and Data Analytics Services.Display an expert understanding of data science as it pertains to human movement, runner perception data and the interaction/ application with performance running product.\xa0Collaboratively partner with Data Analytics Services within IT to identify opportunities between software engineering and Run Research, creating prototypes for data science concepts unlike anything else on the market.Manage (including goal setting, performance review, hiring decisions, team culture, etc.) and support the career development of direct reports to ensure job satisfaction, retention and to identify and develop organizational strength.Provide direction, input and leadership in the research, development and management, implementation and deployment of scalable data analytics vision and machine learning solutions across the organization and to direct reports with the ability to teach and guide.Lead the development, management and execution of short and near-term programs critical to the Run Research Lab’s success.\xa0Lead the development and execution of the strategic roadmap.\xa0Partner with leadership on the Data Analytics Services Team with IT, representing the Run Research Lab, providing point of view on key architectural and technical decisions as they apply to Run Research Data, including but not limited to kinetics, kinematics, physiology and runner perception.Lead advancements in data driven decision making for product creation utilizing human performance and subjective perception data as we build for the runner.\xa0Identify new data sources that may bring value to identifying unique attributes of runners related to their running performance and emotional responses to product and the run.\xa0Solve new and hard problems using statistical, Machine Learning, or optimization approaches to create measurable runner facing impact.\xa0Anticipate future data research & methodological opportunities, trends and vulnerabilitiesCollaborate with enterprise and data analytics teams to advance patterns, frameworks, approaches, standards and guidelines for ingestion of human performance and runner perception data.\xa0Decide which data to use to solve problems.\xa0Design experiments leveraging your models to measure effectiveness.Teach, train and present scientific principles related to data science using human movement and runner perception data and their relationship to product performance.\xa0Present to technical and non-technical groups, clearly communicating the Brooks point of view and sharing the learnings and application of findings to our products and the run.Translate prototype models to production quality, scaling to runners around the globe.Clean, prepare and optimize data at scale including interfaces between Brooks and third-party systems to enable real time data preparation and analysis.Collaborate with software engineering, product management and other appropriate data owners and key stakeholders including Research, Assessment, Run Sights, Product Creation and IT (Data & Analytics) to define requirements for data and analytics to develop solutions that utilize the highest standards of statistical rigor and data integrity.Identify data quality gaps and work with the data owners to develop solutions and close gaps.\xa0Participate in on-going service delivery, including documentation and ownership of relevant change control requests including evaluation, test, implementation and verification.Write code or use specialized development tools to create product features, enhance and/ or customize software components.Engage systems owners to filter, size and prioritize business requests and drive towards appropriate decision points.Liaise with enterprise data and analytics teams to develop, evolve and manage data using defined patterns, frameworks, approaches, standard and guidelines.\xa0Coordinate and conduct application testing (New support packages, releases, functionality and customizing) in close cooperation with the data enterprise team.\xa0Troubleshoot data issues and perform root cause analysis to proactively resolve product and operational issuesNetwork with industry leaders and participate in key industry functions to communicate Brook’s point of view to help shape the current thinking of data science using human performance and runner perception data to advance research and product performance.\xa0Maintain expert knowledge of development tools, technologies and related delivery methodsAble to work across matrix organizations to champion the use and application of human data to product and service innovations', 'Proven track record of successfully delivering impactful results to the business and creating innovative data science initiatives that enhance the understanding of human performance that can be applied to products', 'Ph.D. in an analytical area such as data science, computer science, statistics, mathematics or applicable engineering fields with a background in biomechanics, kinesiology, engineering, exercise science or an equivalent analytical field plus 5+ years of relevant work experience.', 'Lead the strategic planning for data science programs and development within the Run Research Lab, working closely with the Senior Managers of the Run Research lab and cross functional leadership to ensure alignment across product initiatives and Data and Analytics services', '3+ years of experience in managing, mentoring and leading direct reports', 'Liaise with enterprise data and analytics teams to develop, evolve and manage cooperation with the data enterprise team.\xa0Troubleshoot data issues and perform root cause analysis to proactively resolve product and operational issues', 'Experience using analytics to interpret and leverage human movement and behavior data sets to identify opportunities and applying them to innovative products for the runner', 'Manage the Research Data Scientists on your team to execute standards of statistical rigor and data integrity.', 'Solve new and hard problems using statistical, Machine Learning, or optimization approaches to create measurable runner facing preferably in the lab based setting', 'Evidence of using relevant statistical measures such as confidence intervals, significance or error measurements, development and evaluation data sets, etc. in with cross-functional teams', 'Manage and evolve Run Research data science initiatives related to human performance and runner perception data that innovate for the runner, collaborating closely with Researchers, Analysts, Developers and Data Analytics Services.', 'Your Role:', 'Expert understanding of anatomy, physiology, biomechanics or running, biomechanical principles and experimental design If so, then come join us.', 'Job Demands: ', 'We want hard working team players. You’ll have the independence to learn, lead and drive change. A culture of extraordinary service, empowerment and stability—that’s the First Republic way. Come join us!', 'Follows automate-first/automate-everything philosophy.', 'As part of Digital Technology Team - Design, Develop and document micro service\xa0 and system components consisting of several objects working together to execute an business\xa0 function of the larger system. Interact with software architects or other Business /technical leader to understand subsystem and component specifications and recommend changes to facilitate efficient and effective development. Interact with representatives of other cross functional teams to understand and/or recommend requirements and strategies for the project.', 'Experience with following Data Engineering languages and technologies - AWS Glue, Python, PySpark, Spark, Informatica, Git, JenkinsCI.', 'Overall knowledge of the computing environment at large, e.g. typical uses and user populations of operating systems, communications protocols, hardware platforms, etc.', 'Adequate hands on experience with data modeling, locks, database concurrency.', 'Proficient with software Architecture, design patterns and strong demonstrated experience in building frameworks.', 'Implement and debug subsystems/micro service and components.', 'Must be able to review and analyze data reports and manuals; must be computer proficient.Must be able to communicate effectively via telephone and in person.', 'Develops code and test artifacts that reuse subroutines or objects, is well structured, backed by automated tests, includes sufficient comments and is easy to maintain.', 'Experienced across programming languages, patterns and data structures.', 'Hands on in multiple programming paradigms, not limited to Object Oriented.', 'Required Skills/Experience', 'You could be a great fit if you have:', 'Determine and communicate the implications of system-level decisions on subsystems and Components, and help determine how best to mitigate or take advantage of these implications.', 'Strong computer science background including distributed computing.', 'Own your work and your career - apply now', 'Preferred Skills/Experience', 'DW concepts.', 'Willingness and Ability to learn new technologies.', 'SQL Server, ORACLE, PostgreSQL, Stored Procedure. ', 'Incredible teams doing exceptional work, every day', 'In Technology, we support First Republic’s employees and clients through the acquisition, integration and management of the Bank’s information technology systems and services. We drive innovation and explore emerging technologies so our people can be productive and focus on what matters most - providing extraordinary service. ', 'AWS Technologies - S3, AWS Glue, RDS, lambda, cloud watch, etc.', 'Excellent diagnostic and troubleshooting skills, problem solving, and an ability to learn quickly.', 'Must be able to review and analyze data reports and manuals; must be computer proficient.', '.', '5+ years IT-Software/ Software products.Bachelors in Science - Computer Science or equivalent.Experience with following Data Engineering languages and technologies - AWS Glue, Python, PySpark, Spark, Informatica, Git, JenkinsCI.SQL Server, ORACLE, PostgreSQL, Stored Procedure. AWS Technologies - S3, AWS Glue, RDS, lambda, cloud watch, etc.DW concepts.Kafka and Spark Streaming is nice to have.', 'First Republic is subject to federal laws that restrict the employment of individuals with certain types of criminal histories, including FDIA Section 19 and FINRA. To the extent not inconsistent with our obligations under those federal laws and regulations, First Republic will consider qualified candidates with criminal histories in a manner consistent with the Los Angeles and San Francisco ban-the-box laws.', 'At First Republic, we care about our people. Founded in 1985, we offer extraordinary client service in private banking, private business banking and private wealth management. We believe that personal connections are everything and our success is driven by the relationships we form with our colleagues and clients. You’ll always feel empowered and valued here.\xa0 ', 'Must be able to communicate effectively via telephone and in person.', 'Self-motivated, thorough, and methodical.', 'Participate in integrated test sessions of components and subsystems on test and production servers.', 'Work independently to implement solutions on multiple platform (DEV, QA, UAT, PROD).', 'Good exposure of software development life cycle, development process flow and their tools usage.', 'Good knowledge of software development tools and methodologies.', 'This job description is not intended to be all-inclusive. Employee may perform other related duties as assigned to meet the ongoing needs of the organization. The Company is an equal opportunity employer. In this regard, the Company makes reasonable accommodations for qualified applicants and employees with disabilities in order to enable them to perform all essential job functions, unless doing so creates an undue hardship.', 'Data Engineer:', 'Applied knowledge of Object Orientated programming concept (OOPS), Operating System (OS) concept.', 'Good knowledge of secure coding practices is a plus.', 'Perform tasks efficiently and work together with team to ensure project success.', '5+ years IT-Software/ Software products.', 'Kafka and Spark Streaming is nice to have.', 'Bachelors in Science - Computer Science or equivalent.', 'Work with the business and IT team to understand business problems, and to design, implement, and deliver an appropriate solution using Agile methodology across the larger program.', 'Provide technical direction, leadership, and reviews to other engineers working on the same project.', 'Support management of the team’s technical infrastructure (e.g., repository, build system, testing system) under guidance from the systems engineer or another project leader.', 'Must be aware of Agile, Incremental or spiral development methodology.']

['', "• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, or related subject area.", '• You thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment', '• You’re familiar with Agile practices and methodologies', '• 6+ years of professional data engineering experience focused on batch and real-time data pipelines', '• Participate in business analysis activities to gather the required reporting and dashboard requirements.', "Use your data engineering and analytics experience to transform a dynamic sales organization at a Fortune 200 Company with some of the most iconic brands! Do you have a bachelor's degree along with 6 plus years of data engineering, have experience with Power BI, and want to drive the strategy to help the business make better decisions?\xa0If so, we want to discuss the\xa0Lead Data Engineer - Sales Analytics\xa0position that we are looking to fill in our Information Services group in\xa0Richmond, VA.", '• Build, use, and maintain effective relationships across the technical and business community.', '• Be the Technical Lead resource for a variety of information projects that will be decided by current business needs and technological developments', '• You are confident in running and executing projects multi-functionally with various partners from start to finish', '• Hands-on experience in defining and implementing Power BI reports; data modeling, analysis, programming', "Use your data engineering and analytics experience to transform a dynamic sales organization at a Fortune 200 Company with some of the most iconic brands! Do you have a bachelor's degree along with 6 plus years of data engineering, have experience with Power BI, and want to drive the strategy to help the business make better decisions?", '• Document and communicate ‘best practices’ for optimum performance and maintainability.', '• We prefer that you have worked with Salesforce.com and Power BI integration, along with data visualization experience', 'We want you to have:', '• Advanced skills in Microsoft Excel', '• Provide clear/concise communication on application issues, projects, and infrastructure statuses.', '• Assess technical infrastructure and processes, identifying potential risks, and recommending corrective action.', 'Lead Data Engineer - Sales Analytics', '• Developed BI applications, delivered BI infrastructure, and built standard methodologies', '• Support the design and implementation of data integration across data analytics infrastructures.', '• Quickly gather a deep understanding of business needs and translate them into technology solutions.', 'Richmond, VA.', '• Define, develop, and implement dashboards and reports using Power BI.', '• Perform activities relating to analysis, evaluation, building, programming, testing, correcting, implementing, operating, or supporting existing and planned IT products and processes.', '• Demonstrated ability and passion for dissecting/solving problems with a fact-based, data-driven, detailed, and creative approach', '• Run and participate in cross-discipline IT project delivery teams', 'In this role, you will:', '• Support existing dashboards in production.', '• Conduct data exploration and identify approaches for model development and feature definition.', '• A sound understanding of BI concepts and proven success in working with different technologies (including new software tools and systems implementations) and are able to learn, set up, and champion new and outstanding technology', '• A strong desire to explore and learn Data science related technologies. Proactive in identifying uses-case and solutions', '• Experience as an authority in SQL with comprehensive knowledge of Spark, Java, and/or Python']
