job_title: Research Scientist – Advanced ML – DL Methods and Learning Frameworks
job_text: ['', ' By choice, we are an Equal Opportunity Employer committed to a culturally diverse workforce. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, religion, color, age, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability status or protected veteran status.', "Passionate about staying abreast of challenges and exciting changes in ML and DL and their real time realizations for quickly establishing applicability to Ford engineering problems in order to build/contribute to the Ford's strategic and leadership vision", 'Create end-to-end workflow for integrating various aspects of a ML-based solution architecture in a full design cycle that includes data preparation (including augmentation), model selection, robustness checks and model compression for deployment', 'Develop a research portfolio and lead research, development and progression of state-of-the-art concepts in ML-DL related to multimodal perception and the generation of contextual information for forward use in customer facing applications', ' If you have what it takes to help us redefine the future of mobility, we would love to have you join us.', 'Partner with multidisciplinary teams within Research, Product Development, Manufacturing and other organizations to transform research solutions into practical product level embedded solutions', 'Experience with one or more cloud computing tools (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, etc.)', ' As part of the Ford family, you will enjoy excellent compensation and a comprehensive benefits package that includes generous PTO, retirement, savings and stock investment plans, incentive compensation and much more. You will also experience exciting opportunities for professional and personal growth and recognition.', 'Innovative thinker and quick learner with the ability to identify, propose and lead new research projects', "Master's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Physics or Robotics", "PhD in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Physics or RoboticsExperience with one or more cloud computing tools (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, etc.)Software development and architecting experience creating ML pipelines at scaleExperience with AutoML type frameworksProficiency with Mathworks ML-DL librariesBackground implementing AI-ML algorithms on resource constrained edge devices such as on inferencing systems NVDIA(TX-), NXP (Tree-Runner) etc.Exceptional communication, teamwork and problem-solving skillsInnovative thinker and quick learner with the ability to identify, propose and lead new research projectsPassionate about staying abreast of challenges and exciting changes in ML and DL and their real time realizations for quickly establishing applicability to Ford engineering problems in order to build/contribute to the Ford's strategic and leadership vision", 'What you will be able to do', 'A year or more of experience (academic research and/or industry) in Object Oriented Programming/Functional Programming for architecting scalable research oriented development frameworks and workflows', 'Experience with AutoML type frameworks', "Develop through, self-learning and deep research, new mathematical formulations and learning architectures as may become necessary when dealing with atypical/new problem statements. This will often require the synthesis of ML/DL research problem statements in conjunction with SME's and academia to seek out novel applications through re-purposing and/or discovery", 'Our preferred requirements', 'What you will receive in return', 'Proficiency with Mathworks ML-DL libraries', 'Software development and architecting experience creating ML pipelines at scale', 'At least one year of experience (academic research and/or industry) in DL for one or more application areas including Vision, NLP, Human-Machine Interactions and/or Digital Assistants', 'Exceptional communication, teamwork and problem-solving skills', 'PhD in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Physics or Robotics', 'Background implementing AI-ML algorithms on resource constrained edge devices such as on inferencing systems NVDIA(TX-), NXP (Tree-Runner) etc.', 'Publish internally and engage in internal knowledge dissemination', "Master's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Physics or RoboticsAt least one year of experience (academic research and/or industry) in DL for one or more application areas including Vision, NLP, Human-Machine Interactions and/or Digital AssistantsOne or more years (academic research and/or industry) in developing with Python and a common DL framework (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, Caffe etc.)One plus year of experience (academic research and/or industry) working with Databases and Big Data tools such as Apache, Mongo, Tableau etc.A year or more of experience (academic research and/or industry) in Object Oriented Programming/Functional Programming for architecting scalable research oriented development frameworks and workflows", 'The minimum requirements we seek', "At Ford Motor Company, we believe freedom of movement drives human progress. We also believe in providing you with the freedom to define and realize your dreams. With our incredible plans for the future of mobility, we have a wide variety of opportunities for you to accelerate your career potential as you help us define tomorrow's transportation.", " Ford's Research and Advanced Engineering team explores new vehicle and societal innovations that require some level of invention before they can be applied to our products and services. The team is building on a history of Ford innovation, including our invention of the three-way catalytic converter to modernize vehicle emissions controls in the 1970s and the world's first rear inflatable seat belts in 2010.", 'One or more years (academic research and/or industry) in developing with Python and a common DL framework (TensorFlow, PyTorch, Keras, Caffe etc.)', " The Core Artificial Intelligence-Machine Learning (AI-ML) research group, within Ford's Research and Advanced Engineering area, is driving the discovery and implementation of AI-ML across all engineering functions within the Ford product landscape. Our exciting work requires highly qualified and motivated individuals who are ready to take on ambitious, multi-functional problems that require diligent research and out-of-the-box thinking.", ' Visa sponsorship may be available for this position.', 'One plus year of experience (academic research and/or industry) working with Databases and Big Data tools such as Apache, Mongo, Tableau etc.', " As part of the Core AI-ML team, you'll conduct novel research to advance deep learning (DL) in such areas as vision, speech, decisioning and guidance, robotics, etc. You'll be able to leverage your expertise in software development to craft end-to-end design frameworks for model development, training and deployment. The position involves collaborating with leading researchers in academia, national labs and industry and actively generating intellectual property and publications. You will:", " Today, we are exploring and delivering ways to make smarter vehicles and our transportation system more efficient to improve people's lives by helping them move more freely, safely and enjoyably. For example, we are changing how our products are made by creating high-quality vehicles in an environmentally and socially responsible way, including the use sustainable materials. Since 2000, we have used 12 industry and world-first plant-based materials in our production vehicles. We also are researching the possible use of tomato skin, bamboo, agave fiber, dandelion roots, algae and coffee chaff as part of our ambitious goal of making our vehicles with up of 20 percent sustainable material by 2025.", "Develop a research portfolio and lead research, development and progression of state-of-the-art concepts in ML-DL related to multimodal perception and the generation of contextual information for forward use in customer facing applicationsCreate end-to-end workflow for integrating various aspects of a ML-based solution architecture in a full design cycle that includes data preparation (including augmentation), model selection, robustness checks and model compression for deploymentDevelop through, self-learning and deep research, new mathematical formulations and learning architectures as may become necessary when dealing with atypical/new problem statements. This will often require the synthesis of ML/DL research problem statements in conjunction with SME's and academia to seek out novel applications through re-purposing and/or discoveryPartner with multidisciplinary teams within Research, Product Development, Manufacturing and other organizations to transform research solutions into practical product level embedded solutionsCollaborate with application engineers to validate solutions against real-world application benchmarks for quality, robustness and continuous improvementPresent at respected conferences and publish in high-impact peer reviewed journalsPublish internally and engage in internal knowledge dissemination", 'Present at respected conferences and publish in high-impact peer reviewed journals', 'Collaborate with application engineers to validate solutions against real-world application benchmarks for quality, robustness and continuous improvement']

['', 'At Lineage\xa0Logistics, our six values help guide how we behave and define what we hold most important: Safe, Trust, Respect, Innovation, Bold, Servant Leadership. We all play a position that is key to the company’s success. Join our Human Resources team that is growing both domestically and internationally.', 'promotions', 'About the Team', 'Preferred qualifications of the Data Engineer:', 'Support the automation of data quality checks and seek to investigate and resolve related issues by debugging all aspects of the data pipeline and correcting problematic data', 'Mentor and provide guidance especially to other technical resources', 'Assist with the creation, modification, and tuning of queries against enterprise data assets including a Cloudera-based data lake and a RDBMS-based operational data storeSupport the automation of data quality checks and seek to investigate and resolve related issues by debugging all aspects of the data pipeline and correcting problematic dataEnsure key data assets are accurate, comprehensive, and availableValidate changes to data pipelines including supporting the code promotion flow from non-production to production environmentsReview the work of data wrangling and ETL resources to ensure accuracy, completeness, and performanceDocument data assets to facilitate ongoing development, end user reporting, etc.Collaborate with others to solve complex problems and resolve technological disagreements with informed, rational, practical solutionsMentor and provide guidance especially to other technical resources', 'Thorough knowledge of data technologies and techniques', 'This is an excellent position to\xa0begin your career path within Lineage! Success in this role enables greater responsibilities and\xa0promotions! A career at Lineage starts with learning about our business and how each team member plays a part each and every day to satisfy our customers’ requirements. Beyond that, you’ll help us grow and learn on our journey to be the very best employer in our industry. We’ll ask you for your opinion and ensure we do our part to keep you developing and engaged as we grow our business. Working at Lineage is energizing and enjoyable. Like being with friends, we understand respect and care about our team members. We believe in keeping you informed whether it’s at our daily start-up shift meetings, or our annual team member opinion survey - we want our team together and aligned.', 'Assist with the creation, modification, and tuning of queries against enterprise data assets including a Cloudera-based data lake and a RDBMS-based operational data store', 'Collaborate with others to solve complex problems and resolve technological disagreements with informed, rational, practical solutions', 'Lineage Logistics is a warehousing and logistics partner committed to delivering sophisticated, customized, and dependable cold chain solutions to leading food, retail, agriculture and distribution companies. We serve customers who put a premium on excellence and reliability to ensure our nation’s food supply is handled, stored and delivered safely and securely through the entire supply chain.', 'Demonstrable knowledge of common database, data lake, and business intelligence technologies - e.g. PostgreSQL, Cloudera, and Jaspersoft', '4+ years of direct data management experience including at least 2 years spent implementing and supporting data pipelines', 'Document data assets to facilitate ongoing development, end user reporting, etc.', 'As a company, Lineage builds state-of-the-art systems to make our employees productive, to meet and exceed our customers’ expectations, to assist in our growth, and to create an operating platform that enables Lineage to achieve its vision of transforming the food supply chain. This is a critical role in that journey, and it will require someone who has a true passion for data and associated technologies.', 'About Lineage Logistics', 'Responsibilities of the Data Engineer:', 'Please note: our interview process is designed to comply with CDC recommendations. Your safety is of the utmost importance to us', 'Required qualifications of the Data Engineer:', 'At Lineage, we have a shared purpose: We are transforming the food supply chain to eliminate waste and help feed the world. Lineage Logistics is the industry’s leading innovator in temperature-controlled supply chain and logistics. Lineage’s expertise in end-to-end logistical solutions, its unrivaled real estate network, and its use of technology combine to promote food safety, increase distribution efficiency, advance sustainability, lessen environmental impact, and minimize supply chain waste. As a result, Lineage helps customers ranging from Fortune 500 companies to small family-owned businesses increase the efficiency and protect the integrity of their temperature-controlled supply chain. In pursuit of this shared purpose we are working to build a world class IT team.', 'Lineage Logistics offers comprehensive benefits including health, dental, vision, 401(k), paid time off and more. Join a team that is growing both domestically and internationally.', 'begin your career path within Lineage', 'Ability to handle multiple assignments/projects simultaneously', 'Lineage Logistics is currently seeking a Data Engineer to join the team. As our Data Engineer, you will be responsible for the ongoing quality, completeness, and performance of key data assets that store and surface data for use cases both inside and outside the organization. As the world’s largest temperature-controlled logistics organization, our supply chain data - especially the data collected from our warehouse and transportation operations - provides the foundation upon which we deliver our services and is critical to both our effectiveness and our sustained leadership position in the industry. This hands-on position requires excellent technical skills including deep knowledge of SQL and associated query tuning, experience with ETL tools and approaches, and comfort with code management.', 'Why Lineage', 'Validate changes to data pipelines including supporting the code promotion flow from non-production to production environments', 'Ensure key data assets are accurate, comprehensive, and available', 'Prior software development experienceKnowledge of supply chain concepts and associated technologies including WMS, TMS, YMS, and related system', '\ufeffBenefits', 'Prior software development experience', 'At Lineage, the aim is not to build the largest IT group; instead we are creating a small, highly skilled team that focuses on having right mix of talents, skills, and the capacity to learn in areas that define our core differentiation. We leverage cloud services, best-of-breed technologies, and external teams to augment our capabilities with sufficient capacity. This means that in addition to being a great technologist and individual contributor, an ideal candidate will need to be able to review and collaborate with others - both internal and external - to ensure that we are collectively able to deliver.', 'Excellent verbal and written communication skills including the ability to explain technical concepts to business leaders', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or IT Management and/or 6+ years of relevant work experience', 'Review the work of data wrangling and ETL resources to ensure accuracy, completeness, and performance', 'Knowledge of supply chain concepts and associated technologies including WMS, TMS, YMS, and related system', 'Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or IT Management and/or 6+ years of relevant work experience4+ years of direct data management experience including at least 2 years spent implementing and supporting data pipelinesDemonstrable knowledge of common database, data lake, and business intelligence technologies - e.g. PostgreSQL, Cloudera, and JaspersoftThorough knowledge of data technologies and techniquesAbility to handle multiple assignments/projects simultaneouslyExcellent verbal and written communication skills including the ability to explain technical concepts to business leaders']

['', '-\xa0Designs data integrations and data quality framework', '-\xa0Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring and familiarity with a variety of databases', '-\xa0Strong skills with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, C++, Scala, etc\xa0', 'ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:\xa0', '-\xa0Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement', '-\xa0Supports software developers, database architect, and data analysts on data initiatives and ensures optimal data delivery architecture is consistent throughout ongoing projects', '-\xa05+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role, Graduate degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field. IBM Certified Data Engineer or Google Certified Professional desired.', '-\xa0Experience with database design principals including relationships and normalization, database structures, indexes and views and analyzing requirements and purpose of the database', '-\xa0Designs and evaluates open source and vendor tools for data lineage', 'SUPERVISORY RESPONSIBILITIES:\xa0', '-\xa0Implements processes and systems to monitor data quality, ensuring production data is always accurate and available for key stakeholders and business processes\xa0', '-\xa0Develops and maintains scalable data pipelines and builds out new API integrations to support continuing increases in data volume and complexity', '• This job has no supervisory responsibilities.\xa0', '-\xa0Experience working with healthcare data including HL7, CCDAs, Intersystems HealthShare and Cache databases', '-\xa0Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable ‘big data’ data stores', '-\xa0Works closely with a team of frontend and backend engineers, product managers, and analysts', "We're seeking a Data Engineer with heathcare industry experience for a FTE opportunity located in New York City.\xa0This position will be remote until about March 2021 and then will be onsite.\xa0Must have HL7 experience and extensive knowledge of EHR/EMR language. Some programming experience. Experience handling big data.", 'The Data Engineer provides the foundation for analytics, namely the collection, quality assurance and availability of data. This IT role requires a significant set of technical skills, including a deep knowledge of SQL database design and multiple programming languages as well as communication skills to understand what data and analysis the healthcare analysts want to gain from data stores. They are responsible for the maintenance, improvement, cleansing and manipulation of data in the organization’s operational and analytics databases. The Data Engineer defines and builds data pipelines to orchestrate the movement, transformation, validation, and loading of data from the source to the final destination – data stores defined and implemented based on system requirements and data consumer requirements.\xa0', '-\xa0Must be self-directed and comfortable supporting the data needs of multiple teams, systems and products', '-\xa0Ability to architect end-to-end ETL pipelines', 'QUALIFICATIONS:\xa0', '-\xa0Excellent documentation and verbal communication skills. Ability to communicate technical vision in clear terms to peers as well as outside of the engineering/development team', 'POSITION SUMMARY:\xa0', '-\xa0Responsible for expanding and optimizing data and data pipeline architecture, as well as optimizing data flow and collection\xa0', '-\xa0Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures and data sets', '-\xa0Writes unit/integration tests, contributes to Confluence, and documents work', '-\xa0Experience with AWS Services', '-\xa0Collaborates with analytics and business teams to improve data models that feed business intelligence tools, increasing data accessibility\xa0', '-\xa0Strong analytic skills', '-\xa0Contributes to definition of company data assets (data models), and processes to populate data models', '-\xa0Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases', '-\xa0Experience building processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management', '-\xa0Responsible for optimizing or re-designing data architecture to support the next generation of products and data initiatives', '-\xa0Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc', '-\xa0Performs data analysis required to troubleshoot data related issues and assist in the resolution of data issues', '-\xa0Works closely with all business units and engineering teams to develop strategy for long term data platform architecture', 'Typical tasks performed include working with the data architect on data warehouse design, ensuring data loads quickly, is easily accessible and rapidly comprehensible for analysts/users; extract, transform, and load (ETL) processing; performing thorough testing and validation in order to support the accuracy of data transformations and data verification to ensure correctness and that data is generally reliable for downstream consumption; data bounds checking and database tuning.\xa0', '-\xa0Contribute to development of a rapidly growing, integrated data warehouse that will provide a complete vision of the entire healthcare landscape\xa0', 'Local candidates to apply.', 'The Data Engineer strives to ensure proper data governance and quality for the Data Strategy team and the entire organization. They analyze complex data elements and systems, data flow, dependencies, and relationships in order to contribute to conceptual physical and logical data models. They work collaboratively with the Data Strategy team, providing support for their data centric needs. The candidate has strong working and conceptual knowledge of building and maintaining physical and logical data models and will also have system management expertise with server and database tuning, query, multidimensional query and index tuning, monitoring, disaster recovery, backup, automated testing, automated schema migration, and continuous deployment.', '-\xa0Strong quantitative, analytical, process development, facilitation and organizational skills required', '-\xa0Experience with BI Tools e.g. Tableau']

job_title: Core Data Engineer | Elite Leading Hedge Fund
job_text: ['', 'Troubleshoot, create, and maintain scripts in Python and Powershell', 'Core Data Engineer | Elite Leading Hedge Fund', 'BS/MS in Computer Science/Computer Engineering or a related field from a top university preferredMust have experience with majority of the following: SQL, Python, Bamboo, GIT, PowershellPreferred working experience within the finance industry', 'Qualifications:', 'Preferred working experience within the finance industry', 'Communicate daily with traders, department heads and other engineers', 'The team is growing, but its flat structure and collaborative culture will still allow you the chance to work directly with Head of Data and other senior individuals across several departments. This is an opportunity to work in a fast-paced environment, solving complex data challenges and interacting with traders and other investment professionals on a day to day basis. ', 'Must have experience with majority of the following: SQL, Python, Bamboo, GIT, Powershell', 'BS/MS in Computer Science/Computer Engineering or a related field from a top university preferred', 'Responsibilities: ', 'Develop and maintain data feeds', 'Location: Remote, East Coast ', 'Develop and maintain data feedsTroubleshoot, create, and maintain scripts in Python and PowershellCommunicate daily with traders, department heads and other engineers', 'Our client, an elite hedge fund who has seen incredible growth over the last few quarters, is seeking a highly skilled data engineer to join their East Coast technology team. This position can be fully remote, but they have a preference for candidates who are in the same time zone. ']

deliver results on-timeAbility to communicate complex ideas to non-technical stakeholders and alternate between big-picture and implementation.Excellent problem solving and critical thinking skills', 'Basic Qualifications:', 'Today, unfortunately, financial management and services are universally manual, tedious, and error prone. At the same time, these processes often follow welldefined rules, abide by industry standardization, and have become increasingly data-rich. Our team, within the Medium Segment Native Cloud Solutions at Sage, builds cloud-based AI-powered features and products that fundamentally change the way businesses operate.', 'Bachelor’s degree, preferably in a field that requires data management and manipulation (e.g. statistics, applied math, computer science, or a science field with direct statistics applications)', 'Every business on Earth must, in some way, do bookkeeping, accounting, and financial planning to operate. At the outset, these functions may seem like mundane facts-of-life in the process of running a business; however, the skill with which a company does them can have a profound impact not only on their business, but also the world. A poorly forecasted budget, could mean the abrupt end to the clinical trial of a potentially life-saving drug. On the other hand, a highly accurate hiring plan can lead to successful team growth that allows a company to design a brand-new material that helps reverse climate change.', 'Excellent problem solving and critical thinking skills', 'Creating tools for establishing common data management patterns across our team and beyond', 'Hands-on experience with one or more ML pipeline automation frameworks — MLFlow, Kubeflow, or TFX.', 'Fluent in data fundamentals: SQL, data management, and data manipulation using a procedural language', 'You’re comfortable with investigating open-ended problems and coming up with concrete approaches to solve them.', 'You have deep experience with these things: data warehousing, schema management, timeseries datasets, data validation, synthetic data generation, serialization protocols, data privacy and security', 'Designing, implementing, and operating pipelines that deliver data with measurable quality and SLOsCreating tools for establishing common data management patterns across our team and beyondWriting production-quality code to support our data pipelines and machine learning systemsInforming our strategy for data governance, security, privacy, quality, and retentionWorking with our AI Infrastructure team to extend our capabilities , curate new data sets, and manage the data that drives our machine learning platformWorking with ML Engineers and data scientists to refine and specify data products that satisfy business policies and requirementsExploratory data analyses and investigations', 'Writing production-quality code to support our data pipelines and machine learning systems', 'Working with our AI Infrastructure team to extend our capabilities , curate new data sets, and manage the data that drives our machine learning platform', 'You often think about applications of machine learning in your personal life.', 'Experience developing and operating machine learning pipelines with Kubeflow or ArgoHands-on experience with one or more ML pipeline automation frameworks — MLFlow, Kubeflow, or TFX.Advanced SQL skills either for DB management or analysisYou have deep experience with these things: data warehousing, schema management, timeseries datasets, data validation, synthetic data generation, serialization protocols, data privacy and security', 'Working with ML Engineers and data scientists to refine and specify data products that satisfy business policies and requirements', 'Ability to communicate complex ideas to non-technical stakeholders and alternate between big-picture and implementation.', 'You’re a deeply curious person.', 'Ability to work independently and deliver results on-time', 'You may be a fit for this role if:', 'Strong quantitative and analytical skills with minimum 4 years of experience with building data-intensive applications,familiarity with the scientific Python toolset: numpy, scipy, sklearn, etc.experience with one or more workflow management technology: airflow, argo, etc.Experience building and operating cloud infrastructure, preferably on AWS', 'experience with one or more workflow management technology: airflow, argo, etc.', 'Deep understanding of relational as well as big data techniques and technologies (e.g. Postgres/mysql, spark, data warehousing (s3, Redshift, Snowflake, etc.))', 'You will have an opportunity to work on a small and growing team in an environment where data engineering and ML are central to our success. The products we build are breaking new ground, and we have a focus on providing the best environment to allow you to do what you do best - solve problems, collaborate with your team, and push first class software. We promote an open diverse environment, encourage contributions to open-source software and invest heavily in our staff. Our team is talented, capable and inclusive. We know that great things can only be done with great teams and look forward to building and working with a great people.', 'Experience developing and operating machine learning pipelines with Kubeflow or Argo', 'You’re comfortable with investigating open-ended problems and coming up with concrete approaches to solve them.You’re a deeply curious person.You can wrangle data like a pro alligator wrestler and come out relatively unscathed.You often think about applications of machine learning in your personal life.']

['', 'Is committed to advancing our tools, technology and ways of working.', '5+ direct experience is user experience research role', "We're guided by a common purpose: to help make lives better by connecting our internal users with the tools and resources they need to be successful. Our Enterprise Experience Design (EXD) team includes a wide skill set including strategic, interaction, visual design and research with a core team who are constantly iterating, problem solving, and collaborating to create experiences that will help our users do their best work in more customized, intuitive, innovative, engaging, secure, and time-saving ways.", 'Owns your schedule and delivers on time', 'NOT Open to C2C or Margin Sharing. My client is unable to offer sponsorship at this time.', 'Bachelors or Masters in Human Factors, Human-Computer Interaction (HCI), User Experience, Usability Engineering, Experimental Psychology or related field, or equivalent education and related training / certification.Financial or similar industry experienceExperience with user-centered design research methodologies and rapid ideation processes such as Lean XD, Design Sprints and Agile methodologies.', 'A researcher is involved in all aspects of the experience design process from context-based research and presenting to internal clients, senior stakeholders and team members alike.', 'Embraces the opportunity to work in an office while collaborating with teammates and partners in other locations (not remote)', 'Should have experience in enterprise wide planning and executing of appropriate user research methodologies. A UXR needs to have strong foundation of overall user-centered design process along with excellent empathetic user research, data analysis and accessibility skills.', 'Collaborate with design team to conduct design research to enhance UI Standards & Design Pattern library.', 'Plan, execute and analyze user research studies with ability to flexibly scale them across desktop and mobile devices.', 'Work closely with UX strategists, designers and fellow researchers to provide research expertise and support during workshops and ongoing UX activities.', 'Provides continuous training and developmental opportunities to help employees achieve their goals, whatever their background or experience.', "You're a person who has:", 'Elicit user needs and usability concerns through various research methods, such as interviews, surveys, usability testing, task analysis, contextual inquires, ethnographic studies, & card sorting.', 'Synthesize research data, summarize findings & present results to management and project teams for both strategic and project level insight.', 'Experience with user-centered design research methodologies and rapid ideation processes such as Lean XD, Design Sprints and Agile methodologies.', 'Bachelors or Masters in Human Factors, Human-Computer Interaction (HCI), User Experience, Usability Engineering, Experimental Psychology or related field, or equivalent education and related training / certification.', 'Interpret qualitative and quantitative data from web analytics, user research data, trends and patterns to create actionable recommendations at project and portfolio level.', 'Evaluate and evolve user models (personas, scenarios, profiles).', 'Experience / proficiency with tools like Userzoom, Excel, Mural, Axure, Sketch, Invision, and alike.', 'Perform heuristic evaluation, accessibility reviews and testing of applications and make concrete recommendations for improving their usability.', 'Provide rapid prototyping support to communicate concepts/designs recommendations based on research conducted.', 'Has organizational skills to manage multiple projects, shifting priorities, demands and timelines.', 'This position is for a researcher with user-first mindset, who has the passion for stepping in users shoe and understanding their needs and bridge the gap between users mental model and business goals.', 'You will', "We're a culture that", 'Is committed to building a workplace where every employee is welcomed and given the support and resources to build and advance their careers. Along with taking care of our clients we want to be a great place for people to work, and we strive to create an environment where all employees have the opportunity to achieve their goals.', 'Collaborates and builds trust with design, product, and tech partners', 'Extensive understanding of overall UX process and software development methodologies.', 'Deeply empathetic and passionate about understanding target audience.', 'And you are a person who:', 'Believes diversity makes us stronger so we can reflect, connect to and meet the diverse needs of our clients around the world.', 'Experience / proficiency in experimental design and statistics and Section 508 / Accessibility training and certification will be considered a plus.', 'Financial or similar industry experience', 'Collaborate with stakeholders to define & refine research objectives and ensure alignment with strategic, business and user goals.', 'Has organizational skills to manage multiple projects, shifting priorities, demands and timelines.Deeply empathetic and passionate about understanding target audience.Is an enthusiastic, highly motivated self-starter with a strong work ethic and an intense focus on achieving resultsCollaborates and builds trust with design, product, and tech partnersProactively seeks out partnershipsOwns your schedule and delivers on timeEmbraces the opportunity to work in an office while collaborating with teammates and partners in other locations (not remote)', '5+ direct experience is user experience research roleExtensive understanding of overall UX process and software development methodologies.Experience / proficiency with tools like Userzoom, Excel, Mural, Axure, Sketch, Invision, and alike.Experience / proficiency in experimental design and statistics and Section 508 / Accessibility training and certification will be considered a plus.Experience in designing for mobile applications, responsive, and other digital interfaces', 'Plan, execute and analyze user research studies with ability to flexibly scale them across desktop and mobile devices.Collaborate with stakeholders to define & refine research objectives and ensure alignment with strategic, business and user goals.Work closely with UX strategists, designers and fellow researchers to provide research expertise and support during workshops and ongoing UX activities.Collaborate with design team to conduct design research to enhance UI Standards & Design Pattern library.Interpret qualitative and quantitative data from web analytics, user research data, trends and patterns to create actionable recommendations at project and portfolio level.Elicit user needs and usability concerns through various research methods, such as interviews, surveys, usability testing, task analysis, contextual inquires, ethnographic studies, & card sorting.Evaluate and evolve user models (personas, scenarios, profiles).Perform heuristic evaluation, accessibility reviews and testing of applications and make concrete recommendations for improving their usability.Provide rapid prototyping support to communicate concepts/designs recommendations based on research conducted.Synthesize research data, summarize findings & present results to management and project teams for both strategic and project level insight.', 'As a UX Researcher, you', 'A researcher is involved in all aspects of the experience design process from context-based research and presenting to internal clients, senior stakeholders and team members alike. Success depends on close collaboration and partnerships with end-users and subject matter experts, as well as product and technology counterparts. This position is for a researcher with user-first mindset, who has the passion for stepping in users shoe and understanding their needs and bridge the gap between users mental model and business goals. This individual thrives in a highly collaborative and cross-disciplinary team environment.', 'Is an enthusiastic, highly motivated self-starter with a strong work ethic and an intense focus on achieving results', "You'll be better prepared if you have", 'Proactively seeks out partnerships', 'Experience in designing for mobile applications, responsive, and other digital interfaces']

forms, support clinical trial applications, scale-up and enable transfer of manufacturing processes, and to support product licensure-related activities.', 'Last Date to Apply for Job: November 4, 2020Eligible for Employee Referral Bonus: YES', 'Basic knowledge of protein or nucleic acid chemistry, degradation pathways, and stabilization techniques.', 'The responsibilities of the Scientist position include but are not limited to: Participate in developing parenteral formulations for biotherapeutic modalities.', 'Knowledge of drug development processes for progression of a biological candidate.Experience with analytical methods such as HPLC (SE-HPLC, IEX, RP-HPLC), Capillary Gel electrophoresis (CGE), imaged Capillary Electrophoresis (iCE), spectroscopy techniquesFamiliarity with viral vectors for the delivery of therapeutic nucleic acids.Familiarity with lyophilization and lyophilization cycle development.Familiarity with parenteral manufacturing requirements, including media fills, environmental monitoring, container/closure integrity, and commercial unit operations.Familiarity with GLP/GMP requirements.Familiarity in scale-up and technology transfer to pilot/commercial scale.', 'The Scientist must be able to interact effectively with a multi-disciplinary team of scientists for formulation optimization and overall candidate progression.', 'The Scientist will assist in the development and scale-up of drug product manufacturing processes, including liquid filling operations, filtration and lyophilization, from bench top to pilot scale, and, as required, technology transfer to manufacturing plants.', 'Perform rapid, comprehensive characterization of candidate molecules to determine the stability profile and apply this information to develop an appropriate dosage form to meet clinical needs. This will be achieved by applying various biophysical and biochemical techniques such as HPLC (SE-HPLC, IEX, RP-HPLC), capillary gel electrophoresis (CGE), imaged capillary electrophoresis (iCE), spectroscopy techniques such as UV and fluorescence spectroscopy, circular dichroism and FTIR.', 'Preferred Qualifications', '3 years industrial experience in parenteral formulation and process development of protein, peptide, vaccine, viral vector, oligonucleotides, other biologic therapeutics.', 'Last Date to Apply for Job: November 4, 2020', 'Experience with analytical methods such as HPLC (SE-HPLC, IEX, RP-HPLC), Capillary Gel electrophoresis (CGE), imaged Capillary Electrophoresis (iCE), spectroscopy techniques', 'Effective communication skills are desirable for interactions with laboratory scientists, project managers and colleagues from numerous functions, serving on multi-disciplinary project teams.', 'Excellent oral and written communication skills.', 'Knowledge of drug development processes for progression of a biological candidate.', 'This position will be responsible for preparing data summary presentations, compiling data, and authoring technical reports and regulatory filings associated with his/her work.', 'Familiarity in scale-up and technology transfer to pilot/commercial scale.', 'Eligible for Employee Referral Bonus: YES', 'Other Job Details:', 'The responsibilities of the Scientist position include but are not limited to: Participate in developing parenteral formulations for biotherapeutic modalities.Help develop manufacturing processes for these parenteral drug products.Perform rapid, comprehensive characterization of candidate molecules to determine the stability profile and apply this information to develop an appropriate dosage form to meet clinical needs. This will be achieved by applying various biophysical and biochemical techniques such as HPLC (SE-HPLC, IEX, RP-HPLC), capillary gel electrophoresis (CGE), imaged capillary electrophoresis (iCE), spectroscopy techniques such as UV and fluorescence spectroscopy, circular dichroism and FTIR.The Scientist will assist in the development and scale-up of drug product manufacturing processes, including liquid filling operations, filtration and lyophilization, from bench top to pilot scale, and, as required, technology transfer to manufacturing plants.Data generated by the incumbent will be utilized to nominate dosage forms, support clinical trial applications, scale-up and enable transfer of manufacturing processes, and to support product licensure-related activities.The Scientist must be able to interact effectively with a multi-disciplinary team of scientists for formulation optimization and overall candidate progression.This position will be responsible for preparing data summary presentations, compiling data, and authoring technical reports and regulatory filings associated with his/her work.Effective communication skills are desirable for interactions with laboratory scientists, project managers and colleagues from numerous functions, serving on multi-disciplinary project teams.', "Bachelor's Degree with in Pharmaceutics, Chemistry, Chemical/Biochemical Engineering, Pharmacy, Biochemistry or equivalent with 6+ years experience OR Master's Degree in Pharmaceutics, Chemistry, Chemical/Biochemical Engineering, Pharmacy, Biochemistry or equivalent with 4+ years experience.", 'Help develop manufacturing processes for these parenteral drug products.', 'Familiarity with parenteral manufacturing requirements, including media fills, environmental monitoring, container/closure integrity, and commercial unit operations.', 'Role Responsibilities', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Familiarity with viral vectors for the delivery of therapeutic nucleic acids.', 'Familiarity with GLP/GMP requirements.', "Bachelor's Degree with in Pharmaceutics, Chemistry, Chemical/Biochemical Engineering, Pharmacy, Biochemistry or equivalent with 6+ years experience OR Master's Degree in Pharmaceutics, Chemistry, Chemical/Biochemical Engineering, Pharmacy, Biochemistry or equivalent with 4+ years experience.3 years industrial experience in parenteral formulation stabilization techniques.Excellent oral and written communication skills."]

['', '\xa0', 'Advanced understanding of food science and biochemistry', 'Advanced understanding of food science and biochemistryProduct development experienceExperience leading and devising research initiatives', "Spero was created to give everyone access to clean dairy alternatives that actually taste good. At Spero, our first products are our patent-pending cream cheeses, made from organic sunflower seeds. Why sunflower seeds? They save water, land and air! Switching to sunflower over a nut or dairy cream cheese saves ~ 400 showers, 20,000 miles driven, and 1 earth! (per year). Our cheeses are made from real, superfood ingredients, with 5g protein and probiotic cultures. They're free from gums, additives, and the top-8 allergens, so no nuts, soy, dairy, peanuts, etc.", '-Forbes Under 30 Most Innovative', '-TED Women featured', 'Autonomy, growth, impact', 'Free coffee, tea, snacks', 'Advanced degree or equivalent 4-8 years of relevant experience', 'Qualifications', 'The ideal candidate will be responsible for leading a team of food scientists dedicated to product development, managing and designing experiments, conducting literature research, and more.', '-YCombinator (2018)', 'JOB PERKS', 'Potential Equity Vesting Packaging', 'Amazing Health & Dental', 'Opportunity to make a positive impact on the world', 'Responsibilities', 'Fluency in all things marketing', 'High degree of scientific creativity and autonomy', 'Experience leading and devising research initiatives', 'ABOUT SPERO', 'Impeccable execution', 'Excellent leadership and communication skills', 'Advanced degree or equivalent 4-8 years of relevant experienceExcellent leadership and communication skillsHigh degree of scientific creativity and autonomyImpeccable executionFluency in all things marketing', 'Product development experience', 'Just this past year, Spero has been:\xa0']

['', 'What You’ll Do', 'Deep experience with data frameworks and tools like Spark, SparkML, Spark Streaming, Apache Beam, and Airflow.', '3+ years’ experience with Spark, either in Python or in Scala. Bonus points for Spark on EMR, Dataproc, or Kubernetes.', "Here's our\xa0Blockchain Business, Provenance", '\xa0', 'http://www.figure.com/blog/series-c', 'As part of our Data Engineering team, you’ll work closely with various business functions to understand Figure’s analytic, data science, and reporting needs and to develop data products that address those needs. You will be contributing to data engineering’s vision and development from day one.', 'Competitive salaryFirm-wide performance based bonusCompetitive stock options packageA flexible paid time off and vacation policyComprehensive health, vision, dental insuranceCompany FSA, 401k, commuter benefitsAnd much more to come!', 'Competitive stock options package', 'About Figure', 'Figure will NOT sponsor work visas for this position. In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification form upon hire.', 'Company FSA, 401k, commuter benefits', 'This team has an incredible engineering challenge: integrate very large datasets that outline intricate details about consumers’ credit profiles and real estate holdings, expose those datasets to data scientists in a way that enables their ML and modeling efforts, and shape those models into scalable, production-quality processes. In addition, the team provides the foundations for internal analytics and for internal and external reporting by transforming data from Figure applications and external vendors into clear data models.', 'Leverage Spark, Airflow, Google Kubernetes Engine, BigQuery and other tools to build robust and efficient data pipelines.Expand and optimize our data and data pipeline architecture, as well as optimizing data flow and collection for cross-functional teams.Collaborate with project leads and other software engineers across multiple teamsWork on data software solutions that will transform the consumer lending and blockchain spaceBe a leader, use your voice, apply your tech skills to solve real world problems', 'About the Role', 'Firm-wide performance based bonus', 'Comfort with and experience working within CI/CD processes and tools and software development practices.', 'https://www.provenance.io/about/#hash', 'What We Look For', 'Benefits To You', 'Working knowledge of Google Cloud tools (compute, cloud storage, GKE, GCR, AutoML, etc.)\xa0\xa0', 'At Figure, we’re on a mission to transform financial services through blockchain, bringing speed, efficiency and savings to both consumers and institutions.', 'Expertise building and optimizing data pipelines using Kafka (preferred), Kinesis, or other event bus.', 'Competitive salary', 'Collaborate with project leads and other software engineers across multiple teams', 'This is an opportunity to work with a team of proven leaders who have already created billions of dollars in value in the Fintech space. Join us!', 'BS degree in Computer Science or related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.6+ years of proven working experience as a data engineer3+ years’ experience with Spark, either in Python or in Scala. Bonus points for Spark on EMR, Dataproc, or Kubernetes.Working knowledge of Google Cloud tools (compute, cloud storage, GKE, GCR, AutoML, etc.)\xa0\xa0Expertise building and optimizing data pipelines using Kafka (preferred), Kinesis, or other event bus.Deep experience with data frameworks and tools like Spark, SparkML, Spark Streaming, Apache Beam, and Airflow.Comfort with and experience working within CI/CD processes and tools and software development practices.Experience with production machine learning workflows and processes.Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of SQL and NoSQL databases, including BigQuery (preferable), MySQL/MariaDB, Postgres or Cassandra.Expertise in data modeling for data science, reporting, and analytics, including dimensional and transactional models.\xa0Nice to have:\xa0experience building real-time transformations and learning models on streams.Ability to thrive in a fast-paced growing company.', 'Be a leader, use your voice, apply your tech skills to solve real world problems', '6+ years of proven working experience as a data engineer', 'Work on data software solutions that will transform the consumer lending and blockchain space', 'Ability to thrive in a fast-paced growing company.', 'Comprehensive health, vision, dental insurance', 'Expertise in data modeling for data science, reporting, and analytics, including dimensional and transactional models.\xa0', 'Figure is excited to be growing our businesses and creating new teams.\xa0We are looking for curious, innovative and collaborative team members.\xa0Engineering is at the heart of the action, building out our blockchain protocol and direct to consumer products that will transform the financial services industry.\xa0Everything is from scratch development and every engineer has a big impact on the team and the growth of the company.\xa0', 'Accomplishing this kind of transformation requires building really big things. And we understand that building big requires a creative, team oriented and supportive environment where everyone can do their absolute best work. The Figure team is comprised of incredibly driven, innovative, collaborative and curious people who love architecting and building from scratch. Everyone at the company is encouraged to be an individual contributor but also a team collaborator.\xa0', 'We value team members who bring an entrepreneurial mindset to every task and will embrace our culture of innovation. Every day at Figure is a journey in continuous learning yet a daily focus on getting work done that makes a difference.', 'Leverage Spark, Airflow, Google Kubernetes Engine, BigQuery and other tools to build robust and efficient data pipelines.', 'Expand and optimize our data and data pipeline architecture, as well as optimizing data flow and collection for cross-functional teams.', 'Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of SQL and NoSQL databases, including BigQuery (preferable), MySQL/MariaDB, Postgres or Cassandra.', 'A flexible paid time off and vacation policy', 'Experience with production machine learning workflows and processes.', '** More about our recent\xa0Series C funding!\xa0', 'And much more to come!', 'Nice to have:\xa0experience building real-time transformations and learning models on streams.', 'BS degree in Computer Science or related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.']

['· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 A minimum of 6 years of relevant industrial or post-doctoral experience (industrial experience highly preferred). \xa0 ', 'Minimum Qualifications', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Provides subject area expertise (biology, technology, process, etc.) directly or identifies a subject matter expert to consult with the team as needed. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Independently performs a wide variety of experiments, techniques and assays to advance technology development, product development, collaborations and troubleshooting. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Collaborates with peers, or works independently to investigate and address highly complex product-related biological and technology development issues. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Ability to perform highly complex research independently in a systematic manner. Proven track record of subject matter expertise in relevant research areas demonstrated through publications and product R&D. ', 'Essential Functions: ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 High level of proficiency with basic statistical methods and mathematics, data-analysis software and standard statistical tests. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Authors research protocols and reports for a wide range of studies, including feasibility, exploratory, clinical and analytical studies, to be executed within the Research and Development function as well as externally in collaborators’ laboratories. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Provides internal education about products and technology to new and existing employees at varied experience and technical knowledge levels. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Strong familiarity with a variety of next-generation sequencing workflows including library preparation, instrumentation, and data analysis. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Provides scientific input to help set the direction for product and process improvements. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Maintains up-to-date knowledge in the above areas, and proactively proposes and implements application of new ideas and concepts in the context of development programs. ', 'This role requires an in-depth understanding of first-principle mechanisms applicable to molecular biology, cancer biology, gene expression profiling and next generation sequencing (NGS) technologies. The role will also require participation in optimizing and improving current commercial assays and establishing workflows, processes and technologies by providing scientific, technological and subject matter expertise as needed.  The incumbent will lead execution of research, clinical and analytical laboratory studies from study design through final data analysis and study report.\u202f\xa0 ', 'Essential Functions', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Strong background in biochemistry and molecular biology methods with experience in assay development, nucleic acid isolation, purification and quantitation, qPCR, RNA-Seq, gene expression profiling, RNA techniques, and next generation sequencing (NGS) assays. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Knowledge of tissue-based and non-tissue-based analytical methods for evaluating tumor-associated biology and/or immune response mechanisms. Experience in cancer-focused research through published research. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Must have excellent written and verbal communication and presentation skills (including technical writing). ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Detail-oriented and highly organized while demonstrating effective time management to meet deadlines within budgetary constraints. Must be able to work effectively on multiple programs in a fast-paced environment with an appropriate level of business acumen.', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Authors abstracts, conference posters and talks, as well as publications. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Provides technical oversight to remove roadblocks and coordinates with Department Head or others as necessary to complete laboratory studies on time and on budget. \xa0\xa0 ', 'Minimum Qualifications:\xa0 ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 PhD in Molecular Biology, Biochemistry, Cancer Biology, Genetics, or an associated relevant field or equivalent experience.  ', 'The role of Senior Research Scientist is responsible for contributing scientific and technical expertise to initiate, conduct and direct complex product and technology research, and provide support to the development of novel products. This individual will interact with and support various internal and external stakeholders, and may act as a liaison with internal functions and/or outside collaborators and partners. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Provides strong scientific expertise in the areas of cancer biology, molecular genetics, gene expression profiling and NGS analytical methods for evaluating tumor-associated biology.\xa0\xa0 ', '\xa0 ']

['', 'A hard-working, proactive, and self-motivated individual.', 'Keep a stocked, clean, and orderly laboratory to promote safety and productivity.', 'Experience with metabolomics or cheminformatics data analysis tools and workflows.', ' Develop, perform, and optimize targeted and untargeted metabolomics workflows in numerous plant species. Planning, management, and implementation of complex research projects involving interdisciplinary teams. Interpret and report on chromatography and mass spectrometry data using metabolomics and cheminformatics approaches. Operate and maintain analytical instrumentation such as GC-MS and LC-MS. Keep a stocked, clean, and orderly laboratory to promote safety and productivity. Supervise technical staff to assist in research efforts as needed and support and promote safety. Develop, train, and evaluate performance of employees on a continuous basis.  Maintain collaborative working relationships with other Plant Science and business departments at Plenty. Occasional domestic and international travel will be required. Keep an up-to-date digital lab notebook and contribute to SOPs. ', 'Demonstrated ability to develop analytical workflows including sample preparation, instrument methods, and data analysis.', 'Develop, train, and evaluate performance of employees on a continuous basis. ', 'Maintain collaborative working relationships with other Plant Science and business departments at Plenty.', 'Ph.D. with 3-5 years’ research experience in metabolomics, analytical chemistry, flavor chemistry, nutrition, and/or plant biochemistry.', 'About Plenty', 'Operate and maintain analytical instrumentation such as GC-MS and LC-MS.', 'Excellent analytical, statistical, data visualization, and communication skills.', 'Occasional domestic and international travel will be required.', 'Develop, perform, and optimize targeted and untargeted metabolomics workflows in numerous plant species.', 'About Role', 'Ability to work in a startup environment with rapidly developing goals and timelines.', 'Extensive practical experience and theoretical knowledge of LC-MS or GC-MS.', ' Ph.D. with 3-5 years’ research experience in metabolomics, analytical chemistry, flavor chemistry, nutrition, and/or plant biochemistry. Demonstrated ability to develop analytical workflows including sample preparation, instrument methods, and data analysis. Extensive practical experience and theoretical knowledge of LC-MS or GC-MS. Experience with metabolomics or cheminformatics data analysis tools and workflows. Excellent analytical, statistical, data visualization, and communication skills. Knowledge of other analytical instrumentation such as FTIR, NMR, DESI, MSn, etc. A hard-working, proactive, and self-motivated individual. Ability to work in a startup environment with rapidly developing goals and timelines. About Plenty ', 'Planning, management, and implementation of complex research projects involving interdisciplinary teams.', 'Knowledge of other analytical instrumentation such as FTIR, NMR, DESI, MSn, etc.', 'Keep an up-to-date digital lab notebook and contribute to SOPs.', 'Supervise technical staff to assist in research efforts as needed and support and promote safety.', 'Interpret and report on chromatography and mass spectrometry data using metabolomics and cheminformatics approaches.']

job_title: Senior Principal Research Scientist, Medicinal Chemistry
job_text: ['', '\ufeff', 'Position Summary:', 'Ph.D. in synthetic organic chemistry with 7+ years pharmaceutical medicinal chemistry industrial experienceExpert understanding of medicinal chemistry concepts and proficiency in the application of structure-based design with demonstrated success in application to medicinal chemistry design challengesStrong track record in applying modern synthetic organic techniques to advance small-molecule drug discovery programs, include a strong publication/patent recordExceptional knowledge of ADME, physicochemical, biochemical and pharmacological principles as applied to drug discoverySolid ability to supervise junior scientists and/or CRO collaborators to high levels of productivityExcellent oral and written communication skillsAbility to multi-task and set priorities on multiple projectsAbility to work well in multi-disciplinary teamsExperience in applying molecular modeling methods to structure, ligand and fragment-based drug discoveryA strong record of delivering portfolio success and driving projects through to the identification of high quality small-molecule drug candidatesExcellent awareness of current developments in synthetic and medicinal chemistry, and ability to identify opportunities to advance the science in these fields', 'What you will bring:', 'IDEAYA recently announced a landmark strategic partnership with GSK in Synthetic Lethality for certain pipeline programs. The GSK partnership is transformative and enables IDEAYA and GSK to collectively build an industry leading platform and pipeline in Synthetic Lethality. For more information, please see\xa0www.ideayabio.com.', 'IDEAYA Biosciences (NASDAQ: IDYA) is a public, clinical-stage oncology-focused precision medicine company committed to the discovery and development of targeted therapeutics for patient populations selected using DNA sequencing and other molecular diagnostics. Our approach integrates extensive capabilities in identifying and validating translational biomarkers with small molecule drug discovery to select patient populations most likely to benefit from the therapies we are developing. We are applying these capabilities across multiple classes of precision medicine, including direct targeting of oncogenic pathways and synthetic lethality – which represents an emerging class of precision medicine targets. We believe this diversified approach will enable us to deliver the right medicine to the right patient to drive a more robust clinical response.', 'Strong track record in applying modern synthetic organic techniques to advance small-molecule drug discovery programs, include a strong publication/patent record', 'A strong record of delivering portfolio success and driving projects through to the identification of high quality small-molecule drug candidates', 'Benefits:', 'Ability to work well in multi-disciplinary teams', 'Ability to multi-task and set priorities on multiple projects', 'Excellent awareness of current developments in synthetic and medicinal chemistry, and ability to identify opportunities to advance the science in these fields', 'Expert understanding of medicinal chemistry concepts and proficiency in the application of structure-based design with demonstrated success in application to medicinal chemistry design challenges', 'Excellent oral and written communication skills', 'We are seeking a talented and highly motivated individual with significant pharmaceutical industry experience to join our multidisciplinary team. The successful candidate will engage in rational structure-based drug discovery enabled by our computational and structural chemistry group. In addition to significant lab work, the work will include aspects of managing CRO collaborators in the preparation of target molecules and chemistry leadership of drug discovery projects. As a member of a dynamic multi-disciplinary team, this person will collaborate with a broad group of scientists within IDEAYA as well as external collaborators.', 'Exceptional knowledge of ADME, physicochemical, biochemical and pharmacological principles as applied to drug discovery', 'Experience in applying molecular modeling methods to structure, ligand and fragment-based drug discovery', 'About IDEAYA Biosciences:', 'Solid ability to supervise junior scientists and/or CRO collaborators to high levels of productivity', 'IDEAYA is an equal opportunity employer. In accordance with applicable law, IDEAYA does not discriminate in hiring or otherwise in employment on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, marital or veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, or any other legally protected status. EOE/AA/Vets', "When you're at IDEAYA, you will be in the midst of brilliant minds working on precision medicine therapies to help cancer patients. We are passionate and committed about being on the forefront of oncology medicine, which means we all have a high internal drive that is at the very core of every person at IDEAYA. We are inquisitive, ask deep questions, and are data-driven innovators who like to collaborate and use team work to move science forward.", 'Ph.D. in synthetic organic chemistry with 7+ years pharmaceutical medicinal chemistry industrial experience']

job_title: Research Assistant - Center for Rehabilitation Outcomes Research, Full-time
job_text: ['', 'Assists in analysis of qualitative and quantitative data by coding verbatim interviews', 'Proficient typing and administrative skills to transcribe data, prepare correspondence, and maintain files.', '  Subject Recruitment Contacts hospital-site staff to identify potential participants; reviews medical records to determine appropriateness of patients for study. Explains study to patients and family members, requests participation and obtains informed consent Schedules and confirms participants for hospital and/or home interviews   Data Collection Conducts on and off site interviews using a variety of structured and non-structured questionnaires Retrieves and records data from medical records and records data from interviews on appropriate forms Uses clinical judgment to alert supervisor in a timely manner that participant responses may indicate need for professional intervention Maintains interim contact with study participants to maintain current address and telephone information   Dissemination Assists in development of data tables, graphs and charts and preparation of material for presentation   Data Management Assists in the collection of new data; codes, cleans, transcribes, records, enters and stores all data collected; coordinates data collection with other research staff as appropriate Generates reports detailing data collected Conducts literature searches, copying and distributing articles as appropriate Transcribes and codes taped interviews Maintains an inventory of data collection forms to ensure ease of data retrieval Assists in analysis of qualitative and quantitative data by coding verbatim interviews Performs various record-keeping tasks such as filing consent forms and other data collection forms on all eligible participants to ensure ease of data retrieval and tracking of participants   Supports Scholarly Activities Attends meetings; takes minutes as assigned6.   Perform all other duties that may be assigned in the best interest of the Shirley Ryan AbilityLab.Reporting Relationships Reports directly to Lab Manager, Research Scientist, or Project Director Knowledge, Skills & Abilities Required Work requires communication and mathematics skills normally acquired in four years of college, plus three to six months of related work experience. Prefer graduate of or student in graduate program in neurosciences, nursing, psychology, engineering, social work, public health or related field. Knowledge of basic computer hardware in addition to software such as Microsoft Office, statistical programs such as Stata or SPSS, and/or relevant engineering or mathematical programs such as Matlab, as appropriate. Familiarity with medical, engineering or health services research terminology and basic research/statistical methodology is required, as appropriate to the position. Ability to accurately review and enter project data and to concentrate and pay close attention to detail for up to 75% of work time is required. Analytical ability is required to prepare reports, maintain data inventory, code, transcribe interviews, develop graphs, perform literature searches, negotiate systems in several hospitals and/or human service organizations, and identify concerns/responses of participants that require termination of interview or possible intervention. Strong interpersonal skills are needed to interact effectively with patients/family member dyads, physicians, other human service professionals and a variety of supervisors for various research projects. Flexibility to coordinate scheduling with other project staff is needed. Proficient typing and administrative skills to transcribe data, prepare correspondence, and maintain files. Exercises independent judgment in assigned area of responsibility. May be expected to take leadership on certain project tasks. Working Conditions Normal office/research laboratory environment with little or no exposure to dust or extreme temperature. May involve travel to other hospital/research sites and possibly to participants’ homes. Interviews/experiments may require flexible day, evening and/or weekend hours. The above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed by people assigned to this classification. They are not intended to be construed as an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties and skills required of personnel so classified.Shirley Ryan Abilitylab is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, race, color, religion, national origin, disability, protected Veteran status, age, or any other characteristic protected by law.', 'Work requires communication and mathematics skills normally acquired in four years of college, plus three to six months of related work experience. Excellent knowledge of Python and industry experience with TensorFlow, Keras and/or PyTorch Industry experience with image processing using Deep Learning (semantic segmentation, object detection, classification) Familiarity with various CNN architectures (VGG16, ResNet, MobileNet, etc) Experience with traditional image processing techniques (e.g. use of OpenCV, skimage) Experience with deployment to the edge devices (jetson nano or similar technologies) is a plus', ' Our locomotives stream 350+ sensor information in real-time. We create predictive models to predict various component failures hours, days, and sometimes months in advance.', ' Design and build novel/custom CNN architectures.', 'Education And Experience', ' The AI and Data Science team is centralized across the entire organization.', ' You will have your own dedicated GPU (!) in addition to a GPU cluster to run parallel training and inference jobs.', ' We use Jupyter notebook, Emacs, PyCharm, Rstudio as IDEs.', 'What Are Our Requirements', ' We use Python, R, and Spark (PySpark, SparkR, Scala) for modeling and EDA.', ' Design and develop production ready code.', ' There are high-frame cameras beside our tracks, capturing images of trains and rail cars as they pass. We design various Deep Learning and Computer Vision algorithms to detect certain objects of interest or issues and defects. We design various Deep Learning and Computer Vision algorithms to detect certain objects of interest or issues and defects. We then optimize their performance and deploy them at the edge for real-time scoring and notification of our mechanical personnel upon detections. Want to learn more? Apply today!', ' Most of our models make it to production, they never sit in a research lab. But we also do quite a bit of research to stay up-to-date with the latest technologies/algorithms.', ' The AI and Data Science team is centralized across the entire organization. We are very collaborative, you will likely get lots of ideas from the team.', ' We work with various product teams across various business units to define high-impact business problems, solve them using novel techniques, and execute and monitor them throughout their lifecycle.', ' We use Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, and MXNet for Deep Learning, and OpenCV for traditional Computer Vision.', ' We use Python, R, and Spark (PySpark, SparkR, Scala) for modeling and EDA. ['', 'The Media Analytics Department is seeking outstanding researchers with backgrounds in computer vision or machine learning. Candidates must possess an exceptional track record of original research and passion to create high impact products. Our researchers are expected to establish global leadership in their communities.', '• Motivation to conduct independent research from conception to implementation', '• Programming skills in Python, C or C++', 'Equal Opportunity Employer', '• PhD in Computer Science (or equivalent)\xa0', 'Required Skills or Experiences:', 'For more information about NEC Labs, access www.nec-labs.com and submit your CV and research statement through our career center at https://www.appone.com/MainInfoReq.asp?R_ID=3153152.', '• Strong publication record at top-tier computer vision or machine learning venues\xa0', 'NEC Labs provides a vibrant research environment and the Media Analytics team publishes extensively at top-tier venues such as CVPR, ICCV or ECCV. Our key research areas include 3D scene understanding, representation learning and privacy. We are located in San Jose, with a strong internship program and active collaborations with academia. To check out our latest work, please visit: https://bit.ly/39VHNxa.']

BSc and 7 years minimum experience or equivalent job experience. Experienced programmer with wide range of technical knowledge.\xa0Well versed in multiple programming languages.', 'When you are hired by Donnelly & Moore you enjoy these benefits:', 'Excellent skills in visual communication, user interface design, and data visualization. The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio showing user interface and visualization design.The ideal candidate will have strong skills in the visual representation of data, both in graphics and in the web browser (preferably using JavaScript or D3). No third parties.', '\xa0Job # #20-00220', '20% Analyze and Plan, Research & Communicate Approach', "Our client is seeking a Senior Data Engineer for their location in New York, NY.
