['', 'Analyze and improve the efficiency, scalability, and stability of data collection, storage, and retrieval processes for our core systems.', 'Create new data processing systems as necessary to support our Data Scientists and Research Analysts.', '7+ years of professional development experience building high-performance, large-scale applications/pipelines.', 'Analyze and improve the efficiency, scalability, and stability of data collection, storage, and retrieval processes for our core systems.Create and manage platform-specific APIs.Create new data processing systems as necessary to support our Data Scientists and Research Analysts.Ultimately, build robust, high-volume production software.', 'Strong command of a programming language or two – while we code primarily in Python, we acknowledge that engineers with sound fundamentals can pick up new languages relatively quickly.Excellent problem solving skills. Ability to interpret and analyze data is a must. Consequently, mathematical inclination is a major plus.7+ years of professional development experience building high-performance, large-scale applications/pipelines.Solid foundation in computer science, with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms and software design.Experience with Hadoop, Spark, or similar technologies is desirable.Experience with running production systems on AWS is also a plus.', 'Create and manage platform-specific APIs.', 'Experience with running production systems on AWS is also a plus.', 'Help us transform the TV viewing experience for everyone!', 'Excellent problem solving skills. Ability to interpret and analyze data is a must. Consequently, mathematical inclination is a major plus.', 'Ultimately, build robust, high-volume production software.', 'Requirements', 'Responsibilities', 'Strong command of a programming language or two – while we code primarily in Python, we acknowledge that engineers with sound fundamentals can pick up new languages relatively quickly.', 'Solid foundation in computer science, with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms and software design.', 'At Samba TV, we are on a mission to fundamentally change television viewing for everyone. We are doing this by leveraging our data to enable advertisers to engage and measure TV viewers across all their devices. We have an amazing story with a unique perspective formed by innovative technology.', 'Experience with Hadoop, Spark, or similar technologies is desirable.']

['', 'Stanford is an equal opportunity employer, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.', 'The Integrative Personalized Medicine Laboratory in the Department of Radiology at Stanford (http://pimed.stanford.edu) and the Urologic Cancer Innovation Lab in the Department of Urology at Stanford (https://med.stanford.edu/ucil.html)\xa0have an opening for a highly creative and motivated postdoctoral scholar with an interest in advanced image processing and machine learning methods to assess disease presence, progression and treatment response for clinical applications, e.g., prostate or breast cancers. The projects are focused on identifying radiologic signatures of cancers and aggressive diseases via multi-modal data fusion, such as radiology-pathology integration.\xa0Although the developed methods are meant to be general and not specific to a certain disease, their application is focused on critical and relevant clinical problems for prostate cancer. The projects have the potential for highly informative and very productive findings in terms of publication and innovative clinical implications and will be clinically implemented if successful. The successful candidate will join the Department of Radiology, Division of Integrative Biomedical Imaging Informatics at Stanford University or the Department of Urology and will work with a multi-disciplinary team of clinicians, statisticians, computer scientists, and students. This position is available immediately.', '2.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Complete contact information for three references', 'Candidates should have demonstrated ability to work independently, attention to details, be dedicated, and self-motivated. Collaborative team spirit, strong communication skills, positive attitude, and adherence to highest ethical principles are necessary to be considered.', '3.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Cover letter describing past research experience, career goals and future research interests', 'Required Qualifications:', 'Candidates with experience in radiomics, radiogenomics, image registration and prostate cancer research are strongly encouraged to apply. Experienced with prostate cancer research is not required.', '1.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0An updated resume', 'In our team, we believe in the value of diversity in helping us solve complex clinical problems. If you are part of a minority group, we strongly encourage you to apply. Feel free to reach out to us if you have any questions.', 'Candidates must have a Ph.D. in Biomedical Informatics or related fields; They must be proficient in image processing and machine learning methods applied to medical data, e.g., radiology, pathology.Candidates must have prior experience in software development and C++/python programming, and be familiar with toolkits, e.g., ITK, opencv, sklearn.Candidates with experience in radiomics, radiogenomics, image registration and prostate cancer research are strongly encouraged to apply. Experienced with prostate cancer research is not required.Candidates should have demonstrated ability to work independently, attention to details, be dedicated, and self-motivated. Collaborative team spirit, strong communication skills, positive attitude, and adherence to highest ethical principles are necessary to be considered.', 'If interested, please share ', 'Candidates must have prior experience in software development and C++/python programming, and be familiar with toolkits, e.g., ITK, opencv, sklearn.', 'Candidates must have a Ph.D. in Biomedical Informatics or related fields; They must be proficient in image processing and machine learning methods applied to medical data, e.g., radiology, pathology.']

['', '\xa0', '• Document sensor development efforts for DHF and IP', 'Day to day activities will include conducting research, data analysis and process development studies to support feasibility and verification/validation project phases. The successful candidate will solve technical problems of high to moderate complexity, lead troubleshooting efforts to determine root causes for failures and customer complaints, and design and conduct DOE experiments to support development of improved sensor formulations and to enhance sensor quality and performance.', '• Develop and/or optimize biosensors from pre-development through product release', '• Transfer sensor designs from R&D to Manufacturing', 'Responsibilities:', '• Excellent working knowledge of amperometric and potentiometric sensors for diagnostic applications', '• Experience with enzyme stabilization and immobilization technologies', '• Experience with polymer synthesis', '• Extensive lab work designing and executing experiments, and analyzing resultant data.', 'The successful candidate will apply scientific principles and technical knowledge to develop and/or optimize amperometric biosensors and ion selective electrodes for point of care in vitro diagnostic applications. A wide range of analytical chemistry, electrochemistry and biochemical methodologies will be employed to support the sensor development work.', 'The position will involve close collaboration with R&D reagent scientist colleagues and providing technical leadership to manufacturing personnel. The Scientist will participate in departmental and cross-functional teams focused on the delivery of new or improved products and will contribute to the design and development of next generation platforms. Additional duties include maintaining a laboratory notebook, writing technical reports, internal protocols and SOPs, and keeping up to date with advances in the clinical diagnostics field.', '• Proven track record of sensor development', 'Research Professional 2 ', 'M.S. in chemistry, analytical chemistry, electrochemistry, material science or a related field with minimum of 7 years applicable industry experience in the medical diagnostics field focusing on product development; or Ph.D. with a minimum of 5 years industry experience.', '$38/hour on W2', '• Working knowledge of polymer chemistry and material science', '• Excellent quantitative skills and working knowledge of simple and complex statistics', 'Position Requirements:', 'Norwood, MA ', '• Experience in process development, DOEs and transfer to manufacturing', '1-year contract', 'Highly Desired Skills:', '• Working knowledge of electrochemical analytical techniques', '• Excellent oral and written communication skills', 'Description']

development is preferred.', 'Molecular Templates is a clinical stage biopharmaceutical company focused on the discovery and development of differentiated, targeted, biologic therapeutics for cancer. We believe our proprietary biologic drug platform technology, referred to as engineered toxin bodies, or ETBs, provides a differentiated mechanism of action that may address some of the limitations associated with currently available cancer therapeutics. ETBs utilize a genetically engineered form of Shiga-like Toxin A subunit, or SLTA, a ribosome inactivating bacterial protein, that can be targeted to specifically destroy cancer cells.\xa0Additional information about Molecular Templates can be obtained at www.mtem.com.\xa0\xa0', 'Primary responsibilities are focused on, but not limited to, cell-based potency and functional assays', 'Reporting Structure:', 'PhD degree in Cell Biology, Immunology, Molecular Biology or similar field, highly preferred Scientist requires a minimum of 2+ years of relevant industry experienceExceptional non-PhDs with equivalent experience and demonstrated capabilities in the biotechnology or pharmaceutical industries may also be considered; Post-doctoral work may serve as experienceWorking experience in analytical development and/or GMP testing with primary focus on the development, tech transfer and qualification/validation of bioassays (including, but not limited to cell-based potency methods is essential development is preferred.Hands-on experience in flow cytometry and fluorescence-based plate reader is requiredComprehensive knowledge of cGMP regulation applicable to the FDA and comparable international regulatory agenciesExperience with protein-based therapeutics, requiredDemonstrated experience creating analytical development plans and experiment design, generation of test procedures, qualification/validation, and then establishing product specifications and critical quality attributes and limitsExcellent written and verbal communication skillsExcellent computer skillsExcellent technical, analytical and problem-solving skillsExcellent organizational and multi-tasking skillsAbility to manage competing priorities and timelines in a fast-paced, rapid-growth environmentAbility to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams and contractors to drive results and meet company objectives Ability to function independently and exercise good judgement, as well as in a team-based environment', 'Ability to manage competing priorities and timelines in a fast-paced, rapid-growth environment', 'Molecular Templates is seeking a Senior Scientist to develop and qualify bioassays for determination of the potency of Engineered Toxin Body (ETB) therapeutics, for drug substance, drug product release, stability, and product characterization. The Senior Scientist must be experienced in cell-based assay development and capable of determining the root cause of potency assay variability and providing solutions to reduce variability and improve performance precision. The Senior Scientist must be familiar with handling cell lines used for bioassays and possess significant knowledge of reagents and detection systems that will provide strong signaling for dose response profiles. This position requires someone with significant experience in development of functional in vitro cell-based bioassays that are closely representative of the mechanism of action of ETB therapeutics in clinical use. The Senior Scientist will work closely with R&D in selection of cell lines expressing antigens targeted by the ETBs and which perform well under potency assay conditions. The Senior Scientist will work closely with Quality to develop and deliver protocols for potency assay validation.']

job_title: HIT, Clinical Applications, and Revenue Cycle Healthcare Professionals
job_text: ['', 'Admin (Database, Network, Systems), Analyst (Business, Security, Systems), Architect (Applications, Cloud Solutions, Data, Network), Data Scientist, Developer (Java, Mobile, Software, Web), Helpdesk, IT Manager & more!', 'Revenue Cycle-', 'RoundTable Strategic Solutions', 'Round Table Strategic Solutions is a nationally recognized full-service Healthcare IT, Revenue Cycle, and Operations Staff Augmentation/Interim Leadership consulting firm, specializing in identifying and placing exemplary Contract and Direct Hire talent across the healthcare delivery spectrum. RoundTable’s full-circle partnership approach, informed by our principals’ 100+ years of collective healthcare-specific placement experience, creates lasting relationships which result in better, value-driven outcomes. As a solutions-oriented firm, the RoundTable team is highly focused on growth through resource maximization, process efficiency, technology utilization, and a constructive culture within the healthcare organizations we serve. Serving a nationwide client base, RoundTable and many members of its leadership team are headquartered in Baltimore, MD. We are dedicated to serving and enriching the healthcare organizations providing unwavering care to our local and extended communities.', '\ufeffLeadership-', ' Medical Directors, CISO, CTO, CIO, CFO, VP, etc.', 'RoundTable Strategic Solutions is actively looking to represent candidates and job applicants in their search amongst a variety of verticals/roles within the Healthcare Industry for our Clients in Greater Metro Markets across the United States Northeastern and Southeastern Seaboard (i.e. Greater Maryland, Greater Pennsylvania, Greater Virginia, etc). Open Opportunities for our clients consist of both Consulting and Contract, and Direct Hire.', 'United States Northeastern and Southeastern Seaboard', ' EMR & EHR- Epic, Cerner, MEDITECH, GE, Allscripts, Athena, etc.', 'Round Table Strategic Solutions', 'RoundTable Strategic Solutions is pro-actively recruiting for the following roles:', 'IT & Technology-', 'This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.', 'Clinical Applications-', '.', 'Healthcare IT, Revenue Cycle, and Operations Staff Augmentation/Interim Leadership consulting firm', ' Assessment & Risk Mitigation, Revenue Integrity Strategy & Program Development, Interim        Management, etc.', 'NOTE: RoundTable Strategic Solutions provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.', 'Healthcare Industry', 'Contract and Direct Hire', 'healthcare delivery spectrum', 'Applicants, with criminal histories, are considered in a manner that is consistent with local, state and federal laws', 'Greater Metro Markets']

['', 'Your Background Will Include:', 'Hands-on experience with Next Generation Sequencing workflows or assays is a plus.', 'Experience with LIMS, automation, and Document Control is desired.', 'Work effectively on cross-functional teams to plan, design and execute verification/validation studies.', 'Drive development efforts to optimize assay performance and improve laboratory processes.', 'Present project updates, data analysis, and experimental conclusions at technical meetings.', 'Experience with statistical programming and software (e.g., R, JMP) is a plus.', 'You Will:', 'GRAIL is a healthcare company whose mission is to detect cancer early, when it can be cured. GRAIL is focused on alleviating the global burden of cancer by developing pioneering technology to detect and identify multiple deadly cancer types early. The company is using the power of next-generation sequencing, population-scale clinical studies, and state-of-the-art computer science and data science to enhance the scientific understanding of cancer biology, and to develop its multi-cancer early detection blood test. GRAIL is headquartered in Menlo Park, CA with locations in Washington, D.C., North Carolina, and the United Kingdom. It is supported by leading global investors and pharmaceutical, technology, and healthcare companies. For more information, please visit www.grail.com.', 'Act as a core technical lead on product development projects leading to new product introductions and regulatory submissions.', 'Strong verbal and written communication skills and willingness to collaborate cross-functionally in a fast paced and dynamic environment', 'Ph.D in Molecular Biology, Biochemistry, or related field with 6-8 years+ industry experience.IVD product development experience highly desired, knowledge of regulatory requirements, experience working under Design Control, authoring study protocols and reports.Hands-on experience with Next Generation Sequencing workflows or assays is a plus.In-depth knowledge of molecular biology techniques and workflows is required.\xa0Experience with statistical programming and software (e.g., R, JMP) is a plus.Experience with LIMS, automation, and Document Control is desired.Strong verbal and written communication skills and willingness to collaborate cross-functionally in a fast paced and dynamic environment', 'As a Staff Scientist at GRAIL, you will join an exceptional and innovative product development team responsible for delivering commercial scale NGS assays. You will lead critical studies that support new product introduction and regulatory submissions by providing technical expertise in the planning, execution and analysis of laboratory experiments. The ideal candidate should have extensive experience developing or validating assays in a regulated environment, possess critical thinking skills, and be a self-motivated team player.', 'In-depth knowledge of molecular biology techniques and workflows is required.\xa0', 'IVD product development experience highly desired, knowledge of regulatory requirements, experience working under Design Control, authoring study protocols and reports.', 'Perform complex analysis of large genomic data sets in collaboration with Bioinformatics and Biostatistics.', 'Mentor junior team members.', 'Act as a core technical lead on product development projects leading to new product introductions and regulatory submissions.Drive development efforts to optimize assay performance and improve laboratory processes.Work effectively on cross-functional teams to plan, design and execute verification/validation studies.Perform complex analysis of large genomic data sets in collaboration with Bioinformatics and Biostatistics.Be responsible for documentation in compliance with Good Laboratory Practices and Quality Systems Requirements.Present project updates, data analysis, and experimental conclusions at technical meetings.Mentor junior team members.', 'Ph.D in Molecular Biology, Biochemistry, or related field with 6-8 years+ industry experience.', 'Be responsible for documentation in compliance with Good Laboratory Practices and Quality Systems Requirements.']

['', 'What You’ll Do', '  Deep strategic analysis to improve our understanding of our advertising platform and its ability to enable us to meet advertiser objectives. Answer core ads measurement questions such as: How can we prove the effectiveness of ads to advertisers? Can we quantify how new ad features will impact key business metrics? How accurate is our offsite conversion data, and how well can we match incoming conversions to Pinterest users? What features of a conversion can help us inform decisions on ad distribution?  Product recommendations. Clearly communicate recommendations to Product and Engineering teams on how we can evolve our internal strategy to address shortcomings observed through deep analysis. Partner closely with Product to develop and evolve our long-term advertiser measurement strategy.  Opportunity sizing and analysis. Where is attribution breaking down? Are our brand lift studies biased? What do people do on Pinterest before purchasing? How closely related are the products that a user viewed and purchased? Write clear, actionable analyses that help teams identify areas of improvement and investment.  Experimentation: Evolve our experimentation capabilities and tools to evaluate the efficacy of our ad products on advertiser goals and KPIs. Advise on experimentation best practices; identify flaws in experiment practices and results; build tools and frameworks for experiment analysis. job_title: Senior Data Scientist, Risk and Fraud
job_text: ['', 'Designing new machine learning systems to power the fraud prevention and risk reduction efforts at Robinhood especially in product areas', 'Collaborate with the rest of the data team and partner marketing, product, content, design teams to build data solutions and products to drive user and revenue growth. ', ' Passion for working and learning in a fast-growing company ', 'Build production grade models on large-scale datasets to measure effectiveness across products by leveraging statistical modeling, machine learning and data mining techniques.', 'Passion for working and learning in a fast-growing company', 'Your Day-to-day Will Involve', ' Combining knowledge of several research domains to improve our understanding of different risks to Robinhood and help power decisions Designing new machine learning systems to power the fraud prevention and risk reduction efforts at Robinhood especially in product areas Build production grade models on large-scale datasets to measure effectiveness across products by leveraging statistical modeling, machine learning and data mining techniques. Collaborate with the rest of the data team and partner marketing, product, content, design teams to build data solutions and products to drive user and revenue growth.  Work with cross-functional teams to implement insights and analytical solutions to empower data-driven decision making. Problem solving skills and a can-do attitude to dive deep into data to solve business problems ', 'Combining knowledge of several research domains to improve our understanding of different risks to Robinhood and help power decisions', 'Feeling ready to give 100% to democratizing finance for all? We’d love to have you apply, even if you feel unsure about whether you meet every single requirement in this posting. At Robinhood, we’re looking for people invigorated by our mission, not just those who simply check off all the boxes.', 'Solid understanding of unsupervised learning, statistical analysis and machine learning algorithms for imbalanced datasets.', 'Bonus Points', ' Graduate degree in a quantitative field such as mathematics, statistics, computer science, engineering or natural sciences (or equivalent research/work experience) Solid understanding of unsupervised learning, statistical analysis and machine learning algorithms for imbalanced datasets. Excellent programming skills, including expert level familiarity with either Python or R programming languages At least 4 years of work experience, either in a research/ academic or commercial/ industry setting. Risk & Fraud experience in fintech is a plus ', 'Work with cross-functional teams to implement insights and analytical solutions to empower data-driven decision making.', 'Excellent programming skills, including expert level familiarity with either Python or R programming languages', 'Risk & Fraud experience in fintech is a plus', 'About The Company', 'About The Role', 'Graduate degree in a quantitative field such as mathematics, statistics, computer science, engineering or natural sciences (or equivalent research/work experience)', 'Problem solving skills and a can-do attitude to dive deep into data to solve business problems', 'Some Things We Consider Critical For This Role', 'At least 4 years of work experience, either in a research/ academic or commercial/ industry setting.']

95% of the cost of employee benefits and 65% of the cost of dependent care coverage!\xa0', 'A Bachelor or Masters Degree in a highly quantitative field (Computer Science, Machine Learning, Operational change or features that will improve detection and ensure optimal user experience\xa0Follow evolution of privacy features introduced by browser vendors, assess possible impact for the product and propose necessary adjustment as needed.\xa0Example of this includes: user-agent deprecation and transition to client-hints Google privacy sandbox and privacy budget proposal, Safari's intelligent tracking prevention, Firefox enhanced tracking prevention\xa0Get involved in customers calls on occasion to discuss future product directions\xa0Work with the Customer Success team to assist as needed with complex escalation, training on new detection methods and best practices for effectively defending against attacks\xa0Occasional travel to customer site as necessary\xa0Participate in security conference to increase awareness on online fraud and abuse", 'Ability to adapt quickly and constructively to changes\xa0', 'The product platform organization is responsible for the overall fraud and abuse protection product strategy. The focus of the team is to define the product requirements, research the best way to defend against the threat vectors and architect the product to meet the following key requirements: Detection: Detect automated and human fraud / abuse through various methods with high accuracy. The detection must be tightly integrated with the challenge framework so as to adopt the most effective response strategy depending on the risk associated with the request session. The challenge framework is managed by Matt Ford’s Product Challenge organization. Visibility: provide a set of dashboard and reports to customers, partner and our support team to allow them to visualize and analyze the fraud activity detected by the product Serviceability: provide customers the ability tune the detection and response strategy based on the risk score. Also provide customers the ability to craft custom logic to meet their own requirements. The product platform consists of technical product managers and the product research team. The product research team is responsible for coming up with different ways to process data collected on a session in order to differentiate bot from human traffic but also detect human fraud within the human traffic. The team may use different techniques including but not limited to statistical model, unsupervised learning, supervised learning, deep learning, whichever model is the most effective to meet the accuracy requirements.', 'Background in cybersecurity or fraud\xa0', 'General Requirements:', 'Develop POC as needed and help draft the engineering design to be handed over to the dev team\xa0', 'Benefits:', 'Research and develop new ML models as necessary to meet agreed upon product requirements and goals\xa0', "Example of this includes: user-agent deprecation and transition to client-hints Google privacy sandbox and privacy budget proposal, Safari's intelligent tracking prevention, Firefox enhanced tracking prevention\xa0", 'Ability to code, experiment and fail fast\xa0', 'A Bachelor or Masters Degree in a highly quantitative field (Computer Science, Machine Learning, Operational Research, Statistics, Mathematics, etc.) or equivalent experience\xa0', 'Work with the Customer Success team to assist as needed with complex escalation, training on new detection methods and best practices for effectively defending against attacks\xa0', 'Occasional travel to customer site as necessary\xa0', 'Work with the technical product manager team to review requirement and expected outcomes\xa0', 'Job Description:', 'Effective oral and written communication to peers, leadership, and both technical and non-technical audiences\xa0', 'Company Description:', '3+ years of industry experience in predictive modeling, data science and analysis\xa0', 'Research product workflow change or features that will improve detection and ensure optimal user experience\xa0', 'Experience working in the web security space is a plus (fraud, bot management, abuse, web application firewall)\xa0', 'Research newer internet protocol that could provide additional signals that may be relevant to improve detection for example HTTP/2 or HTTP/3\xa0', 'Required Skills: Machine Learning, Data Science, Deep Learning, Data Modeling, HTTP, DNS, HTML, JavaScript, JS, CSS, Python, R, SQL', 'Evaluate accuracy of detection methods and propose enhancements as needed\xa0', 'Competitive salary, equity, and a robust benefits package includes top-notch medical, dental, vision, life insurance, 401k, commuter benefits and we cover 95% of the cost of employee benefits and 65% of the cost of dependent care coverage!\xa0We also offer flexible PTO and some WFH opportunities as needed.', 'A breadth of technical aptitude to talk shop to our engineers Ambitious, accountable, and be a self-starter', 'Get involved in customers calls on occasion to discuss future product directions\xa0', 'Participate in security conference to increase awareness on online fraud and abuse', 'We also offer flexible PTO and some WFH opportunities as needed.', 'Follow evolution of privacy features introduced by browser vendors, assess possible impact for the product and propose necessary adjustment as needed.\xa0', 'Proven track record of successful application of ML to resolve hard problems\xa0', 'We are a fast-growing startup that is disrupting the fraud industry by putting the control back into the hands of digital businesses with an innovative approach that bankrupts the underlying business model of fraudsters. Our fraud and abuse prevention platform combines real-time intelligence, rich analytics and adaptive step-up challenges to progressively diminish the profitability of attacks while adapting to evolving attack patterns. We offer the only fraud solution with a 100% SLA guarantee. The world’s largest brands trust us to protect their customer journey while delivering unrivaled customer experience.']

['', '\xa0', 'Excellent written and communication skills', "WHAT YOU'LL DO", 'Identify and explore new opportunities through creative research methods and co-design sessions to help define product roadmaps, vision, and strategy', 'Previous experience driving research programs that have had a lasting impact on product and design decisions', "As a User Experience Researcher, your mission is to advise and influence product decisions with outstanding insights about people and technology. You deeply impact the business, product, and technology decisions guiding the development of the mobile app. You'll play an integral role in crystallizing user problems, project vision, and strategy to find inspiring new ways to help users connect with one another.", 'BASIC QUALIFICATIONS', 'BA/BS or MS degree in Journalism, Human-Computer Interaction, Statistics, Psychology, Computer Science, Anthropology, Communications, Information Science, Sociology, or equivalent practical experienceTrack record of demonstrating excellent command of research questions within a given domain and of technical tools for the analysis of data within that domainPrevious experience driving research programs that have had a lasting impact on product and design decisions', 'BA/BS or MS degree in Journalism, Human-Computer Interaction, Statistics, Psychology, Computer Science, Anthropology, Communications, Information Science, Sociology, or equivalent practical experience', 'Adapt and innovate research methods to meet product needs by delivering high-quality insights in a fast-paced work environment, and by contextualizing for specific use cases across the user base.', 'Collaborate with design, product managers, marketing, and engineers to ensure research you deliver is coordinated into every aspect of the product and provides a holistic view of our users', 'ABOUT THE ROLE', 'We’re building a location based app that helps gay, bi, queer men and trans people connect with one another. We aim to help people find what they’re looking for in a fast, effective, and respectful way, whether that’s dating, hooking up, or friends.', 'Ability to work effectively with a remote team', 'Track record of demonstrating excellent command of research questions within a given domain and of technical tools for the analysis of data within that domain', 'PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:', 'User Experience Researcher - Part-time, remote', '2 + years of professional experience conducting user research, including conducting and synthesizing qualitative and quantitative researchExcellent written and communication skillsAbility to work effectively with a remote team', 'Design and conduct qualitative studies, including field observations and interviews, remote and in-person usability studies for existing and future products', 'Our new mobile app design and research focuses not just on the functional, but also on joy and delight. We are on a mission to help the queer community find meaningful connections with one another using digital technology.', 'Design and conduct quantitative studies, such as structuring and analyzing surveys to evaluate the impact of product changes and capture insights at scale', '2 + years of professional experience conducting user research, including conducting and synthesizing qualitative and quantitative research', 'We welcome curious and passionable people from all backgrounds who seek the opportunity to work in a collaborative, motivated, fast-paced environment.', 'Synthesize and communicate research findings to advise business decisions through rich storytelling via presentations, reports, workshops and any other novel, creative approaches that you invent', 'Always champion our user experience', 'Design and conduct qualitative studies, including field observations and interviews, remote and in-person usability studies for existing and future productsDesign and conduct quantitative studies, such as structuring and analyzing surveys to evaluate the impact of product changes and capture insights at scaleIdentify and explore new opportunities through creative research methods and co-design sessions to help define product roadmaps, vision, and strategyCollaborate with design, product managers, marketing, and engineers to ensure research you deliver is coordinated into every aspect of the product and provides a holistic view of our usersSynthesize and communicate research findings to advise business decisions through rich storytelling via presentations, reports, workshops and any other novel, creative approaches that you inventAdapt and innovate research methods to meet product needs by delivering high-quality insights in a fast-paced work environment, and by contextualizing for specific use cases across the user base.Always champion our user experience']

['', '\xa0', 'Job Title: Data Engineer', '• Self-starter with the ability to work independently or as part of a project team.', '• 1+ years of experience working on AWS.', '• Experience working with relational databases.', '• Great written and verbal communication skills.', '• Capability to conduct performance analysis, troubleshooting and remediation.', '• 3+ years of experience working with SQL.', 'Description:', 'Location: Sunnyvale, CA/Remote', '• 3+ years relevant working with Redshift, SQL, Python, Airflow and AWS data technologies.', 'Be part of Data Engineering team responsible for Data Analytics Platform servicing the business needs of the broader organization.', 'Duration: 6+ months', '• Experience with code management tools (e.g. Git, SVN) and DevOps tools (e.g. CICD).', '• Exposure to open source and proprietary cloud data pipeline tools such as Airflow, and Glue.', '• Experience with setting up and operating data pipelines using Python or SQL.', 'Qualifications:', '• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering, or related discipline.', 'Note: Local to CA candidates preferred, would be completely remote.', '• Understanding of data architecture concepts such as data modeling, metadata, workflow management, ETL/ELT, real-time streaming), data quality.']

['', 'About This Job', ' Strong understanding of MDM best practices, and experienced with MDM implementations ', ' Work with closely with the Product Manager, Business Analyst and Architect to understand business and functional requirements, strategy and approach, and lead a team to come up with solution design.  Contribute with hands on development, implementation, testing, maintenance, and support data integrations for the Vehicle MDM team.  Design, build and test highly scalable data pipelines with monitoring and logging best practices.  Conduct RCA (Root Cause Analysis) for system applications  Design, develop and implement MDM Reltio Security Roles, MDM UI functionality, and Match and Merge Rules for complex entity relationships through Reltio configuration.  Maintain and performance tune the Reltio configuration codebase.  Define, develop and implement business process workflows through Reltio UI for maintenance of RDM data.  Collaborate with several Product and Technology teams to lead system integration testing, problem solving and troubleshooting.  Mentor junior and mid-level Data Engineers in design, problem solving and troubleshooting. ['', 'Advocate for user research principles', 'Collaborate with product teams to develop research goals, identify tasks and scenarios, and establish a test environment', 'Our client in Raleigh, NC is seeking a Sr. User Researcher to join their team. This is a 6 month contract to hire. the position would be remote to start, but will eventually move back to on-site in Raleigh.\xa0', 'TOP REQUIREMENTS:', '*** Cannot provide sponsorship upon conversion.', 'Gather insights and validate solutions with users using quantitative and qualitative research methods in order to inform design decisions: 5+ years experience', 'Create and deliver test result reports including statistical analysis', 'b. Video vs. phone? Video/phone', 'INTERVIEW PROCESS: WebEx where the interviewee will share their screen and walk through work samples that highlight work theyve done using various research methods.', 'Experience in creating research roadmaps, journey maps, personas, research plans, moderator guides, and research reports: 5+ years experience\xa0', 'LOCATION: Will start remotely, but will be expected to return to office once COVID-19 restrictions are lifted.', 'TEAM STRUCTURE: Our team functions as a consultancy so the team composition will vary. The candidate should be able to work as the sole researcher on a project and should be able to handle conducting research for concurrent projects.', 'c. How technical will the interviews be? The candidate will be asked questions related to research methods, their experience incorporating research into agile processes, etc.', 'Gather insights and validate solutions with users using quantitative and qualitative research methods in order to inform design decisions: 5+ years experienceExperience in creating research roadmaps, journey maps, personas, research plans, moderator guides, and research reports: 5+ years experience\xa0Proven ability to manage multiple research requests in a timely fashion, with competing priorities and deadlines. 5+ year experience', 'Proven ability to manage multiple research requests in a timely fashion, with competing priorities and deadlines. 5+ year experience', 'Design, conduct, analyze, and report data gathered from qualitative and quantitative research techniques including key-stroke level modeling (KLM), usability testing, contextual inquiry / field studies, surveys, interviews, heuristic evaluations, focus groups, card sorts, ethnography and persona development, and rapid iterative testing within an Agile environment.', 'a. How many rounds? 3', 'PROJECT: The candidate will be working on a project called Field Connect. The position requires experience identifying the appropriate research method needed at various points within the software development lifecycle based on questions the product team would like to have answered and where the product is within the development process. The candidate should be able to create and maintain a research roadmap outlining research methods that should be conducted for various features/functions throughout the year and should be able to plan, conduct, and report findings from each research activity.', '*** What experience will set candidates apart from one another? Work samples that showcase the ability to communicate complex concepts clearly and persuasively across different audiences and varying levels of an organization. Understanding and application of benchmark testing, confidence intervals, NPS ratings, conversion rate research and reporting, regression analysis and SUS or SUPR-Q will also set the candidate apart.', 'Collaborate with product teams to remediate issues identified from research', 'IDEAL BACKGROUND: Healthcare is preferred, but more importantly were looking for someone with experience conducting both qualitative and quantitative research methods. Wed like to see work samples of artifacts such as a moderators guide, a usability test script, a usability report, etc..', 'Establish research and usability metrics strategies for project teams.', 'Work with product teams to identify and prioritize user research requirements, including timelines, scope, and methodologies']

job_title: Postdoctoral Researcher in High-Energy Density Physics
company: Oak Ridge Institute for Science and Education
job_text: ['', 'The Air Force Institute of Technology, or AFIT, located at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the Air Force’s graduate school of engineering and management as well as its institution for technical professional continuing education. A component of Air University and Air Education and Training Command, AFIT is committed to providing defense-focused graduate and professional continuing education and research to sustain the technological supremacy of America’s air, space and cyber forces.', 'Participants are eligible to purchase health insurance through ORISE.', 'The applicant\xa0should have knowledge and experience in experimental ultrafast laser-matter interactions. Prior work experiences in experimental high-energy density Physics, Plasma Physics and/or Laser-Based Diagnostics are desirable but not necessary. Opportunity\xa0is open only to U.S. citizens.', 'AFIT.\xa0', 'Qualifications', 'Relocation Allowance', 'The participant will not enter into an employee/employer relationship with ORISE, ORAU, DOD, or any other office or agency.\xa0Instead, the participant will be affiliated with ORISE for the administration of the appointment through the ORISE appointment letter and Terms of Appointment.', 'Under the guidance of a mentor, participants will assist U.S. Air Force Institute of Technology (AFIT) faculty and staff in developing novel entangling gates for superconducting transmon qubits intended for quantum computations, in particular in modeling the coupling to Meissner screening currents in a superconducting island connected to transmon qubits. Participants may also contribute to research in one of several areas of topological quantum computing, including modelling of Majorana states in topological phases, their manipulation (braiding) and measurement, and developing algorithms for translating arbitrary multiple qubit operations into braiding transformations. Participants will hone their technical skills by helping AFIT researchers develop a more reliable physical implementation of quantum computing, an area which is currently of great interest to a variety of Department of Defense (DOD) sponsors.', 'Health Insurance Supplement.\xa0Participants are eligible to purchase health insurance through ORISE.', 'Participant Benefits', 'Nature of Appointment', 'Training and Travel Allowance', 'Appointment Length', 'Participants will receive a stipend to be determined by\xa0AFIT.\xa0Stipends are typically based on the participant’s academic standing, discipline, experience, and research facility location.\xa0Other benefits may include the following:', 'Health Insurance Supplement.\xa0Participants are eligible to purchase health insurance through ORISE.Relocation AllowanceTraining and Travel Allowance', 'This appointment is a twelve month research appointment, with the possibility to be renewed for additional research periods. Appointments may be extended depending on funding availability, project assignment, program rules, and availability of the participant.']

job_title: Epidemiologist/Associate Data Scientist– Dept of Ophthalmology
job_text: ['', 'Participates in the writing of grants for submission to funding agencies.', 'Presentation, Manuscript Preparation, Grant Writing', 'Supervision Received', 'PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS: ', 'Provides functional supervision for research assistants, study coordinators and other study personnel. May also direct and supervise students, fellows and other temporary personnel working on research projects.', 'Oversees programmer and data managers to achieve the goals of the study.', 'Interprets results and helps plan future investigations together with the Director.', 'Must have a demonstrated aptitude for scientific writing and possess excellent written and verbal skills.', 'Knowledge of SAS programming and analyses needed.', 'Must possess strong quantitative, analytical abilities for study design and implementation.', 'Oversee personnel training and functional supervision, adherence to study protocols and manuals of procedures, to ensure efficient data acquisition, data management, and quality control.Provides functional supervision for research assistants, study coordinators and other study personnel. May also direct and supervise students, fellows and other temporary personnel working on research projects.', 'Other Responsibilities', 'Presents study results at scientific meetings and assists in the preparation of abstracts and manuscripts on which he/she is co-author.', 'Master’s Degree in Epidemiology or equivalent required. Doctorate degree in epidemiology or equivalent degree preferred.', 'Study Design and Planning:', 'Other duties and/or projects as assigned.', 'Environmental Working Conditions', 'Master’s Degree in Epidemiology or equivalent required. Doctorate degree in epidemiology or equivalent degree preferred.3 years experience in the design and conduct of epidemiologic investigations.A background in project management including personnel training and supervision is also required.Must possess strong quantitative, analytical abilities for study design and implementation.Knowledge of SAS programming and analyses needed.A thorough understanding of computer operations and extensive experience working with statistical and data management software are essential.Must have a demonstrated aptitude for scientific writing and possess excellent written and verbal skills.Excellent interpersonal communication skills are essential to provide clear direction to staff.', '3 years experience in the design and conduct of epidemiologic investigations.', 'Designs and performs statistical analyses in collaboration with a consultant and may direct others in this function.', 'Working with the Director, helps plan research studies and analyses, involving formulating research hypotheses and designing investigations to test them, assessing study feasibility, developing study protocols, and maintaining contact with outside investigators for collaborative studies. Will leverage a large database and biorepository within the Center. Must also have skills for accessing and analyzing publicly available on-line databases.', 'Presents study results at scientific meetings and assists in the preparation of abstracts and manuscripts on which he/she is co-author.Participates in the writing of grants for submission to funding agencies.', 'Personnel', 'A background in project management including personnel training and supervision is also required.', 'Required Qualifications', 'Oversee personnel training and functional supervision, adherence to study protocols and manuals of procedures, to ensure efficient data acquisition, data management, and quality control.', 'Essential Functions', 'Assess computer and technology needs of the Center and make recommendations based on available departmental resources.', 'Assess computer and technology needs of the Center and make recommendations based on available departmental resources.Other duties and/or projects as assigned.', 'A thorough understanding of computer operations and extensive experience working with statistical and data management software are essential.', 'Excellent interpersonal communication skills are essential to provide clear direction to staff.', 'Responsible for data management together with a database consultant.Designs and performs statistical analyses in collaboration with a consultant and may direct others in this function.Oversees programmer and data managers to achieve the goals of the study.Interprets results and helps plan future investigations together with the Director.', 'Responsible for data management together with a database consultant.', 'SUPERVISION EXERCISED: ', 'Position Summary', 'Project Management, Statistical Analyses & Interpretation Of Results']

['', 'Please note: ', 'About me:', "If you're an accomplished Data or Machine Learning Scientist and have either founded a successful startup and/or have worked for a market-leading company in AI and would like to help launch a ground-floor opportunity we're really excited about, I'd like to hear from you.", "We're looking for a Co-Founder to partner with an accomplished industry veteran we have known for many years for an upcoming AI-first investment of ours, which is still in incubation. While I can't give too many details out yet, it's an autoML company that is looking to create novel algorithms/models dealing with data sparsity issues in the enterprise.", "I am a full-time, salaried employee of Greylock, and there are no fees associated with any of the work I do. My team provides free candidate referrals/introductions to all of our active investments (one of the many services we provide), and I'm always looking to add new people to our network of talent.", 'Please note: Due to the volume of applicants I typically receive, a follow-up email will not be sent unless a match is identified (sorry). And since this is a stealth opportunity, I will not be able to share too many details about it up front either.']

job_title: Quantum Algorithms Researcher (Quantum Computing, Software, Python)
job_text: ['', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A collaborative team and culture that truly looks after talent and cultivates success', 'We are currently seeking a Quantum Algorithms Researcher (Quantum Computing, Software, Python) to join a Bay Area startup ($15 million Series A) whose vision is to break through the global market with their unique, patented quantum computing software. As a Quantum Algorithms Researcher in our company, you will work alongside our world-renowned team of Quantum Algorithms experts hailing from top universities (MIT, Stanford, University of Oxford) helping develop and optimize quantum algorithms for the acceleration of state-of-the-art NISQ hardware.', 'Quantum Algorithms Researcher (Quantum Computing, Software, Python)', 'QAOA, Quantum Approximate Optimization Algorithm, Variational Quantum Eigensolver, VQE Algorithm', 'As a VC-funded startup in the Bay Area, we are keen on bringing in exceptional researchers and developers to aid in developing novel algorithms for cutting-edge quantum computing hardware to be made easily accessible by not only quantum computing experts, but any classically-trained developer or data scientist using any process including binary optimization, machine learning, chemistry simulation, and more.', "Key Skills: Quantum Computing, Quantum Algorithms, Machine Learning, Research, Shor's Algorithm, Grover's Algorithm, Quantum Computation, Quantum Information, Quantum Entanglement, Quantum Superposition, QAOA, Quantum Approximate Optimization Algorithm, Variational Quantum Eigensolver, VQE Algorithm", 'An ideal Quantum Algorithm Researcher will have experience developing and publishing work on quantum algorithms, as well as familiarity with machine/deep learning.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Intellectual challenges that you would not experience in most companies.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Competitive salaries, equity and benefits packages', "Key Skills: Quantum Computing, Quantum Algorithms, Machine Learning, Research, Shor's Algorithm, Grover's Algorithm, Quantum Computation, Quantum Information, Quantum Entanglement, Quantum Superposition,", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A chance to develop novel quantum algorithms alongside world-renowned quantum algorithms experts', 'We can offer a\xa0Quantum Algorithms Researcher:']

['', 'Analyze and improve the efficiency, scalability, and stability of data collection, storage, and retrieval processes for our core systems.Create and manage platform-specific APIs.Create new data processing systems as necessary to support our Data Scientists and Research Analysts.Ultimately, build robust, high-volume production software.', 'Create and manage platform-specific APIs.', 'Solid foundation in computer science, with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms and software design.', 'At Samba TV, we are on a mission to fundamentally change television viewing for everyone. We are doing this by leveraging our data to enable advertisers to engage and measure TV viewers across all their devices. We have an amazing story with a unique perspective formed by innovative technology.', 'Create new data processing systems as necessary to support our Data Scientists and Research Analysts.', 'Help us transform the TV viewing experience for everyone!', 'Core Viewership is responsible for the data processing pipelines that produce key datasets consumed by our data scientists, research analysts, and external customers, as well as power our analytics platform. This team deals with data at scale — on a continuous basis, we ingest, process, and ultimately make sense of incoming viewing data from millions of televisions.', 'Ultimately, build robust, high-volume production software.', '3+ years of professional development experience building high-performance, large-scale applications/pipelines.', 'Excellent problem solving skills. Ability to interpret and analyze data is a must. Consequently, mathematical inclination is a major plus.', 'Strong command of a programming language or two – while we code primarily in Python, we acknowledge that engineers with sound fundamentals can pick up new languages relatively quickly.Excellent problem solving skills. Ability to interpret and analyze data is a must. Consequently, mathematical inclination is a major plus.3+ years of professional development experience building high-performance, large-scale applications/pipelines.Solid foundation in computer science, with strong competencies in data structures, algorithms and software design.Experience with Hadoop, Spark, or similar technologies is desirable.Experience with running production systems on AWS is also a plus.', 'Responsibilities', 'Requirements', 'Analyze and improve the efficiency, scalability, and stability of data collection, storage, and retrieval processes for our core systems.', 'Experience with running production systems on AWS is also a plus.', 'Strong command of a programming language or two – while we code primarily in Python, we acknowledge that engineers with sound fundamentals can pick up new languages relatively quickly.', 'As a member of this team, you will help architect, build, operate, and maintain our data pipelines responsible for aggregating television viewing data and deriving metrics and insights that power a variety of our data products and offerings. You will not only work on our pipeline jobs, but you will also have the opportunity to help build out and further evolve our internal frameworks upon which we process and deliver data at scale.', 'Experience with Hadoop, Spark, or similar technologies is desirable.']

['', '• Partner with designers, UX researchers, product managers, engineers, and other technical roles to conduct and share research in a dynamic and rapidly changing environment', 'You may be a good fit for our team if you have:', '• 4+ years of professional experience conducting research in enterprise software', 'As a UX researcher (UXR), through your dedication to understanding our users’ needs and behaviors, you will empower teams across Design, Product Management, and Engineering to deliver the best user experience possible. To help our product teams successfully deliver customer-focused solutions, you will engage with customers to conduct user research, both tactical and strategic, to inform product and design direction with the customer’s voice.', 'Nice To Have', '• Conduct research using a wide variety of qualitative methods, and interpret analysis through the lens of UX, HCI, and social science', '• Strong organizational skills and keen attention to detail', '• Familiarity with infrastructure management concepts', '• Work closely with product teams to identify meaningful research questions and choose methodologies that will most effectively answer them', '• Understanding of accessibility standards', '• Technical fluency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, etc. and framework awareness', 'In This Role, You Can Expect To', '• Experience researching products for technical audiences, across multiple interfaces (Web UIs, CLIs, and APIs to name a few)', '• Generate insights and deliver compelling presentations of your findings that shape how product teams think about medium and long-term product strategy', '• Knowledge of qualitative and user-centered research methods (e.g., interviewing, surveys, ethnography, co-design, concept-testing, heuristic evaluations, etc.)', '• Experience conducting all aspects of user research operations, including screening and recruiting participants; scheduling; data collection; and analysis and organization of that data.', 'About The Role', '• Bachelor’s or Graduate degree in Psychology, HCI, Sociology, Anthropology, Information Science, or similar field, or equivalent experience']

['', 'The Field HEOR Scientist is a field-based position.The position has two main responsibilities, conducting health economics and outcomes research as a part of a cross-functional matrix team in an internal-facing role, and leading the medical interface with key access customers in a field-facing role.The HEOR Scientist will be responsible for collaborating on the development and implementation of the US HEOR strategy, plans, and research.They work closely with the home office medical teams to develop, interpret, and disseminate data/information assessing the medical value of BMS assets and must have experience executing all phases of the research process.The HEOR Scientist will be required to direct research strategy to ensure BMS answers key questions in the health care marketplace driven by direct payer insights in accordance with Company policies and in collaboration with the home office medical matrix team.In addition, the HEOR Scientist will lead Health Economics and Outcomes Research for any given therapeutic area.The HEOR Scientist will concentrate their field-facing activities on specific accounts which include regional managed care accounts, and key integrated delivery networks in order to facilitate appropriate patient access, medical policy, coverage, and reimbursement for all BMS portfolio assets.They are responsible for developing sustainable customer relationships and discussing comprehensive scientific, health economic, epidemiology, and quality of life information.The HEOR Scientist will work closely with the commercial Account Executives, MSLs, and home office medical matrix teams.', 'They work closely with the home office medical teams to develop, interpret, and disseminate data/information assessing the medical value of BMS assets and must have experience executing all phases of the research process.', 'Demonstrated expertise in health economics and outcomes research, candidate should include their publication list.', 'Minimum five years of previous work experience in the pharmaceutical, managed care, or consulting industries with a primary focus on Market Access (public or private payers) with specific experience conducting health economics and outcomes research in all stages of the research process', 'Demonstrated strong problem solving and communications skills.', 'The HEOR Scientist will be responsible for collaborating on the development and implementation of the US HEOR strategy, plans, and research.', 'Flexibility to travel is required.', 'Qualifications', 'Ability to drive a company-provided car is an essential qualification of this position. Candidates must be able to drive a BMS-provided vehicle between locations (often a great distances apart), and arrive at each location ready and able to enthusiastically and efficiently demonstrate an applied knowledge of pertinent health care industry trends. Candidates must possess a high level of ethics, integrity and responsible and safe driving history.', 'Must possess the ability to understand, interpret and make recommendations concerning the evolving US healthcare marketplace and comparative effectiveness research.', 'The HEOR Scientist will be required to direct research strategy to ensure BMS answers key questions in the health care marketplace driven by direct payer insights in accordance with Company policies and in collaboration with the home office medical matrix team.', 'The Field HEOR Scientist is a field-based position.', 'Must have a proven ability to build customer relationships.', 'The HEOR Scientist will concentrate their field-facing activities on specific accounts which include regional managed care accounts, and key integrated delivery networks in order to facilitate appropriate patient access, medical policy, coverage, and reimbursement for all BMS portfolio assets.', 'They are responsible for developing sustainable customer relationships and discussing comprehensive scientific, health economic, epidemiology, and quality of life information.', ' a driver’s license in good standing issued by your state of residence; and, 3) a driving risk level deemed acceptable by the Company.', 'The amount will depend on geographic location of customers & home base.', 'Responsibilities', 'In addition, the HEOR Scientist will lead Health Economics and Outcomes Research for any given therapeutic area.', 'Ability to drive a company-provided car is an essential qualification of this position. Candidates must be able to drive a BMS-provided vehicle between locations (often a great distances apart), and arrive at each location ready and able to enthusiastically and efficiently demonstrate an applied knowledge of pertinent health care industry trends. Candidates must possess a high level of ethics, integrity and responsible and safe driving history.Doctoral trained professional (PhD, PharmD, MD) with an emphasis in health services research, health economics research, public health, health services, or related field.A Masters level degree will be considered if degree is specific to health economics or outcomes research, with appropriate clinical background and years of experience.Minimum five years of previous work experience in the pharmaceutical, managed care, or consulting industries with a primary focus on Market Access (public or private payers) with specific experience conducting health economics and outcomes research in all stages of the research processDemonstrated expertise in health economics and outcomes research, candidate should include their publication list.Must possess the ability to understand, interpret and make recommendations concerning the evolving US healthcare marketplace and comparative effectiveness research.Must have a proven ability to build customer relationships.Demonstrated strong problem solving and communications skills.Flexibility to travel is required.The amount will depend on geographic location of customers & home base.', 'The position has two main responsibilities, conducting health economics and outcomes research as a part of a cross-functional matrix team in an internal-facing role, and leading the medical interface with key access customers in a field-facing role.', 'Doctoral trained professional (PhD, PharmD, MD) with an emphasis in health services research, health economics research, public health, health services, or related field.', 'A Masters level degree will be considered if degree is specific to health economics or outcomes research, with appropriate clinical background and years of experience.', 'The HEOR Scientist will work closely with the commercial Account Executives, MSLs, and home office medical matrix teams.']

At the same time, these processes often follow well-defined rules, abide by industry standardization, and have become increasingly\xa0data-rich. ', 'Master’s Degree in a Data Science related field (e.g. Epidemiology, Biostatistics, Pharmacoeconomics, Health Economic and Outcomes Research) and 16 years of direct related experience; or PhD (highly preferred) and 12 years of experience.', 'Contributing to the primary strategic and operational responsibility for the design, execution, and reporting of RWD studies using a variety of available research and commercial healthcare databases.', 'Developing RWD study protocols and leading analysis projects supporting evidence needs of IVD and CDS product portfolio. Many positions throughout the company will remain fully remote.*Our MissionTo actively connect people to their next great opportunity.Who We AreZipRecruiter is a leading online employment marketplace. ZipRecruiter has the #1 rated job search app on iOS & Android.Summary Of JobWe use statistical science to understand how to construct an efficient and optimized market, understand causality, and drive our future investment. We use machine learning techniques to solve challenging problems so that we optimally match candidates and jobs. This includes NLP and deep learning along with pragmatic use of simpler machine learning approaches and heuristics.We\'re looking for an experienced Data Scientist with a passion for problem-solving to join our team of data scientists and help solve new and existing challenges. Coming up with new analysis and understanding, building models, developing high quality, high-performance code and constantly improving the solution and expanding its scope.Key Focuses  You\'ll be joining a team of software engineers, data scientists, and ML engineers working on interesting problems in the fields of recommendations, search, and NLP. ['', 'Requisition Number:', ' Apply various optimization techniques to generate solutions to large-scale optimization problems for KPMG clients, such as resource planning, scheduling, facility location, portfolio optimization, and pricing/revenue optimization. Techniques include but are not limited to linear/mixed-integer programming with commercial (e.g. CPLEX) as well as open-source solvers (e.g. CBC), dynamic programming, heuristics, metaheuristics, and more. ', ' Proficiency in programming languages (e.g. Python, R, C++, Julia), data analysis packages (e.g.scikit-learn, pyomo) as well as the ability to implement, maintain, debug and test; experience in commercial optimization solvers (e.g. CPLEX, Gurobi, Xpress) ', ' Professional experience with high proficiency in the use of Microsoft Office programs (Word, PowerPoint, Excel); ', ' Bachelors Degree in Operations Research, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Industrial Engineering, or related field from an accredited college or university with 1+ years of professional services experience  Professional knowledge of advanced analytical concepts, particularly ModSim (Modeling & Simulation), Optimization and Machine Learning;  Experience utilizing a strong mathematical background with advanced knowledge in one or more of the following fields: discrete optimization, integer programming (including commercial optimization solvers), discrete-event simulation, dynamic programming, local search heuristics, genetic algorithms, or other metaheuristics  Proficiency in programming languages (e.g. Python, R, C++, Julia), data analysis packages (e.g.scikit-learn, pyomo) as well as the ability to implement, maintain, debug and test; experience in commercial optimization solvers (e.g. CPLEX, Gurobi, Xpress)  Experience in software development using version control (Git), unit testing, Jira, and Confluence.  Ability to work with team members and clients to assess needs, provide assistance, and resolve problems, using excellent problem-solving skills, verbal/written communication, and the ability to present and explain technical concepts to business audiences  Professional experience with high proficiency in the use of Microsoft Office programs (Word, PowerPoint, Excel);  Ability to travel up to 80% of the time; Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States without the need for visa sponsorship now or in the future ', ' Experience utilizing a strong mathematical background with advanced knowledge in one or more of the following fields: discrete optimization, integer programming (including commercial optimization solvers), discrete-event simulation, dynamic programming, local search heuristics, genetic algorithms, or other metaheuristics ', ' Process structured, unstructured and semi-structured data and apply data cleaning, data imputation and feature engineering methods prior to developing models ', ' Ability to work with team members and clients to assess needs, provide assistance, and resolve problems, using excellent problem-solving skills, verbal/written communication, and the ability to present and explain technical concepts to business audiences ', 'Qualifications', ' Come up with innovative, repeatable, business use cases for real world optimization techniques, and quickly develop prototypes to test these use cases ', ' Utilize a diverse array of technologies and tools as needed, to deliver insights, such as Python, R, Julia, C++, Tableau, and more ', ' Apply various optimization techniques to generate solutions to large-scale optimization problems for KPMG clients, such as resource planning, scheduling, facility location, portfolio optimization, and pricing/revenue optimization. Techniques include but are not limited to linear/mixed-integer programming with commercial (e.g. CPLEX) as well as open-source solvers (e.g. CBC), dynamic programming, heuristics, metaheuristics, and more.  Develop and employ simulation models (Discrete Event, Agent-Based, and System Dynamics modeling) by using simulation software AnyLogic (Preferred), NetLogo, Simulink and/or ARENA  Process structured, unstructured and semi-structured data and apply data cleaning, data imputation and feature engineering methods prior to developing models  Develop predictive models using Machine Learning (e.g. classification, clustering, regression, dimensionality reduction methods), Natural Language Processing (OCR, information extraction), and statistical analysis methods such as time-series analysis,statistical inference, and validation tools;perform exploratory data analyses, generate and test working hypotheses, prepare and analyze historical data, and identify patterns  Work directly with KPMG clients and stakeholders to present and explain the key techniques and major results generated using non-technical language; understand client feedback and be able to accommodate it into model through programming  Come up with innovative, repeatable, business use cases for real world optimization techniques, and quickly develop prototypes to test these use cases  Utilize a diverse array of technologies and tools as needed, to deliver insights, such as Python, R, Julia, C++, Tableau, and more ', ' Work directly with KPMG clients and stakeholders to present and explain the key techniques and major results generated using non-technical language; understand client feedback and be able to accommodate it into model through programming ', 'Responsibilities', ' Experience in software development using version control (Git), unit testing, Jira, and Confluence. ', ' Bachelors Degree in Operations Research, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Industrial Engineering, or related field from an accredited college or university with 1+ years of professional services experience ', ' Develop and employ simulation models (Discrete Event, Agent-Based, and System Dynamics modeling) by using simulation software AnyLogic (Preferred), NetLogo, Simulink and/or ARENA ', ' Ability to travel up to 80% of the time; Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States without the need for visa sponsorship now or in the future ', ' Develop predictive models using Machine Learning (e.g. classification, clustering, regression, dimensionality reduction methods), Natural Language Processing (OCR, information extraction), and statistical analysis methods such as time-series analysis,statistical inference, and validation tools;perform exploratory data analyses, generate and test working hypotheses, prepare and analyze historical data, and identify patterns ', ' Professional knowledge of advanced analytical concepts, particularly ModSim (Modeling & Simulation), Optimization and Machine Learning; ', 'Description']

job_title: Senior Data Analyst - Data Scientist Manager
job_text: ['', ' Analyze and model both structured and unstructured data to generate value using R and Python', ' Must have experience in Software Engineering Techniques, Software Engineering Architecture, Software Engineering Lifecycle and Data Management.', 'About Capgemini', ' Qualifications: 6-8 years (2 years min relevant experience in the role) experience, Bachelor’s Degree. Must have experience in Software Engineering Techniques, Software Engineering Architecture, Software Engineering Lifecycle and Data Management. Should be proficient in Business Analysis, Business Knowledge, Software Engineering Leadership, Architecture Knowledge and Technical Solution Design.', ' Work in a collaborative environment with global teams to drive client engagements in a broad range of industries to design and build scalable AI and Machine Learning solutions to solve business problems and create value by leveraging client data Work with team to quickly understand client needs, develop solutions, and collaboratively present findings to client executives Collaborate with team to provide data-driven recommendations and solutions to clients by clearly articulating complex technical concepts through generation and delivery of presentations Analyze and model both structured and unstructured data to generate value using R and Python 6+ years of professional work experience as a data scientist or on advanced analytics / statistics projects with 5+ years’ experience in one of the following sectors: Aerospace & Defense, Automotive, Banking, Consumer Products & Retail, Financial Services, Healthcare, High Tech, Industrial Products, Insurance, Life Sciences, Manufacturing, Public Sector, Telecom, Media & Entertainment, and Energy & Utilities. Master’s degree or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, Economics, Mathematics, or other closely related field using R and Python Graph Theory work, potentially NEO4J Experience with Deep Learning methods in NLP & Computer Vision, Sentiment analysis, topic modeling and graph theory and databases Experience with common data science tools such as Python, R, Pytorch, TensorFlow, Keras, NLTK, Spacy, or Neo4j, and a good understanding of modelling platforms (Azure AutoML, SageMaker, DataBricks, DataRobot and H2O.ai) Delivery/Solution should be in the Cloud Space (AWS,Azure). Solution Architect Experience.', 'Job', ' 6+ years of professional work experience as a data scientist or on advanced analytics / statistics projects with 5+ years’ experience in one of the following sectors: Aerospace & Defense, Automotive, Banking, Consumer Products & Retail, Financial Services, Healthcare, High Tech, Industrial Products, Insurance, Life Sciences, Manufacturing, Public Sector, Telecom, Media & Entertainment, and Energy & Utilities.', ' Should be proficient in Business Analysis, Business Knowledge, Software Engineering Leadership, Architecture Knowledge and Technical Solution Design.', 'Required Skills And Experience', ' Work with team to quickly understand client needs, develop solutions, and collaboratively present findings to client executives', 'Schedule', ' Graph Theory work, potentially NEO4J', ' Master’s degree or PhD in Computer Science, Statistics, Economics, Mathematics, or other closely related field using R and Python', 'Primary Location', ' Experience with Deep Learning methods in NLP & Computer Vision, Sentiment analysis, topic modeling and graph theory and databases', ' Delivery/Solution should be in the Cloud Space (AWS,Azure). Solution Architect Experience.', ' Experience with common data science tools such as Python, R, Pytorch, TensorFlow, Keras, NLTK, Spacy, or Neo4j, and a good understanding of modelling platforms (Azure AutoML, SageMaker, DataBricks, DataRobot and H2O.ai)', 'Organization', ' Qualifications: 6-8 years (2 years min relevant experience in the role) experience, Bachelor’s Degree.', ' Collaborate with team to provide data-driven recommendations and solutions to clients by clearly articulating complex technical concepts through generation and delivery of presentations', ' Work in a collaborative environment with global teams to drive client engagements in a broad range of industries to design and build scalable AI and Machine Learning solutions to solve business problems and create value by leveraging client data']
