['', 'Design and Develop Big Data solutions on different cloud platforms.', '\xa0', '\xa0\xa0HDFS/Hadoop: 5+ years (Preferred)', 'Detail oriented with strong analytical and problem-solving skills.', 'Certifications:', '\xa0\xa0Kafka: 2+ years (Preferred)', '\xa0\xa0Database (Redshift, Snowflake, MySQL, PostgreSQL, MS SQL Server): 7 years (Preferred)', 'Must have worked on upstream and downstream applications along with cloud deployment.', '\xa0\xa0NoSQL Databases: 3+ years (Preferred)', 'Experience working with Big Data eco-system including tools such as HDFS, Nifi, Spark streaming, Map Reduce, Sqoop, HBase, Hive, Impala, Oozie.', "Idexcel's product development team is looking for a senior level data engineer for a permanent hire full-time basis. ", 'Perform data normalization and denormalization where needed.', '\xa0\xa0Writing data pipelines: 4+ years (Preferred)', 'Understand customer requirements and render those as architectural models that will operate at large scale and high performance and advise customers on how to run these architectural models.', 'We are an AWS Advanced level Consulting Partners, hence it gives us an opportunity to work with some of the experts in the AWS community.', 'Must have hands on experience with AWS knowledge.', 'Design and analyze data models, data flows, and integration patterns for structural deficiencies/soundness to build a robust and complete future state model.', 'Works with the teams to plan approach to understand current state architecture', 'Contributing data sources, technologies, interfaces, performance issues and system configurations.', 'Senior Data Engineer ', 'Hands-on experience with commercializing Big Data applications (e.g. configuration management, monitoring, debugging, and security.)', 'Experience implementing Orchestrator like airflow for big data tools.', 'Solid functional understanding of the Open-Source Big Data Technologies and NoSQL databases such as MongoDB or Cassandra.', 'Technical Qualifications:', 'Create/Review logical entities and define their attributes; and define relationships between the various data objects.', '\xa0\xa0AWS Glue/Lambda/EMR/SNS/SQS: 3+ years (Preferred)', '8+ years of experience in Advanced Analytics and Big Data with the minimum implementation of at-least 2-3 projects at the enterprise level.', '\ufeff(Our team is interested to hire a Data Engineer, Data Architect, AWS Solutions Architect or a Cloud Architect as long as the resource has hands-on skills with Spark, Big Data, AWS and Python/Java/Scala).', '\xa0\xa0Python/Spark/Scala: 3+ hands on years (Preferred)', 'Roles and Responsibilities:', 'Effective communicator (both verbal & written).', 'Experience:', '\xa0\xa0Airflow experience: 2+ years (Preferred)', 'Senior Data Engineer', 'Proficiency in one or more modern programming languages like Python or Scala or Spark', 'Experience implementing search functionality using big data tools.', 'Full Job Description', 'IMPORTANT INFO: This is AWS /BIG DATA/ PYSPARK - SPECIFIC POSITION', 'AWS', 'Support multiple Agile Scrum teams with planning, scoping and creation of technical solutions.', 'As we are into both technology consulting services and in the FinTech industry serving banking and financial institutions, this role will have a blend of working hands-on with our team as well as working with our customers in providing on-demand solutions, mostly in AWS environment.', '\xa0\xa0Big Data Analytics: 7 years (Preferred)', 'Hands-on experience in architecting solutions at scale in Big Data.', 'Performance tuning, table partitioning and indexing, process threading, bucketing, UDF and UDAF.', 'Role: ', '\xa0\xa0ETL (Extract Transform Load): 7 years (Preferred)', 'Role:', 'This is AWS /BIG DATA/ PYSPARK - SPECIFIC POSITION', 'IMPORTANT INFO:', 'Apache Spark/Hadoop (Preferred)']

job_title: Postdoctoral Researcher in Resilient Facilities and Infrastructure Engineering
company: Oak Ridge Institute for Science and Education
job_text: ['', '\xa0', '\ufeff', 'Relocation Allowance', 'Participant Benefits', 'Health Insurance Supplement.\xa0Participants are eligible to purchase health insurance through ORISE.Relocation AllowanceTraining and Travel Allowance', 'A strong background in optimization, analysis of interdependencies, and cascading failure of facilities and infrastructure is desired.', 'Qualifications', '\ufeffThis appointment is a twelve month research appointment, with the possibility to be renewed for additional research periods. Appointments may be extended depending on funding availability, project assignment, program rules, and availability of the participant.', "This project directly supports the Tyndall AFB Program Management Office (PMO), which oversees the reconstruction of the installation in the wake of Hurricane Michael. The PMO has been tasked to rethink Tyndall as a power projection platform.\xa0The PMO is rebuilding its current facilities and infrastructure, but also new facilities in support of F-35 mission beddown, to be resilient to future extreme events.\xa0AFIT's role is to support the PMO by proposing novel frameworks to identify future climate risks to Tyndall's mission through facilities and infrastructure, and design optimized installation adaptation pathways that enable the installation to arrive at improved states of resilience prior to future destructive events.", 'Nature of Appointment', 'PhD - Civil Engineering, Industrial Engineering, Facilities Engineering or similar with a focus in resilient facilities and infrastructure engineering', "While AFIT\xa0possesses some skills required to facilitate the partnership with Tyndall's PMO, the Engineering Management Program currently\xa0seeks to bolster its\xa0resilience engineering\xa0team knowledge to assess and model facility and infrastructure interdependencies, compute the probability and consequence of single and cascading failures of networked infrastructure systems, and develop and test the efficacy of asset portfolio adaptation pathways.\xa0\xa0To further this project, AFIT is seeking a\xa0post-doctoral candidate to participate in research that\xa0is needed\xa0at various spatial and temporal resolutions. Under the guidance of a mentor, the selected\xa0candidate\xa0will utilize optimization techniques currently not possessed by AFIT's Engineering Management faculty.\xa0", 'Participants are eligible to purchase health insurance through ORISE.', 'AFIT.\xa0', 'Training and Travel Allowance', 'The participant will not enter into an employee/employer relationship with ORISE, ORAU, DOD, or any other office or agency.\xa0Instead, the participant will be affiliated with ORISE for the administration of the appointment through the ORISE appointment letter and Terms of Appointment.', 'Participants will receive a stipend to be determined by\xa0AFIT.\xa0Stipends are typically based on the participant’s academic standing, discipline, experience, and research facility location.\xa0Other benefits may include the following:', 'The Air Force Institute of Technology, or AFIT, located at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the Air Force’s graduate school of engineering and management as well as its institution for technical professional continuing education. A component of Air University and Air Education and Training Command, AFIT is committed to providing defense-focused graduate and professional continuing education and research to sustain the technological supremacy of America’s air, space and cyber forces.', 'Health Insurance Supplement.\xa0Participants are eligible to purchase health insurance through ORISE.', 'Appointment Length']

['', '\xa0', 'Your talent, our opportunities - This is the premise behind US Tech Solutions.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You will need Critical thinking in human behavioral analysis normally evidenced by Master’s degree level or equivalent on a human centered research course, for example HCI, Psychology, Human Factors, Social Psychology, Anthropology.', 'Job Description\xa0', 'Job Description\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '1.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiarity with experimental design basics, including setup, understanding and explaining trade-offs of method, understanding populations and sampling, familiarity with issues of validity, bias, and the ability to construct or critique possible experimental setups.', 'Mandatory Skills:', '“US Tech is an Equal Opportunity Employer" and “US Citizens & all other parties authorized to work in the US are encouraged to apply." ['', 'If you\'re an accomplished Data or Machine Learning Scientist and would like to work on a ground-floor opportunity where the modeling isn\'t "out of the box", I\'d like to hear from you.', 'About me:', "I am a full-time, salaried employee of Greylock, and there are no fees associated with any of the work I do. My team provides free candidate referrals/introductions to all of our active investments (one of the many services we provide), and I'm always looking to add new people to our network of talent.", "Please note: Due to the volume of applicants I typically receive, a follow-up email will not be sent unless a match is identified (sorry). On top of that, since this is a stealth opportunity with some fairly specific needs that I can't delineate in a job posting, we are going to appear to be highly selective in our applicant screening process.", "We're looking to build out the founding team of an upcoming AI-first investment of ours, which is still in incubation. While I can't give too many details out yet, it's an autoML company that is looking to create novel algorithms/models dealing with data sparsity issues in the enterprise.", 'Please note: ']

investigating open-ended problems and coming up with concrete approaches to solve them.\xa0You can consume research ideas and papers and translate them into production models.\xa0You don't only use machine learning models but can implement many machine learning and statistical learning models from scratch and know when/how to apply them to real world noisy data.\xa0You’re a deeply curious person and eager to learn and grow.\xa0You often think about applications of machine learning in your personal life.\xa0", 'You will have an opportunity to work on a small and growing team based in San Francisco in an environment where engineering is central to what we do. We know that great things can only be done with great teams and look forward to building and working with a great people.\xa0', 'You can consume research ideas and papers and translate them into production models.\xa0', 'Presenting findings, results, and performance metrics to stakeholders.\xa0', 'Responsibilities: ', 'Strong production level programming skills in Python or C++.\xa0', 'Experience wrangling data, writing complex SQL queries and basic bash scripting.\xa0', 'Publications in top conferences (ICML,\xa0NeurIPS, ICLR, ACL, EMNLP, ICCV).\xa0', 'Preferred Qualifications : ', '5+ years industry experience training and shipping production machine learning models.\xa0', 'Every business on the face of Earth must, in some way, do bookkeeping, accounting, and financial planning to operate. At the outset, these functions may seem like mundane facts-of-life in the process of running a business; however, the skill with which a company does them can have a profound impact not only on their business, but also the world.\xa0A poorly forecasted budget,\xa0could mean the abrupt end to the clinical trial of a potentially life-saving drug. On the other hand, a highly accurate hiring plan can lead to successful team growth that allows a company to design a brand-new material that helps reverse climate change.\xa0', 'You often think about applications of machine learning in your personal life.\xa0', "You don't only use machine learning models but can implement many machine learning and statistical learning models from scratch and know when/how to apply them to real world noisy data.\xa0", 'Minimum Qualifications:', 'Today, unfortunately, financial management and services are universally manual, tedious, and error prone. At the same time, these processes often follow well-defined rules, abide by industry standardization, and have become increasingly\xa0data-rich. Our team, within the Medium Segment Native Cloud Solutions at Sage, builds cloud-based AI-powered features and products that fundamentally change the way businesses operate.\xa0', 'You have deep experience\xa0with:\xa0logistic regression, gradient descent, regularization, cross-validation, overfitting, bias, variance, convex optimization, eigenvectors, sampling, latency, computational complexity, sparse matrices.\xa0', 'MS in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Statistics, Physics, or similar quantitative field.\xa0Strong theoretical and mathematical foundations in linear algebra, probability theory, multivariate optimization.\xa0Have a strong intuition into different modeling techniques and their suitability to different problems.\xa0Strong production level programming skills in Python or C++.\xa05+ years of hands-on experience in working with several of:\xa0pytorch,\xa0tensorflow,\xa0numpy,\xa0scipy, scikit-learn, pandas.\xa05+ years industry experience training and shipping production machine learning models.\xa0Experience communicating projects to both technical and non-technical audiences.\xa0', 'MS in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Statistics, Physics, or similar quantitative field.\xa0', 'You’re comfortable with investigating open-ended problems and coming up with concrete approaches to solve them.\xa0', 'Working with machine learning infrastructure engineers to ship models.\xa0', 'You’re a deeply curious person and eager to learn and grow.\xa0', 'PhD in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Statistics, Physics, or similar quantitative fields.\xa0']

['', 'Qualified candidates must have:', '-Demonstrated ability to provide thought leadership and\xa0supervise (or mentor) junior data scientists.', '-Pronounced consulting and influencing skills.', '\ufeff', '-MS/PhD in an analytical field with AT LEAST five years of progressive data analytics/science industry experience in food distribution, retail, CPG or a related industry.', '-At least five years of demonstrated success in database design, data mining, and reporting.', '-Five + years of optimization-oriented, analytical problem solving in an industrial setting with open source tools such as Python and R.', 'Leading food service distributor seeks an optimization expert to provide thought and people leadership throughout the organization. You will provide data driven insights to address key business questions within Supply Chain and beyond. By designing and creating data sets, developing analytical tools and reports, you will support the business, product owner and other members of the Insights and Analytics team. Ultimately, you will collaborate throughout the organization to create sustainable approaches, tools, processes, and programs to solve problems for business partners.']

['Application Process:', 'One of our investments is looking to reimagine the architecture and design of a prominent, large-scale healthcare technology platform (which currently drives over $150M ARR). Led by seasoned experts from Amazon AWS, Cloudera, etc.--this team owns the foundational infrastructure that every data scientist, machine learning, and software engineer in the company relies upon. Sitting\xa0at the bottom of the stack (right above AWS), they often like to bend Kubernetes and Istio to their will to make "magic happen".\xa0 ', 'Application Process: ', ' ', "One of their current projects is to\xa0build cross-cutting features in the dataplane by using and extending state of the art service mesh technologies. If this type of work sounds interesting, I'd love to hear from you =) ", "I am a full-time, salaried employee of Greylock, and there are no fees associated with any of the work I do. My team provides free candidate referrals/introductions to all of our active investments (one of the many services we provide), and I'm always looking to add new people to our network of talent.", 'Greylock Talent: ', 'Due to the volume of applicants we typically receive from our job postings, a follow-up email will not be sent until a match is identified with one of our investments. ', 'Greylock Talent:', "I will contact anyone who looks like a potential match for this opportunity--requesting to schedule a call with you immediately. Once contacted, I'll explain our VC Recruiting model, spend some time getting to know you better, and will discuss various startup opportunities within our portfolio with you as well. "]

job_title: Sr Software Developer - Digital Media Capabilities - REMOTE

['', 'HOW TO APPLY', 'As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, you will be asked to be forward thinking in your approach to applying analytical techniques to advancing the departments capacity in creating unique algorithms and leveraging your NLP expertise. You will add to their implementation for machine learning for both internal and external projects. With a rich and varied dataset to work from, you’ll have the chance to apply your machine learning and algorithmic techniques to all types of data sets to detect trends before anybody else in the world.', 'KEYWORDS', '·\xa0\xa0Experience working with cross-functional teams', 'Data Science, Machine Learning, Information, Technology, Team Lead, Tech Lead, Software Engineering, Software Engineer, AI, Deep Learning, Robotics, NLP', 'USD $165,000 - $185,000 + Great PTO/Benefits + Equity', 'You will need to be a proven problem solver, critical thinker, and have an advanced technical background to join this growing, yet experienced team.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Productionalize models', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0PhD or Master’s in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, or Quantitative Fields', 'This is a start-up supply chain risk company that is changing the way the marketplace reacts and interacts with fluctuations in the market due to phenomena, enterprise, and news. As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, you’ll find yourself working closely with both Data leaders and engineering teams and will enjoy the pace and innovation that runs through the company culture. For those ready for a start up environment, you’ll enjoy the perks that this company can offer you – I hope you bring a good sense of humor!', 'More than anything - You will need proven, commercial experience as a machine learning engineer!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Have strong experience in BERT, spaCy, and TensorFlow', 'A competitive base salary of $165,000 – $185,000 + amazing benefits', 'This is an opportunity for an innovative machine learning engineer to use their expertise in NLP to find trends around the world and identify major correlations on what will happen next. You will work in one of Worlds’ most innovative tech startups where they have captured the global capacity of supply chain relationships. They have seen great success attracting clients and investors because of their completely unique commitment to machine learning in this domain.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Fluency in Python, and ML/NLP Libraries', 'More than anything', 'YOUR QUALIFICATIONS', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Have a great attitude and want to work with a high performing team', 'As a Machine Learning Engineer you will be required to:', 'Please register your interest by sending your CV to Sam Agre via the Apply link on this page.', 'THE COMPANY', 'Washington, DC', '·\xa0\xa0Extensive software engineering experience, working with models end to end', 'THE ROLE', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop end to end AI and machine learning models', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with a cross-functional team of machine learning engineers and OPs', '·\xa0\xa0Commercial experience developing machine learning and deep learning algorithms being put into production', 'THE BENEFITS', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Help innovate the way AI is used within the company', 'Senior Machine Learning Engineer (NLP)']

systems internally and for life science companies.Coordinate with Pall's sales force to respond to customer requests for applications support, system optimization and undertake presentations, job_title: Sr. Threat Analyst and Security Researcher
job_text: ['', 'Position:', ' US Citizenship is required **For over 10 years, Zscaler has been disrupting and transforming the security industry. Our 100% purpose built cloud platform delivers the entire gateway security stack as a service through 150 global data centers to securely connect users to their applications, regardless of device, location, or network in over 185 countries protecting over 4,500 companies and 100 Million threats detected a day.We work in a fast paced, dynamic and make it happen culture. Our people are some of the brightest and passionate in the industry that thrive on being the first to solve problems. We are always looking to hire highly passionate, collaborative and humble people that want to make a difference.ResponsibilitiesIdentify, analyze, and track emerging threats by reverse engineering advanced malware threats and building automated systems to extract threat intelligence for detection and prevention.Articulate findings through technical reports, blogs, media interviews and speaking engagements with strong writing/speaking skills and be comfortable presenting findings to both internal and external audiences.Leverage Zscaler’s existing data mining tools as well as our cloud based infrastructure to protect our customers.Exercise strong technical knowledge of malware-based threats, and live to identify the next attack vector, no matter how deep it’s hidden.QualificationsRequired 5+ years in static and dynamic analysis malware code reverse engineering.Expert knowledge of debuggers (OllyDbg, WinDbg, or x64dbg) and disassemblers/decompilers (IDA Pro or Ghidra).Proficient in unpacking malware, string and code obfuscation, encryption, and compression algorithms.Experience building automated tools to extract malware configuration information.Profound understanding of network protocols and web application security.Familiar with the development of IDS/IPS (e.g., Snort and Suricata) signatures and Yara rules.Strong scripting skills in languages such as Ruby, Python, or Perl.Professional english writing skills and experience in drafting blogs, technical reports, etc.Proven track record of innovative ideas and an ability to implement them.PreferredExperience with threats to mobile devices, vulnerabilities, and binary exploitation.Publication of past research and/or speaking engagements.Data mining experience with large security data sets such as IDS, IPS and firewall logs.EducationBachelor’s or graduate degree from four-year college or university (preferably in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related discipline), or equivalent security industry work experience.Why Zscaler?People who excel at Zscaler are smart, motivated and share our values. Ask yourself: Do you want to team with the best talent in the industry? Do you want to work on disruptive technology? Do you thrive in a fluid work environment? Do you appreciate a company culture that enables individual and group success and celebrates achievement? If you said yes, we’d love to talk to you about joining our award-winning team.Learn more at zscaler.com or follow us on Twitter @zscaler. Additional information about Zscaler (NASDAQ : ZS ) is available at http://www.zscaler.com. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, sex, color, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, or on ['', 'HOW TO APPLY', 'As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, you will be asked to be forward thinking in your approach to applying analytical techniques to advancing the departments capacity in creating unique algorithms and leveraging your NLP expertise. You will add to their implementation for machine learning for both internal and external projects. With a rich and varied dataset to work from, you’ll have the chance to apply your machine learning and algorithmic techniques to all types of data sets to detect trends before anybody else in the world.', '· Develop end to end AI and machine learning models', '· Commercial experience developing machine learning and deep learning algorithms being put into production', 'KEYWORDS', '· Productionalize models', 'Data Science, Machine Learning, Information, Technology, Team Lead, Tech Lead, Software Engineering, Software Engineer, AI, Deep Learning, Robotics, NLP', 'USD $165,000 - $185,000 + Great PTO/Benefits + Equity', 'You will need to be a proven problem solver, critical thinker, and have an advanced technical background to join this growing, yet experienced team.', '· Have strong experience in BERT, spaCy, and TensorFlow', '· Experience working with cross-functional teams', '· PhD or Master’s in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, or Quantitative Fields', '· Extensive software engineering experience, working with models end to end', 'A competitive base salary of $165,000 – $185,000 + amazing benefits', 'More than anything - You will need proven, commercial expereince as a machine learning engineer!', 'More than anything', 'This is a start-up supply chain risk company that is changing the way the marketplace reacts and interacts with fluxuations in the market due to phenomena, enterprise, and news. As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, you’ll find yourself working closely with both Data leaders and engineering teams and will enjoy the pace and innovation that runs through the company culture. For those ready for a start up environment, you’ll enjoy the perks that this company can offer you – I hope you bring a good sense of humor!', 'Please register your interest by sending your CV to Elizabeth Sobel via the Apply link on this page.', 'Remote', 'YOUR QUALIFICATIONS', '· Have a great attitude and want to work with a high performing team', 'As a Machine Learning Engineer you will be required to:', '· Help innovate the way AI is used within the company', 'THE COMPANY', 'THE ROLE', 'This is an opportunity for an innovate machine learning engineer to use their expertise in NLP to find trends around the world and identify major correlations on what will happen next. You will work in one of Worlds’ most innovative tech startups where they have captured the global capacity of supply chain relationships.. They have seen great success attracting clients and investors because of their completely unique commitment to machine learning in this domain.', '· Work with a cross-functional team of machine learning engineers and OPs', 'THE BENEFITS', '· Fluency in Python, and ML/NLP Libraries', 'Senior Machine Learning Engineer (NLP)']

['', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Be fully involved with the whole project life cycle, from prototyping to implementation (some degree of hands on work)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Extensive experience in Financial Services, Fintech, Risk or similar', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Recruit and build a leading data science team', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Highly Proficient in Python – specifically building predictive models', 'Your Qualifications', 'A competitive base salary of $160,000-$180,000 + bonus + benefits', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Familiar with neural networks, RNN, CNN, LSTM, etc a plus', '$160,000-180,000 + bonus + benefits', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Use your machine learning expertise to develop cutting-edge models', 'This is an opportunity for an innovate Director of Data Scientist to cut their teeth in a data-first environment at one of the fastest growing fintech businesses. You will work in one of United States’ most innovative fintech startups where they have designed a unique credit risk and fraud detection platform. They are looking for a Director of Data Science to partner directly with their executive team on problems across the business in analytics, risk and sales. This position will have a high level of visibility and be responsible for technical strategy and direction of the data science team. If you are looking for the chance to take your skills to the next level and work in an environment where your work with produce actionable commercial result – this is the role for you.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Expert in stakeholder management and cross-team collaboration', 'The Benefits', "As The Director of Data Scientist on this team, you will be asked to be forward thinking in your approach to applying analytical techniques to advancing the department's capacity in credit risk and fraud detection. You will add to their implementation for machine learning for both internal and external projects. With a rich and varied dataset to work from, you’ll have the chance to apply your machine learning and algorithmic techniques to expand credit approval through AI and Data Science.", '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Thorough communicator with technical team, clients and C level management', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0History developing and implementing machine learning and NLP algorithms in a commercial setting', 'Please register your interest by sending your résumé to Tim Jonas via the Apply link on this page.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Provide deep knowledge and leadership in data science, machine learning, NLP, statistical analysis and varied data sets for junior team members', 'How To Apply', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You will need to be a proven problem solver, critical thinker, and have an advanced technical background to join this growing, yet experienced team', 'THE COMPANY', 'Director of Data Science', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0MS or PhD in a quantitative or scientific field (STEM, Financial Engineering, etc.)', 'THE ROLE', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Knowledge of Big Data packages a plus, Hadoop, Spark, Hive or others', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work closely across different business verticals to prioritize and create short / long term goals', 'Arlington, Virginia', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proven leader having managed dynamic data science teams previously', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Collaborate closely with senior management to help make business critical decisions', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in Financial Services', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Have a strong track record of developing and deploying machine learning models for fraud detection', 'As The Director of Data Scientist, you’ll find yourself working closely with both Data leaders and engineering teams and will enjoy the pace and innovation that runs through the company culture. For those ready for a start up environment, you’ll enjoy the perks of ownership, visibility and agency that this company can offer you as well as the career and personal growth that are rare in this field', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Be heavily involved in data science strategy across the business']

['', 'HOW TO APPLY', 'As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, you will be asked to be forward thinking in your approach to applying analytical techniques to advancing the departments capacity in creating unique algorithms and leveraging your NLP expertise. You will add to their implementation for machine learning for both internal and external projects. With a rich and varied dataset to work from, you’ll have the chance to apply your machine learning and algorithmic techniques to all types of data sets to detect trends before anybody else in the world.', 'KEYWORDS', '·\xa0\xa0Experience working with cross-functional teams', 'Data Science, Machine Learning, Information, Technology, Team Lead, Tech Lead, Software Engineering, Software Engineer, AI, Deep Learning, Robotics, NLP', 'USD $165,000 - $185,000 + Great PTO/Benefits + Equity', 'You will need to be a proven problem solver, critical thinker, and have an advanced technical background to join this growing, yet experienced team.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Productionalize models', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0PhD or Master’s in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, or Quantitative Fields', 'This is a start-up supply chain risk company that is changing the way the marketplace reacts and interacts with fluctuations in the market due to phenomena, enterprise, and news. As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, you’ll find yourself working closely with both Data leaders and engineering teams and will enjoy the pace and innovation that runs through the company culture. For those ready for a start up environment, you’ll enjoy the perks that this company can offer you – I hope you bring a good sense of humor!', 'More than anything - You will need proven, commercial experience as a machine learning engineer!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Have strong experience in BERT, spaCy, and TensorFlow', 'A competitive base salary of $165,000 – $185,000 + amazing benefits', 'This is an opportunity for an innovative machine learning engineer to use their expertise in NLP to find trends around the world and identify major correlations on what will happen next. You will work in one of Worlds’ most innovative tech startups where they have captured the global capacity of supply chain relationships. They have seen great success attracting clients and investors because of their completely unique commitment to machine learning in this domain.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Fluency in Python, and ML/NLP Libraries', 'More than anything', 'Remote', 'YOUR QUALIFICATIONS', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Have a great attitude and want to work with a high performing team', 'As a Machine Learning Engineer you will be required to:', 'Please register your interest by sending your CV to Sam Agre via the Apply link on this page.', 'THE COMPANY', '·\xa0\xa0Extensive software engineering experience, working with models end to end', 'THE ROLE', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Develop end to end AI and machine learning models', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with a cross-functional team of machine learning engineers and OPs', '·\xa0\xa0Commercial experience developing machine learning and deep learning algorithms being put into production', 'THE BENEFITS', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Help innovate the way AI is used within the company', 'Senior Machine Learning Engineer (NLP)']

['', '• This position may be subject to a background check. Any convictions will be evaluated to determine if they directly relate to the responsibilities and requirements of the position. Having a conviction history will not automatically disqualify an applicant from being considered for employment.', 'For full consideration, please submit a CV. The posting shall remain open until the position is filled.', 'Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory encourages applications from women, minorities, veterans, and other underrepresented groups presently considering scientific research careers.', 'We are seeking strong software and applied math candidates that can help develop the next generation of finite volume numerical algorithms, which must be both highly accurate and fast on multi-core and GPU architectures. You will join an interdisciplinary team of applied mathematicians and software engineers to develop new algorithms for next-generation high performance computing (HPC) computational science simulations.', '• Work will be primarily performed at Lawrence Berkeley National Lab, 1 Cyclotron Road, Berkeley, CA.', '• Understand C++ software design and development for high-performance computer architectures.', 'HPC Numerical Algorithms Postdoctoral Researcher - 91276', '• This position is represented by a union for collective bargaining purposes.', 'Apply directly online at http://50.73.55.13/counter.php?id=187782 and follow the on-line instructions to complete the application process.\xa0', 'Notes:', '• Analyze accuracy and stability of numerical algorithms and linear algebra solvers.', 'What is Required:', 'We value and strive for diversity in backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives.', 'Equal Employment Opportunity: Berkeley Lab is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, age, or protected veteran status. Berkeley Lab is in compliance with the Pay Transparency Nondiscrimination Provision under 41 CFR 60-1.4. Click here (https://www.dol.gov/agencies/ofccp/posters) to view the poster and supplement: "Equal Employment Opportunity is the Law."', '• Contribute in a multidisciplinary team environment which includes mathematicians, software developers, and computational scientists.', '• Salary will be predetermined based on postdoctoral step rates.', '• Experience developing mathematical and software models for science applications is desired.', 'What You Will Do:', '• Some experience in C/C++ programming.', '• General experience in developing and using numerical software for partial differential equations.', 'Berkeley Lab’s Computational Research (https://crd.lbl.gov/) Division has an opening for a HPC Numerical Algorithms Postdoctoral Researcher to work on high-performance numerical algorithm development. The Applied Numerical Algorithms Group (ANAG) develops advanced numerical algorithms and software for partial differential equations integrated with the application of the software to problems of independent scientific and engineering interest. The primary focus of our work is in the development of high-resolution and adaptive discretizations of partial differential equations in complex geometries, targeting DOE-mission applications including biological systems, electro-chemical and electro-magnetic systems, climate, and fusion energy.', '• Understanding of computer systems architecture and their contributions to the overall system performance is also desirable.\xa0', 'How To Apply', 'Organization:\xa0CR-Computational Research', '• Ph.D. in Applied Mathematics, Computer Science, or Physical Sciences/Engineering within the last 3 years, with a strong research background in at least some of applied mathematics, computational methods, and scientific computing.', '• Contribute to publications and participate in conferences and meetings.', '• This is a full-time 2 year, postdoctoral appointment with the possibility of renewal based upon satisfactory job performance, continuing availability of funds and ongoing operational needs. You must have less than 3 years of paid postdoctoral experience. Salary for Postdoctoral positions depends on years of experience post-degree.']

['', 'Requisition Number:', ' Apply various optimization techniques to generate solutions to large-scale optimization problems for KPMG clients, such as resource planning, scheduling, facility location, portfolio optimization, and pricing/revenue optimization. Techniques include but are not limited to linear/mixed-integer programming with commercial (e.g. CPLEX) as well as open-source solvers (e.g. CBC), dynamic programming, heuristics, metaheuristics, and more. ', ' Proficiency in programming languages (e.g. Python, R, C++, Julia), data analysis packages (e.g.scikit-learn, pyomo) as well as the ability to implement, maintain, debug and test; experience in commercial optimization solvers (e.g. CPLEX, Gurobi, Xpress) ', ' Professional experience with high proficiency in the use of Microsoft Office programs (Word, PowerPoint, Excel); ', ' Bachelors Degree in Operations Research, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Industrial Engineering, or related field from an accredited college or university with 1+ years of professional services experience  Professional knowledge of advanced analytical concepts, particularly ModSim (Modeling & Simulation), Optimization and Machine Learning;  Experience utilizing a strong mathematical background with advanced knowledge in one or more of the following fields: discrete optimization, integer programming (including commercial optimization solvers), discrete-event simulation, dynamic programming, local search heuristics, genetic algorithms, or other metaheuristics  Proficiency in programming languages (e.g. Python, R, C++, Julia), data analysis packages (e.g.scikit-learn, pyomo) as well as the ability to implement, maintain, debug and test; experience in commercial optimization solvers (e.g. CPLEX, Gurobi, Xpress)  Experience in software development using version control (Git), unit testing, Jira, and Confluence.  Ability to work with team members and clients to assess needs, provide assistance, and resolve problems, using excellent problem-solving skills, verbal/written communication, and the ability to present and explain technical concepts to business audiences  Professional experience with high proficiency in the use of Microsoft Office programs (Word, PowerPoint, Excel);  Ability to travel up to 80% of the time; Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States without the need for visa sponsorship now or in the future ', ' Experience utilizing a strong mathematical background with advanced knowledge in one or more of the following fields: discrete optimization, integer programming (including commercial optimization solvers), discrete-event simulation, dynamic programming, local search heuristics, genetic algorithms, or other metaheuristics ', ' Process structured, unstructured and semi-structured data and apply data cleaning, data imputation and feature engineering methods prior to developing models ', ' Ability to work with team members and clients to assess needs, provide assistance, and resolve problems, using excellent problem-solving skills, verbal/written communication, and the ability to present and explain technical concepts to business audiences ', 'Qualifications', ' Come up with innovative, repeatable, business use cases for real world optimization techniques, and quickly develop prototypes to test these use cases ', ' Utilize a diverse array of technologies and tools as needed, to deliver insights, such as Python, R, Julia, C++, Tableau, and more ', ' Apply various optimization techniques to generate solutions to large-scale optimization problems for KPMG clients, such as resource planning, scheduling, facility location, portfolio optimization, and pricing/revenue optimization. Techniques include but are not limited to linear/mixed-integer programming with commercial (e.g. CPLEX) as well as open-source solvers (e.g. CBC), dynamic programming, heuristics, metaheuristics, and more.  Develop and employ simulation models (Discrete Event, Agent-Based, and System Dynamics modeling) by using simulation software AnyLogic (Preferred), NetLogo, Simulink and/or ARENA  Process structured, unstructured and semi-structured data and apply data cleaning, data imputation and feature engineering methods prior to developing models  Develop predictive models using Machine Learning (e.g. classification, clustering, regression, dimensionality reduction methods), Natural Language Processing (OCR, information extraction), and statistical analysis methods such as time-series analysis,statistical inference, and validation tools;perform exploratory data analyses, generate and test working hypotheses, prepare and analyze historical data, and identify patterns  Work directly with KPMG clients and stakeholders to present and explain the key techniques and major results generated using non-technical language; understand client feedback and be able to accommodate it into model through programming  Come up with innovative, repeatable, business use cases for real world optimization techniques, and quickly develop prototypes to test these use cases  Utilize a diverse array of technologies and tools as needed, to deliver insights, such as Python, R, Julia, C++, Tableau, and more ', ' Work directly with KPMG clients and stakeholders to present and explain the key techniques and major results generated using non-technical language; understand client feedback and be able to accommodate it into model through programming ', 'Responsibilities', ' Experience in software development using version control (Git), unit testing, Jira, and Confluence. ', ' Bachelors Degree in Operations Research, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Industrial Engineering, or related field from an accredited college or university with 1+ years of professional services experience ', ' Develop and employ simulation models (Discrete Event, Agent-Based, and System Dynamics modeling) by using simulation software AnyLogic (Preferred), NetLogo, Simulink and/or ARENA ', ' Ability to travel up to 80% of the time; Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States without the need for visa sponsorship now or in the future ', ' Develop predictive models using Machine Learning (e.g. classification, clustering, regression, dimensionality reduction methods), Natural Language Processing (OCR, information extraction), and statistical analysis methods such as time-series analysis,statistical inference, and validation tools;perform exploratory data analyses, generate and test working hypotheses, prepare and analyze historical data, and identify patterns ', ' Professional knowledge of advanced analytical concepts, particularly ModSim (Modeling & Simulation), Optimization and Machine Learning; ', 'Description']

', ' Ability to set up data and experimental platforms', ' Experience using data mining and statistical tools', ' Foster collaboration between DevOps and machine learning operations (MLOps) teams', ' At least three years hands-on experience with data science, big data, and data engineering', 'To qualify for the role you must have', ' Knowledge and experience with one or more cloud available Machine Learning frameworks and tools such as Tensor Flow, PyTorch, ONNX, Weka, NumPy, PyMongo, etc.', 'The opportunity', ' Solid pattern recognition and predictive modelling skills', 'Assisting in the strategy and implementation of Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Big Data, and modern Information Management', ' Hands-on experience with analytics and big data technologies within Microsoft Azure, with some experiences in tools such as Azure Data Factory, Azure Machine Learning, ML Ops, Azure Cognitive Services, Databricks or Synapse.', ' Bachelor’s degree, or MS degree in Computer Science, Statistics or Applied Mathematics, Data Science, or Machine Learning. Techniques include but are not limited to linear/mixed-integer programming with commercial (e.g. CPLEX) as well as open-source solvers (e.g. CBC), dynamic programming, heuristics, metaheuristics, and more ', ' Process structured, unstructured and semi-structured data and apply data cleaning, data imputation and feature engineering methods prior to developing models ', ' Ability to work with team members and clients to assess needs, provide assistance, and resolve problems, using excellent problem-solving skills, verbal/written communication, and the ability to present and explain technical concepts to business audiences ', 'Qualifications', ' Come up with innovative, repeatable, business use cases for real world optimization techniques, and quickly develop prototypes to test these use cases ', ' Utilize a diverse array of technologies and tools as needed, to deliver insights, such as Python, R, Julia, C++, Tableau, and more ', ' Work directly with KPMG clients and stakeholders to present and explain the key techniques and major results generated using non-technical language; understand client feedback and be able to accommodate it into model through programming ', ' Professional knowledge of advanced analytical concepts, particularly ModSim (Modeling & Simulation), Optimization and Machine Learning ', ' Develop and employ simulation models (Discrete Event, Agent-Based, and System Dynamics modeling) by using simulation software AnyLogic (Preferred), NetLogo, Simulink and/or AREN ', 'Responsibilities', ' Ability to travel up to 80% of the time; Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States without the need for visa sponsorship now or in the future', ' Apply various optimization techniques to generate solutions to large-scale optimization problems for KPMG clients, such as resource planning, scheduling, facility location, portfolio optimization, and pricing/revenue optimization. Techniques include but are not limited to linear/mixed-integer programming with commercial (e.g. CPLEX) as well as open-source solvers (e.g. CBC), dynamic programming, heuristics, metaheuristics, and more  Develop and employ simulation models (Discrete Event, Agent-Based, and System Dynamics modeling) by using simulation software AnyLogic (Preferred), NetLogo, Simulink and/or AREN  Process structured, unstructured and semi-structured data and apply data cleaning, data imputation and feature engineering methods prior to developing models  Develop predictive models using Machine Learning (e.g. classification, clustering, regression, dimensionality reduction methods), Natural Language Processing (OCR, information extraction), and statistical analysis methods such as time-series analysis,statistical inference, and validation tools;perform exploratory data analyses, generate and test working hypotheses, prepare and analyze historical data, and identify patterns  Work directly with KPMG clients and stakeholders to present and explain the key techniques and major results generated using non-technical language; understand client feedback and be able to accommodate it into model through programming  Come up with innovative, repeatable, business use cases for real world optimization techniques, and quickly develop prototypes to test these use cases  Utilize a diverse array of technologies and tools as needed, to deliver insights, such as Python, R, Julia, C++, Tableau, and more ', ' Experience in software development using version control (Git), unit testing, Jira, and Confluence. ', " Bachelor's Degree and 3 years of relevant work experience OR an Advanced degree (Master’s or PhD) in Operations Research, Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Industrial Engineering, or related field from an accredited college or university ", ' Develop predictive models using Machine Learning (e.g. classification, clustering, regression, dimensionality reduction methods), Natural Language Processing (OCR, information extraction), and statistical analysis methods such as time-series analysis,statistical inference, and validation tools;perform exploratory data analyses, generate and test working hypotheses, prepare and analyze historical data, and identify patterns ', 'Description']
